class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204981'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204981'>棒头取證，尤为瓦解冰消；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204981_comment'></div>喝下承当，未免龙头蛇尾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204981_comment'></div>况乃不快漆桶，无孔铁锤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204981_comment'></div>徒认影以迷头，但抱赃而叫屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204981_comment'></div>岂知填沟塞壑，无非碧眼胡僧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204981_comment'></div>积岳堆山，尽是黄面老子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204981_comment'></div>伏惟和尚脚根点地，鼻孔辽天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204981_comment'></div>真匠子之钤锤，实作家之炉韛。<div class='inline' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204983'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204983'>窃以离尘求觉，已乖调御之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204983_comment'></div>即幻见真，方契<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204983", 1204983, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>饮光</span>之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204983_comment'></div>圣因时远，人与法差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204983_comment'></div>执空而取者，依一精明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204983_comment'></div>任相而求者，认四颠倒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204983_comment'></div>守痴禅为定力，运乾慧为慈光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204983_comment'></div>习以自欺，久则难变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204983_comment'></div>既安邪解，沉迷有漏之因；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204983_comment'></div>宜得正宗，开示无生之忍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204983_comment'></div>昭庆上人洞该真际，圆證法空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204983_comment'></div>于旋流转徙之途，得妙湛总持之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204983_comment'></div>反闻闻性，体已遍于尘沙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204983_comment'></div>自觉觉他，功未周于毫刹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204983_comment'></div>辄勤三请，愿继一音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204983_comment'></div>说现在心，作将来眼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204983_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1204983_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204984' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204984' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204984?labeling=true' target='_blank'>醴泉开堂疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204984'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204984'>毛端宝刹，曾何新故之常；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204984_comment'></div>天下大禅，安有去来之累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204984_comment'></div>惟古佛庙，实今醴泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204984_comment'></div>自百年香火之馀，治一国风烟之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204984_comment'></div>塔閟连环之玉骨，殿藏及锦之贝文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204984_comment'></div>然而飞鸟衔花，空存胜境；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204984_comment'></div>真珠撒帐，未遇明师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204984_comment'></div>逮军旅之荐兴，获法筵之初启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204984_comment'></div>芳公长老少通教相，晚悟宗乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204984_comment'></div>密行则乡党之所依归，妙法则天龙之所回向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204984_comment'></div>游方既久，伫海滋深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204984_comment'></div>愿辞臃肿之居，亟返归来之驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204984_comment'></div>为谈不二，以度无边<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204984_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1204984'>及：王本作「成」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204984_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1204984_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1204984'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_1204984_0'>⑴ 《淮海集》卷三二。又见《五百家播芳大全文粹》卷七八，嘉庆《重修扬州府志》卷二九，嘉庆《高邮州志》卷一一。</div></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_199567_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199567'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199567_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年4月</a>　外舅徐成甫卒，后二日，其继室蔡氏殉焉。为撰行状及蔡氏哀词。作品：徐君主簿行状。蔡氏夫人行状。蔡氏哀词。<div id='poem_1204938' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204938' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204938?labeling=true' target='_blank'>徐君主簿行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204938")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204938_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204938'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204938'>君姓徐氏，讳某，字成甫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204938_comment'></div>其先泰州兴化人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204938_comment'></div>远祖湘，自兴化徙扬州之高邮家焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204938_comment'></div>湘生嗣，嗣生亮，亮于君，曾祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204938_comment'></div>咸不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204938_comment'></div>祖元吉，有厚德，乡人尊爱之，终于高邮军司理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204938_comment'></div>父格，前通州司户参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204938_comment'></div>参军磊落<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1204938", 1204938, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>豪纵</span>，不耐细务，自司理之没，事计多以委君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204938_comment'></div>家既右族，金钱邸第甲于一乡，公私歛施，交错重复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204938_comment'></div>君操其纲维，批赘补隙，抉剔含负，日纵月收，市笥么么，无所遗漏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204938_comment'></div>于是参军以为能，谓所亲曰：「吾有子矣，将不复与家事」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204938_comment'></div>熙宁某年，以入粟试将作监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204938_comment'></div>又五年，始至京师，授潭州宁乡主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204938_comment'></div>皆非其好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204938_comment'></div>君事亲至孝，四时甘新未进，不以辄尝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204938_comment'></div>待昆弟族人，一主于恩义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204938_comment'></div>叔父某为不悦者所构，刺史惑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204938_comment'></div>会有人诬君笞杀家奴，刺史大怒，以君属吏，讽并致其叔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204938_comment'></div>君曰：「罪缘某，不繇叔也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204938_comment'></div>榜胁万端，不服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204938_comment'></div>狱吏嘉之，为请于刺史，得脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204938_comment'></div>友人以贫不能葬其亲者，君闻之曰：「是余过也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204938_comment'></div>即为买田，出钱以办丧事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204938_comment'></div>而友人之亲得葬者五丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204938_comment'></div>此其可见者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204938_comment'></div>至于字亲族之孤，急交游之难，赖其施者甚众，而能讳不自言，虽妻子有不得而知者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204938_comment'></div>雅性宽厚，给使皂隶或时犯之，殊不介意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204938_comment'></div>婚姻之事，不幸至于甚难处者，君指顾从容，颜色不变，而事以两全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204938_comment'></div>繇此见其材智度量，信有以过人者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204938_comment'></div>颇涉传记，阴阳、医药、算术之学，无所不窥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204938_comment'></div>晚节尤厌人事，思与佛侣处士杖屦相从，蔬食清淡，为忘年之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204938_comment'></div>惜乎未及而卒矣，实熙宁八年闰月十八日也，享年四十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204938_comment'></div>初娶张氏，有贤德，前君若干年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204938_comment'></div>更娶蔡氏，节行益奇，君病殆时，至取毒药自引，后君二日卒，于是又见所以刑诸家者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1204938_comment'></div>子男五人，曰文通、文仲、文刚、文饶、文昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1204938_comment'></div>女三人，曰文美、文英、文柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1204938_comment'></div>初，君好学问，聚书几万卷，欲举进士，而父祖不从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1204938_comment'></div>乃叹曰：「子当读书，女必嫁士人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1204938_comment'></div>其后四子艺业蔚然有成，而文通尤自立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1204938_comment'></div>又以文美妻余，如其志云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1204938_comment'></div>葬有日矣，文通泣谓余曰：「惟先人行义可质诸幽明，不幸以多赀之故，士大夫以嫌自戒者或不能究言，诸孤良惧泯灭，盍为我图之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1204938_comment'></div>余既相与泣下，因掇其尤著白者为行状，以俟夫自信之君子考而志焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1204938_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204939' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204939' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204939?labeling=true' target='_blank'>蔡氏夫人行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204939")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204939_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204939'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204939'>夫人姓蔡氏，楚州山阳人，故潭州宁乡主簿徐君讳某之妻，而守秘书省校书郎致仕讳中正之女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204939_comment'></div>幼聪敏，有才艺，父母独奇，爱之异于他女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204939_comment'></div>年十四，适同郡环生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204939_comment'></div>生故疾病，成礼十六日而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204939_comment'></div>夫人虽幼，居丧事舅姑孝，谨如成人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204939_comment'></div>已而其舅又卒，为之斩衰蔬食诵佛经，无复更嫁意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204939_comment'></div>于是其母与诸昆弟率亲族数十人即环馆夺之，曰：「若十四而适人，十六日而夫死，为夫之丧三年，舅之丧又三年，若为人妇，亦至矣，又不欲更嫁，无乃过乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204939_comment'></div>且环父子俱亡嗣，若虽欲守志，将谁与居」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204939_comment'></div>夫人悲哀，迫不得已，遂去环氏，一年而归徐君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204939_comment'></div>徐君高邮人，号佳士，所与游者皆一时之豪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204939_comment'></div>夫人既得贤夫，所为益进，宗族甚重之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204939_comment'></div>俄而君病且殆，夫人曰：「身践二庭，女子之辱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204939_comment'></div>矧又如此，生复何聊？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204939_comment'></div>吾其决矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204939_comment'></div>因不食，潜使一媪市砒霜，绐曰：「吾侍君疾，将佩之以厌恶气」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204939_comment'></div>媪为市与之，遂以自服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204939_comment'></div>家人大惊，亟求解乐以进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204939_comment'></div>夫人曰：「是岂复欲生耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204939_comment'></div>趋使持去，强之，终不肯下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204939_comment'></div>徐君没二日，而夫人亦卒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204939_comment'></div>卒之日，里巷相传，皆叹曰：「异哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204939_comment'></div>若人者，岂前古所谓烈女者欤」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204939_comment'></div>时熙宁八年闰月二十日也，年三十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204939_comment'></div>夫人性卓荦斩斩，不为儿女事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204939_comment'></div>既生大家，而所适又皆富赡，金缯服玩取足于身，馀辄以散亲族、作佛事，无一毫爱惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204939_comment'></div>既死，箧中索然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204939_comment'></div>徐君前娶张氏，生四男一女，妾生一女一男，夫人所出才一女而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204939_comment'></div>既抚诸子，犹己之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204939_comment'></div>又奉张母虞氏，时节劳问如己母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204939_comment'></div>故其卒也，诸子洎虞氏及余哭之如君云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204939_comment'></div>仲兄绳，亦以操行知名于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204939_comment'></div>出殡，自山阳屡来，因得讯夫人之旧事，而并余之所见书焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1204939_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199669' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199669' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199669?labeling=true' target='_blank'>蔡氏哀词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199669")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199669_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199669'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199669'>惟夫人之高谊兮，真一时之女英。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199669'>既富有此好德兮，又申之以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_199669", 199669, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>令仪</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199669'>带<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_199669", 199669, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>幽蕙</span>之缥缈兮，佩明月之陆离。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199669'>人自操舍之不一兮，雅独取善以自持。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199669'>何报施之或忒兮，罹祸艰于不虞。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199669'>颜色炫而<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>未暮兮，所天忽以殒俎。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199669'>痛平素之偕处兮，忍此奄奄而嫠居。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199669'>沥哀血以自誓兮，甘饵毒而捐躯。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199669'>佩珠玉以死真<span class='inlineComment2'>（王本作贞）</span>兮，固众女之所嗤。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199669'>曷卓越以不顾兮，弃性命其如遗。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199669'>美不可强有兮，信天资之所开。<div id='poem_sentence_10_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_199669'>要反心以内省兮，岂或售乎人知。<div id='poem_sentence_11_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_199669'>嗟三晨之未浃兮，遂俱游<span class='inlineComment2'>（王本作逝）</span>而莫留。<div id='poem_sentence_12_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_199669'>死者有知兮，羌魂魄以并游。<div id='poem_sentence_13_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_199669'>日黄昏而不见兮，虚<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>室窈其无人。<div id='poem_sentence_14_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_199669'>惟哀风以归来兮，动素幔之襜襜。<div id='poem_sentence_15_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_199669'>何平生之款密兮，遽音声之不可寻。<div id='poem_sentence_16_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_199669'>俨遗迹以在目兮，纷百忧而攻心。<div id='poem_sentence_17_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_199669'>岂至理不吾喻兮，如意厚而悲深。<div id='poem_sentence_18_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_199669'>抚双榇以增恸兮，涕清<span class='inlineComment2'>（各本作渍）</span>血而洒襟。<div id='poem_sentence_19_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_199669'>已矣哉，人生有死兮，自前古而既然。<div id='poem_sentence_20_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_199669'>精魄忽其不驻兮，惟修名之可延。<div id='poem_sentence_21_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_199669'>忍录录以寓世兮，信烈者之所羞。<div id='poem_sentence_22_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_199669'>傥佳志之获申兮，虽奄忽其焉悼。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_199669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_199669'><span class='label'>按：</span>《淮海集》卷四○。<br /><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_5_199669_0'>⑴ 原作兮，据各本改</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_199669_0'>⑵ 张本、四库本作庭</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_199669_comment'></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='88400513e793482db1e3c3c63cf7039a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("88400513e793482db1e3c3c63cf7039a");'><span id='88400513e793482db1e3c3c63cf7039a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年</a>，28岁</div><div id='88400513e793482db1e3c3c63cf7039a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年春</a>　得朱广微书，作诗答之。作品：答朱广微（广微才华殆天赋）<div id='poem_199660' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199660' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199660?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答朱广微</a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199660")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199660_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199660'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199660'>广微才华殆天付，十岁孤山有佳句。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199660_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199660'>又梦东林饮虎溪，叹息清风人不悟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199660_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199660'>自尔所见无全牛，桐柏昆崙日倾注。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199660_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199660'>葱茏晓景破新花，蹭蹬老拳擒脱兔。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199660_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199660'>身勤事左竟何成，巧迫化工天所怒。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199660_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199660'>两鬓星星沧海头，强学禅那慰迟暮。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199660_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199660'>昨夜灯花吐金粟，晓烹鲤鱼得尺素。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199660_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199660'>笑我徜徉吴楚间，经卷酒卮随所遇。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199660_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199660'>人生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_199660", 199660, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>迕意</span>十八九，月得解颜能几度。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199660_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199660'>著书准易空自疲，服药求仙良亦误。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199660_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199660'>北风老矣无能为，行看黄鹂语飞絮。<div id='poem_sentence_10_199660_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_199660'>安得从君醉百场，落笔珠玑不论数。<div id='poem_sentence_11_199660_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_199660'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_199660_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年夏</a>　孙莘老弟诚之为北海尉，作诗送之。作品：送孙诚之尉北海（吾乡如覆盂）<div id='poem_199608' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199608' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199608?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送孙诚之尉北海</a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年夏）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199608")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199608_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199608'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199608'>吾乡如覆盂，地据扬楚脊。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199608'>环以万顷湖，粘天四无壁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199608'>蜿蜒戏神珠，正昼<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>飞霹雳。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199608'>草木无异姿，灵气殊郁积。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199608'>所以生群材，名<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作各）</span>抱荆山璧。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199608'>小为百夫防，大为万人敌。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199608'>夫子少迈伦，喑呜阻金石。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199608'>奏赋明光宫，玉座瞻咫尺。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199608'>翻身堕云霄，十载迫穷厄。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199608'>焚舟更一战，得尉沧海北。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199608'>五月乘画船，箫鼓事远适。<div id='poem_sentence_10_199608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_199608'>天横齐山青，雨带楚水黑。<div id='poem_sentence_11_199608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_199608'>勿云晚方仕，四十乃古昔。<div id='poem_sentence_12_199608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_199608'>勿云名位卑，九万自此击。<div id='poem_sentence_13_199608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_199608'>幽求尉朝邑，鬓发森已白。<div id='poem_sentence_14_199608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_199608_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_199608'>行矣壮旧图，勉<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：缺文。）</span>。<div id='e2dbf538515444b6b63f9737b1b544ce_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e2dbf538515444b6b63f9737b1b544ce");'><span id='e2dbf538515444b6b63f9737b1b544ce_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　是岁，秦观兼事耕作，有田居四首，写与妻儿共同劳动，并反映农民纳税、官吏催租、邻里酬酢等生活。间与参寥子、孙莘老唱和。作品：田居四首（鸡号四邻起；入夏桑柘凋；昔我莳青秧；严冬百草枯）<div id='poem_199505' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199505' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199505?labeling=true' target='_blank'>田居四首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199505_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199505'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199505'>犁锄带晨景，道路更笑喧。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199505'>少壮已云趋，伶俜尚鸱蹲。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199505'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_199505", 199505, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>蟹黄</span>经雨润，野马从风奔。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199504'>隆曦破层阴，霁霭收远壑。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199502_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　是岁，秦观有纳凉诗及行香子词，亦作于村居时。作品：纳凉诗（携杖来追柳外凉）行香子（树绕村庄）<div id='poem_199284' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199284' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199284?labeling=true' target='_blank'>纳凉</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199284")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_199284_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199284'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199284'>携杖来追柳外凉，画桥南畔倚胡床。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199284_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199284'>月明船笛参差起，风定池莲自在香<span class='inlineComment2'>（宋蔡正孙《诗林广记》后集卷八）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199284_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199284'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_199284_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199712' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199712' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199712?labeling=true' target='_blank'>行香子<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作明张綖词）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199712")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199712_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199712'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199712'>树绕村庄，水满陂塘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199712_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199712'>倚东风、豪<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作浩）</span>兴徜徉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199712_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199712'>小园几许，收尽春光。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199712_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199712'>有桃花红，李花白，菜花黄。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199712_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199712'>远远围墙，隐隐茅堂。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199712_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199712'>飏青旗、流水桥傍。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199712_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199712'>偶然乘兴，步过东冈。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199712_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199712'>正莺儿啼，燕儿舞，蝶儿忙。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_199712_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_199712'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(199712)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年9月</a>　秋九月，与显之长老等会于高邮，作寄老庵赋及游汤泉记。汤泉赋亦成。作品：寄老庵赋。游汤泉记。汤泉赋。<div id='poem_1204699' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204699' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204699?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄老庵赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204699")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204699_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204699'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204699'>或问：「孙先生之游汤泉山也，尝于佛祠之旁，二松之下，诛薙草茅，平夷土涂，规以为庵，曰『寄老』焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204699_comment'></div>子时实从，与见其事，愿扬榷而陈之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204699_comment'></div>仆曰：「唯唯」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204699_comment'></div>寄老之区，在于汤泉，实惟历阳，东城之域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204699_comment'></div>山林郁其修阻，水土婉而滋息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204699_comment'></div>风和气平，物无疠疫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204699_comment'></div>其出游也，南则峰峦，经亘二百馀里，前望建业之都，却顾项王之亭，龙窟呀其旁出，江漫漫而徂征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204699_comment'></div>东则惠济、真相，二刹相望，殿寝中开，四注脩廊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204699_comment'></div>閒从游子，于焉相羊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204699_comment'></div>沈燎茗饮，乐未渠央。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204699_comment'></div>西则赭落之前，三井天出，幽毖白浪，明晦如一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204699_comment'></div>旁输有斛，上庇有室，解衣入游，百疾为失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204699_comment'></div>北则瓦梁之河，阴陵之泽，水潦之所聚会，鱼鳖之所充斥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204699_comment'></div>芡菱蒲莼，毛发之富，被其邻国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204699_comment'></div>其入居也，则闭关却扫，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1204699", 1204699, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>反听</span>收视，内外既进，与妙自会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204699_comment'></div>湛乎若玉渊之澄，枵然如槁木之废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204699_comment'></div>其游也，其居也，无所适而非道者，世奚足以识之哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204699_comment'></div>虽然，先生方为侍从之臣，充谏诤之官，论思献纳，日不遑给，虽欲复从二三子于寄老之上，未可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204699_comment'></div>一旦功成事毕，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1204699", 1204699, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>引老</span>乞身，天子悯之，不烦以政，公卿大夫设祖道供帐于国门之外，酒阕升车，望寄老而归焉，则仆也亦将负杖屦而从之矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1204699_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204909' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204909' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204909?labeling=true' target='_blank'>游汤泉记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204909")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204909_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204909'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204909'>漳南道人昭庆隐汤泉山之八月，集贤孙公谓其游曰：「漳南去几时，已甚久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204909_comment'></div>且闻其所寓富山水，盍往访焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204909_comment'></div>于是余与道人参寥请从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204909_comment'></div>具鞍马，戒徒御，翼日出高邮西郭门，驰六十里，宿神居山之悟空寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204909_comment'></div>神居高不踰三四引，而股趾盘薄甚大，旁占数墟，俗呼土山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204909_comment'></div>或曰：「昔老姥炼丹于此，功成仙去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204909_comment'></div>今寺有石药臼者，乃其遗物也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204909_comment'></div>又驰四十里，宿黄公店，从者以雨告止焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204909_comment'></div>又驰六十里，次六合，馆寿圣寺之香积院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204909_comment'></div>院有庞眉老僧主之，应客淡然，若无意于世者，与之言，心如其貌，盖有道者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204909_comment'></div>又驰七十里，次真相院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204909_comment'></div>明日漳南来逆，相劳苦如平生欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204909_comment'></div>遂与俱行，驰二十五里至汤泉，馆惠济院，院则漳南之所寓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204909_comment'></div>景申，遂浴于汤泉之墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204909_comment'></div>西惠济二百步，周袤不踰一成，有泉五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204909_comment'></div>一曰太子汤，旧传梁昭明所游，今废于野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204909_comment'></div>一在居民朱氏家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204909_comment'></div>其三则隶于惠济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204909_comment'></div>而惠济三泉，旁皆甃石为八方斛，窍其两崖，一以受虚，一以泄满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204909_comment'></div>泉输其中，晨夜不绝，其色深碧沸白，香气袭人，爬搔委顿之病，浴之辄愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204909_comment'></div>赢粮自远而至者无虚时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204909_comment'></div>刘梦得《和州记》云：「地有沸井」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204909_comment'></div>即此泉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204909_comment'></div>噫，泉之为汤者众矣，彼汝水、骊山，尝为乘舆后宫之所临幸，方其盛时，绮疏璇题，鱼龙飞动，眩人目睛，势徂事变，鹿豕得而辱焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204909_comment'></div>其僻昧不闻于世者，又皆蔽于丛薄，堙于土涂，抱清怀洁，历千百年，莫或稍试于用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204909_comment'></div>二者皆有恨焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204909_comment'></div>独是泉出无亢满之累，其仁足以及物，岂所谓「无出而阳，无入而藏，柴立乎其中央」者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204909_comment'></div>余三人者，既嘉泉之近于道，又贪其有功于尘垢疾病也，日不一至，再日必至焉，率以为常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204909_comment'></div>越三日，乌江令阎求仁来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204909_comment'></div>求仁，余乡友也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204909_comment'></div>遂与俱行，东南驰八里，至龙洞山下，弃马而徒步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204909_comment'></div>山形斗起，蒙笼曲道，尤难登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204909_comment'></div>扪萝进者五里，然后至其山椒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204909_comment'></div>是日风曀，望建业江山，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_33_1204909", 1204909, "Clauses/109/Comments/0")'>蟠龙踞虎</span>之状，皆依约而得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1204909_comment'></div>自山椒转而西南，盘纡径复又二里而至龙洞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1204909_comment'></div>其上巃嵷崟岑，不可穷竟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1204909_comment'></div>门则大穴也，渐下十数丈，窅然深黑，日光所不及，揭炬然后可行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1204909_comment'></div>腹中空豁，可储粟数万斛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1204909_comment'></div>屏以青壁，而泉啮其趾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1204909_comment'></div>盖以乳石，而鼠家其窦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1204909_comment'></div>仰而视之，或突然傲岸而出，若有恃者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1204909_comment'></div>或侵寻而却，若有畏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1204909_comment'></div>云挠而鸟企，鼻口呀而断腭露，其陬牙横遌卒愕之变，疑生于鬼神，虽智者造谋而巧者述之，未必能尔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1204909_comment'></div>惜乎閟于龛岩夐绝、人迹罕至之地，世莫得而窥焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1204909_comment'></div>夫岂负天下之奇胜者，固不欲售其伎，必待夫至诚笃好之士，然后与之接耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1204909_comment'></div>或曰，洞有小蛇，青色而赤章，旱岁祷雨多应云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1204909_comment'></div>景夕，还惠济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1204909_comment'></div>惠济有庵二：一在太子泉南百步崦中，隐者陈生居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1204909_comment'></div>一未构基，在院西六十步大丘之原，丘势坡陀，前有小涧，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1204909", 1204909, "Clauses/156/Comments/0")'>涓涓</span>而流，藩以齐筱，闳以双松，每泠风自远而至，泛筱薄，激松梢，度流水，其音嘈然，如奏笙籁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1204909_comment'></div>巽向而望，自定山转而西，服<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1204909", 1204909, "Clauses/167/Comments/0")'>光晷</span>，薄星辰，亘二百里，迅驰而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1204909", 1204909, "Clauses/170/Comments/0")'>矗立</span>，妒危而恬壮，分秀而取奇，各挟其伎，以效履舄之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1204909_comment'></div>孙公爱其地胜，欲寄以老焉，因请名曰寄老庵，相率作诗以约之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1204909_comment'></div>明年庵成，发二奇石于双松之下，形势益振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1204909_comment'></div>于是环山数百里，尝以游观名者，迁延辞避，推寄老焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1204909_comment'></div>西庵之成久矣，其地<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1204909", 1204909, "Clauses/187/Comments/0")'>迫遽</span>无流水，非枯槁自谋之士，莫能居之，故蔑有闻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1204909_comment'></div>是庵始基也，为贤士大夫所瞩，及成，遂以眺望浮游之胜，甲于一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1204909_comment'></div>物之兴，固自有时也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1204909_comment'></div>汤泉之事既穷，余又独从参寥西驰七十里，入乌江，邀求仁谒项羽祠，饮系马松下，凭大江以望三山，憩于虚乐亭，复还惠济，翼日乃归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1204909_comment'></div>盖自高邮距乌江三百二十五里，凡经佛寺四，神祠一，山水之胜者二，得诗三十首，赋一篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1204909_comment'></div>至于山林云物之变，溪濑潺湲之音，故墟荒落、晨汲暝舂之状，悠然与耳目谋，而适然与心遇者，盖不可胜计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1204909_comment'></div>于戏，兹游之所得，可谓富矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1204909_comment'></div>明年，漳南自汤泉来，会于高邮，追叙去年登临之美，且叹日月之速，盛游之难再也，因撰次之，以备汤泉故事，时与同好者览之以自择焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1204909_comment'></div>熙宁十年九月记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_61_1204909_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204700' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204700' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204700?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汤泉赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204700")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204700_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204700'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204700'>大江之滨，东城之野，有泉出焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204700_comment'></div>直回峰，负深谷，分埒引源，迤逦相属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204700_comment'></div>晨夜有声，涵云注玉，薄为虎须，洑为鱼目，鳞介莫潜，遇者斯浴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204700_comment'></div>此何水也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204700_comment'></div>野老告余曰：「泓泓涓涓，莫虞岁年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204700_comment'></div>不火而燠，其名汤泉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204700_comment'></div>呜呼，岂非荧惑莅于上耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204700_comment'></div>烛龙隐于中耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204700_comment'></div>旁通咸池，日御之所经耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204700_comment'></div>幽精沈魄，阴偿其负耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204700_comment'></div>丹砂黄硫，金石之气，酷悍之所激耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204700_comment'></div>德有常仁，惠公而浃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204700_comment'></div>寒凝海兮不冰，旱焦山兮不竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204700_comment'></div>其或燥湿外干，精气散越，肤革疮疡，惫筋淫血，欣瀄汩之暂游，恍幽忧之永脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204700_comment'></div>以沐则发泽，以颒则肤悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204700_comment'></div>其羡流冗浸、捐弃于沟壑者，犹能灌蔬稻之畦，已牛马之暍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204700_comment'></div>此又何其然耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204700_comment'></div>吾闻天下之水，厥类实繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204700_comment'></div>至于弱水储阴，投羽必沈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204700_comment'></div>火井萃阳，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1204700", 1204700, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>烂石</span>灼金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204700_comment'></div>祥标醴泉，病饮而瘳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204700_comment'></div>异纪滋穴，神瀵以流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204700_comment'></div>焦溪乏罥蔓之饰，沸潭谢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1204700", 1204700, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>聱取</span>之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204700_comment'></div>其馀酒墨所发，胶盐是滋，啜怀千金，饮狂一国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204700_comment'></div>裒玉乳以中涵，横金丝而径度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204700_comment'></div>诡品缪名，纷莫为数，咸受命于元精，亦各私其所遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204700_comment'></div>若夫匡庐、汝水之旁，尉氏、骊山之下，烟菲掩褥，王孙鸟隼之所娱，金穴椒房，专宠靡曼之所占，则汤泉之中，又有显晦者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204700_comment'></div>野老冁然而笑曰：「善乎，齐给之士」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204700_comment'></div>曳杖而去，行歌于涂曰：「滭沸滂沱奋此泉兮，被彼山阿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204700_comment'></div>吾唯<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1204700", 1204700, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>灌沐</span>兮，不知其他」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1204700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1204700'><span class='label'>按：</span>《淮海集》卷一。又见《古今事文类聚》前集卷一八，《记纂渊海》卷八，《古今合璧事类备要》前集卷九，《古赋辨体》卷八，《山堂肆考》卷二二，《诗苑丛珠》卷三，《历代赋汇》卷二八，《古今图书集成》坤舆典卷三八、职方典卷八四○。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1204700_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年9月</a>　秋暮，曾孝序偕参寥子来访，秦观与之同游十日，有诗唱酬。作品：酬曾逢原参寥上人见寄山阳作（倦客当老秋）<div id='poem_199664' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199664' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199664?labeling=true' target='_blank'>酬曾逢原参寥上人见寄山阳作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199664")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199664_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199664'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199664'>倦客当老秋，于<span class='inlineComment2'>（各本作忽）</span>忽少佳意。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199664'>孰云尘滓地，刘阮肯俱至。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199664'>一披清骨毛，再见失身世。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199664'>有如执盛热，傃月濯凉吹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199664'>又如观巨梓，却觇萧苇细。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199664'>十辰同遨游，不觉日车逝。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199664'>嗟予逃空虚，终日面林翳。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199664'>闻人足音喜，况乃道所契。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199664'>方念衣袖分，明月忽我畀。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199664'>眷言何以酬，白发同所诣。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199664'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_199664_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年冬</a>　冬，有诗怀济南李公择，孙莘老、参寥子次韵和之。作品：怀李公择学士（一辞行旆楚亭皋）<div id='poem_199413' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199413' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199413?labeling=true' target='_blank'>怀李公择学士<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199413")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199413_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_199413_0'>① 按：此诗后原有《次韵二首》，系孙觉、释道潜次韵。今删入存目。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199413'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199413'>一辞行旆楚亭皋，几为登临挂郁陶。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199413_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199413'>蓬断草枯时节晚，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_199413", 199413, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>山长水远</span>梦魂劳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199413_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199413'>流传<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_199413", 199413, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>玉刻</span>皆黄绢，早晚金闺报大刀。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199413_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199413'>宣室方疑鬼神事，顺风行看驶鸿毛。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199413_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199413'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199413_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　是岁，马仲甫卒，秦观有祭马通议文。<div id='poem_1204950' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204950' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204950?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭马通议文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204950")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204950_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204950'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204950'>惟公盛德之后，克承厥先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204950_comment'></div>不激为高，不诡为偏，不见瑕疵，器实浑然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204950_comment'></div>践更中外，垂五十年，长者之风，四方是传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204950_comment'></div>始使六路，国用充委；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204950_comment'></div>旋帅二边，羌敌唯唯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204950_comment'></div>亳、许、江都，下车风靡，法度具存，颂声未已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204950_comment'></div>我来此邦，公适厌事，杖履阡陌，优游卒岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204950_comment'></div>方期暇日，从公游诣，孰云奄然，弃我而逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204950_comment'></div>日月飘忽，端如筈弦，承凶未几，遽卜新阡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204950_comment'></div>惟时淮海，春御戒旋，悲鸟号木，愁云蔽川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204950_comment'></div>念公此行，无复来还，奠觞荐词，用诀终天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204950_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1204950_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1077&endYear=1077')">1077年</a>　秦观有与乔希圣论黄连书。<div id='poem_1204786' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204786' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204786?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与乔希圣论黄连书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1077年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204786")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204786_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204786'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204786'>某比闻公以眼疾，饵黄连至数十两犹不已，不知果然否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204786_comment'></div>审如所闻，殆不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204786_comment'></div>某顷年血气未定，颇好方术之说，读医经数年，尝记释者云：「服黄连、苦参，久而反热」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204786_comment'></div>甚以为不然，后乃信之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204786_comment'></div>盖五味入胃，各归其所喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204786_comment'></div>故酸先归肝，苦先归心，甘先归脾，辛先归肺，咸先归肾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204786_comment'></div>入肝则为温，入心则为热，入肺则为清，入肾则为寒，入脾则为至阴，而血气兼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204786_comment'></div>皆谓增其气不已，则脏气有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1204786", 1204786, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>偏胜</span>，有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1204786", 1204786, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>偏胜</span>则必有所偏绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204786_comment'></div>黄连、苦参性虽大寒，然其味至苦，入胃则先归于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204786_comment'></div>久而不已，则心火之气胜，火胜则热，乃其理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204786_comment'></div>眼疾之生，本于肝之热，肝与心为子母，夫心为子，肝为母，心火也，肝亦火也，肾孤脏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204786_comment'></div>人尝患一水不胜二火，今病本于肝，而久饵苦药，使心有所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1204786", 1204786, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>偏胜</span>，是所谓以火救火，命之曰益多，其不可亦明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204786_comment'></div>夫药所以疗疾，其过也适所以为疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204786_comment'></div>闻比初作时，十已损其七八，正宜节药，慎护饮食，以俟其自平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204786_comment'></div>非如决疣溃痈，可以忽然一朝去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204786_comment'></div>辄具以进，惟留意而听之，无忽。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1204786_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年春</a>　春，孙莘老将服阕，有诗，秦观和之，历述莘老简史及己之从游经过。作品：次韵莘老（妙龄随计日）<div id='poem_199475' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199475' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199475?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵莘老</a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199475'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199475'>妙龄随计日，绀发度关年。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199475_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年3月</a>　春，龚深之往金陵见王安石，秦观作诗送之，参寥子次其韵。后龚深之常有诗相赠，秦观作诗答之。作品：答龚深之（深巷茅檐日渐长）<div id='poem_199455' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199455' </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199455")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199455_comment'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199455'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199455_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年春</a>　秦观有早春题僧舍、睡足轩二首，似作于本年。作品：早春题僧舍（东园紫梅初破蕊）睡足轩二首（长年忧患百端慵；数椽空屋枕清流）<div id='poem_199518' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199518' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199518'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199518'>东园紫梅初破蕾，北涧渌水方通流。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199518_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199518_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199461' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199461' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199461?labeling=true' ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199461")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199461_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199461'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199461'>长年忧患百端慵，开斥僧坊颇有功。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199461'>地撤蔽亏僧界净，人除<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_199461", 199461, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>荒秽</span>玉奁空。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199461'>青天并入挥毫里，白鸟时兴隐几中。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199461'>最是人间佳绝处，梦残风铁响丁东。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199461_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199461'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199461_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199460' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199460' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199460?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年春）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199460_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199460'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199460'>数椽空屋枕清流，一榻萧然散百忧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199460_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199460'>终日掩关尘境谢，有时开卷古人游。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199460_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199460'>鸣鸠去后沧浪晚，飞雨来初菡萏秋。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199460_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199460'>此处便令君睡足，何须云梦泽南州<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《淮海集》卷七）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199460_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199460'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199460_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='2eeaa2892abe456c95005119d7f78ac7_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2eeaa2892abe456c95005119d7f78ac7");'><span id='2eeaa2892abe456c95005119d7f78ac7_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1079')">1078-1079年</a>，30-31岁</div><div id='2eeaa2892abe456c95005119d7f78ac7' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　在京时，尝干谒王存；既归，作书及诗文七篇寄之。王亦得秦观诗文于从游之间，并予以推荐。作品：谢王学士启。<div id='poem_1204784' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204784' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204784?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢王学士书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204784")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204784_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204784'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204784'>史院学士阁下：某愚不自揆，窃尝以谓衣冠而称士者，宜有以异于流俗，而以古人自期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204784_comment'></div>故凡方册所载，简牍所存，不见则已，苟有见焉，未尝不熟诵其文，精覈其义，纵观其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204784", 1204784, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>形势</span>，而私掇其英华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204784_comment'></div>敝精神，劳筋力，不能自休已者，十年于兹矣，然志大而才不掩，事左而身益困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204784_comment'></div>每观今时<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1204784", 1204784, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>偶变投隙</span>之士，操数寸之管，书方尺之纸，无不拾取青紫，为宗族荣耀，而己独碌碌，抱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1204784", 1204784, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>不售</span>之器，以自滨于饥寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204784_comment'></div>乡人悯其愚而笑之，干禄少年至指以为戒，虽某亦自疑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204784_comment'></div>因计曰：剑工之惑剑，剑之似莫耶者，惟欧冶能名其种；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204784_comment'></div>玉工之眩玉，玉之似碧芦者，惟猗顿不失其情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204784_comment'></div>夫宗工硕儒，亦后进之欧冶、猗顿也，何重惜一见，以质其胸中之疑乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204784_comment'></div>于是试取其所为文投执事，而诸公见之乃大称借，以为非世俗之所知，复激劝之，使卒其业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204784_comment'></div>故前辈诸公在东南者，多得与之游焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204784_comment'></div>然某之私意，尚有所不满者，独以未见阁下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204784_comment'></div>前日复衣食所迫，求试有司，遂得进谒左右，属宾客盛集，不获荐其区区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204784_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1204784", 1204784, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>方谋</span>继见，而阁下固已得其鄙文于从游之间，伏蒙猥赐荐宠，以为可教，亦如诸公所云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204784_comment'></div>某于是自决不疑，益知前志之不谬，俗议之不足恤，而古人为可信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204784_comment'></div>古之人有立行著书而举世莫或知者，犹业之如故，以俟后之君子，况不至于是者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204784_comment'></div>天不为人恶寒而辍其冬，地不为人恶险而易其广，君子不以小人之匈匈而易其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204784_comment'></div>某虽不肖，窃诵此久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204784_comment'></div>自摈弃以来，尤自刻励，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1204784", 1204784, "Clauses/76/Comments/0")'>深居简出</span>，几不与世人相通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204784_comment'></div>独念昨出都时，会阁下在告，私怀惓惓，有所未毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204784_comment'></div>适有西行之便，故复略而陈之，并以近所为诗文合七篇献诸执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204784_comment'></div>伏惟阁下道德文章，为一时君子之所望，鄙陋之迹，固已获进于前日矣，宜更赐指教，水导而木植之，使驽骖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1204784", 1204784, "Clauses/91/Comments/0")'>蹇服</span>，知所趋向，不缪于先进之迹，亦君子乐育人材之义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204784_comment'></div>惟深赐怜察，幸甚幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1204784_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　秋深，有诗寄震、鼎二弟；又有诗送僧归杭之保宁禅院，作如越省亲之计，然未成行。作品：送僧归保宁（西湖环岩皆招提）<div id='poem_199614' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199614' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199614?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送僧归保宁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199614")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199614_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199614'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199614'>西湖环岸<span class='inlineComment2'>（各本作绕）</span>皆招提，楼阁晦明如卧披。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199614_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199614'>保宁复在最佳处，水光四合无端倪。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199614_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199614'>车尘不来马足断，时有海月相因依。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199614_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199614'>上人弱龄已隶此<span class='inlineComment2'>（原作比，据文本、四库本改）</span>，心目所證惟瑰琦。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199614_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199614'>白玉芙蓉出清沼，天然不受缁尘扰。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199614_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199614'>坐客一语不入意，目如明星视飞鸟。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199614_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199614'>冠切云兮佩玉难<span class='inlineComment2'>（《四部备要》本作环）</span>，上人顾之真等闲。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199614_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199614'>应缘聊入人间世，兴尽却归湖上山。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199614_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199614'>伊余久欲窥禹穴，矧今仲父官东越。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199614_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199614'>行挽秋风入剡溪，为君先醉西湖月。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199614_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199614'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_199614_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　秋试不售，退居高邮，杜门却扫，以诗书自娱，有秋兴九首，拟韩退之、孟郊、韦应物、李贺、李白、玉川子、杜子美、杜牧之、白乐天。刘公干一诗，亦似作于是时。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年冬</a>　冬日，得苏辙书，作与苏辙第一简。作品：与苏子由著作第一简。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年冬</a>　冬后，作与苏辙第二简，以幽兰自赏，对熙宁间所倡之新书有微词；并致古诗一首述慕望之情。子由次韵，以千里马相许。作品：与苏子由著作第二简。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年10月</a>　冬十月五日，苏轼为秦观汤泉赋题跋。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年12月</a>　岁暮，参寥至自徐州，得苏轼书，作简覆之，诉其不遇之情。作品：与苏公先生简一。<div id='poem_1204771' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204771' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204771?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与苏先生简<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204771")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204771_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204771'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204771'>某顿首再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204771_comment'></div>去冬伏奉所赐教，旋又李献甫过此，甚得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204771", 1204771, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>兴居</span>之详，欣慰何可胜言！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204771_comment'></div>寻欲上状，而区区之情，欲布于左右者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204771_comment'></div>一日复一日，人事无间断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204771_comment'></div>而自春已来，尤复扰扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204771_comment'></div>家叔自会稽得替，便道取疾入京改官，令某侍大父还高邮，又安厝亡婶灵柩在扬州，且买地，趁今冬举葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204771_comment'></div>入夏，又为诸弟辈学时文应举，而家叔至今虽已改官，尚滞京师未还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204771_comment'></div>老幼夏间多疾病，更遇岁饥，聚族四十口，食不足，终日忽忽无聊赖，本欲作书详道，至今不果，甚可笑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204771_comment'></div>想公当悉此意矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204771_comment'></div>即日初寒，伏惟尊候万福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204771_comment'></div>前得所赐书，承用道家方士之言，自冬至后，屏去人事，室居四十九日乃出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204771_comment'></div>又李漕传到《成都大慈宝藏记》文，诵书读记，想见公超然逸举于形骸埃𡏖之外，虽欲从之，不可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204771_comment'></div>辱诲谕，且令勉彊科举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204771_comment'></div>如某者，实无所有，岂敢求异于时？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204771_comment'></div>但长年颇惭，为儿女子所嗤笑耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204771_comment'></div>得公书，重以亲老之命，颇自摧折，不复如向来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1204771", 1204771, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>简慢</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204771_comment'></div>尽取今人所谓时文者读之，意谓亦不甚难及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204771_comment'></div>试就其体作数首，辄有见推可者，因以应书，遂亦蒙见录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204771_comment'></div>今复加工，如求应举时矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204771_comment'></div>但恐南省所取又不同，傥只如此，恐十有一二可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204771_comment'></div>前寄呈乱道，继亦作得十数篇，未敢附上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204771_comment'></div>子骏以公言，顾遇甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204771_comment'></div>尝令作《扬州集序》，并辩才法师见嘱作《龙井记》，言师嘱作《雪斋记》，二记皆黄鲁直为书，已刻成，尚未寄到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204771_comment'></div>今且录草去，因便却乞并此书转致高安先生处，幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204771_comment'></div>子骏以保任不当，罢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204771_comment'></div>莘老复固辞不来此，亦是无聊一事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204771_comment'></div>莘老云有两书托公择寄去，不知曾有书去否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204771_comment'></div>渠云非求答，但欲知达否尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204771_comment'></div>昨过此不多日，然相聚甚款，未尝无一日不数十次及公昆仲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204771_comment'></div>虽不求扬州，为公作黄楼主人，亦是吾党中一段佳事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204771_comment'></div>某来岁东归时，庶几到徐见之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204771_comment'></div>黄鲁直去年过此，出所为文，尤非昔时所见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204771_comment'></div>其为人亦称是，真所谓豪杰间出之士也，但恨去速，不得与之从容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204771_comment'></div>参寥在阿育王山琏老处，极得所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1204771_comment'></div>比亦有书来，昨云已断吟诗，闻说后来已复破戒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1204771_comment'></div>某数日间便西行，未缘侍坐，伏乞与时自重，下慰瞻依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1204771_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1204771_comment'></div>某再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1204771_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年12月</a>　未几，黄楼赋成，寄呈徐州苏轼，并有简，乞赐书芙蓉城诗。苏为诗以谢，称秦观有屈宋之才。作品：黄楼赋。与苏公先生简二。<div id='poem_1204698' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204698' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204698?labeling=true' target='_blank'>黄楼赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204698")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204698_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204698'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204698'>太守苏公守彭城之明年，既治河决之变，民以更生，又因修缮其城，作黄楼于东门之上，以为水受制于土，而土之色黄，故取名焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204698_comment'></div>楼成，使其客高邮秦观赋之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204698_comment'></div>其词曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1204698'>惟黄楼之瑰玮兮，冠雉堞之左方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204698_comment'></div>挟光晷以横出兮，干云气而上征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204698_comment'></div>既要眇以有度兮，又洞达而无旁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204698_comment'></div>斥丹雘而不御兮，爰取法乎中央。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204698_comment'></div>列千山而环峙兮，交二水而旁奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204698_comment'></div>冈陵奋其攫拿兮，溪谷效其吐吞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204698_comment'></div>览形势之四塞兮，识诸雄之所存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204698_comment'></div>意天作以遗公兮，慰平日之忧勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204698_comment'></div>繄大河之初决兮，狂流漫而稽天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204698_comment'></div>御扶摇以东下兮，纷万马而争前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204698_comment'></div>象罔出而侮人兮，螭蜃过而垂涎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204698_comment'></div>微精诚之所贯兮，几孤墉之不全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204698_comment'></div>偷朝夕以昧远兮，固前识之所羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204698_comment'></div>虑异日之或然兮，复厌之以兹楼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204698_comment'></div>时不可以骤得兮，姑从容而浮游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204698_comment'></div>傥登临之信美兮，又何必乎故丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204698_comment'></div>觞酒醪以为寿兮，旅殽核以为仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204698_comment'></div>俨云髾以侍侧兮，笑言乐而忘时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204698_comment'></div>发<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1204698", 1204698, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>哀弹</span>与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1204698", 1204698, "Clauses/47/Comments/1")'>豪吹</span>兮，飞鸟起而参差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204698_comment'></div>怅所思之迟暮兮，缀明月而成词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204698_comment'></div>噫变故之相诡兮，犹传马之更驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204698_comment'></div>昔何负而遑遽兮，今何暇而遨嬉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204698_comment'></div>岂造物之莫诏兮，惟元元之自贻？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204698_comment'></div>将苦逸之有数兮，畴工拙之能为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204698_comment'></div>韪哲人之知其故兮，蹈夷险而皆宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204698_comment'></div>视蚊虻之过前兮，曾不介乎心思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204698_comment'></div>正余冠之崔嵬兮，服余佩之焜煌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204698_comment'></div>从公于斯楼兮，聊裴回以徜徉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1204698_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204771' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204771' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204771?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与苏先生简<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204771")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204771_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204771'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204771'>某顿首再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204771_comment'></div>去冬伏奉所赐教，旋又李献甫过此，甚得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204771", 1204771, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>兴居</span>之详，欣慰何可胜言！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204771_comment'></div>寻欲上状，而区区之情，欲布于左右者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204771_comment'></div>一日复一日，人事无间断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204771_comment'></div>而自春已来，尤复扰扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204771_comment'></div>家叔自会稽得替，便道取疾入京改官，令某侍大父还高邮，又安厝亡婶灵柩在扬州，且买地，趁今冬举葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204771_comment'></div>入夏，又为诸弟辈学时文应举，而家叔至今虽已改官，尚滞京师未还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204771_comment'></div>老幼夏间多疾病，更遇岁饥，聚族四十口，食不足，终日忽忽无聊赖，本欲作书详道，至今不果，甚可笑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204771_comment'></div>想公当悉此意矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204771_comment'></div>即日初寒，伏惟尊候万福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204771_comment'></div>前得所赐书，承用道家方士之言，自冬至后，屏去人事，室居四十九日乃出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204771_comment'></div>又李漕传到《成都大慈宝藏记》文，诵书读记，想见公超然逸举于形骸埃𡏖之外，虽欲从之，不可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204771_comment'></div>辱诲谕，且令勉彊科举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204771_comment'></div>如某者，实无所有，岂敢求异于时？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204771_comment'></div>但长年颇惭，为儿女子所嗤笑耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204771_comment'></div>得公书，重以亲老之命，颇自摧折，不复如向来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1204771", 1204771, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>简慢</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204771_comment'></div>尽取今人所谓时文者读之，意谓亦不甚难及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204771_comment'></div>试就其体作数首，辄有见推可者，因以应书，遂亦蒙见录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204771_comment'></div>今复加工，如求应举时矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204771_comment'></div>但恐南省所取又不同，傥只如此，恐十有一二可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204771_comment'></div>前寄呈乱道，继亦作得十数篇，未敢附上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204771_comment'></div>子骏以公言，顾遇甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204771_comment'></div>尝令作《扬州集序》，并辩才法师见嘱作《龙井记》，言师嘱作《雪斋记》，二记皆黄鲁直为书，已刻成，尚未寄到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204771_comment'></div>今且录草去，因便却乞并此书转致高安先生处，幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204771_comment'></div>子骏以保任不当，罢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204771_comment'></div>莘老复固辞不来此，亦是无聊一事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204771_comment'></div>莘老云有两书托公择寄去，不知曾有书去否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204771_comment'></div>渠云非求答，但欲知达否尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204771_comment'></div>昨过此不多日，然相聚甚款，未尝无一日不数十次及公昆仲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204771_comment'></div>虽不求扬州，为公作黄楼主人，亦是吾党中一段佳事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204771_comment'></div>某来岁东归时，庶几到徐见之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204771_comment'></div>黄鲁直去年过此，出所为文，尤非昔时所见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204771_comment'></div>其为人亦称是，真所谓豪杰间出之士也，但恨去速，不得与之从容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204771_comment'></div>参寥在阿育王山琏老处，极得所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1204771_comment'></div>比亦有书来，昨云已断吟诗，闻说后来已复破戒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1204771_comment'></div>某数日间便西行，未缘侍坐，伏乞与时自重，下慰瞻依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1204771_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1204771_comment'></div>某再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1204771_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年12月</a>　是时，秦观以高邮土物致苏轼，并有诗。作品：寄莼姜法鱼糟蟹黄寄子瞻诗（鲜鲫经年渍醽醁）<div id='poem_199643' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199643' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199643?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄莼姜法鱼糟蟹<span class='inlineComment2'>（寄子瞻）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199643")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199643_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199643'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199643'>鲜鲫经年渍醽醁，团脐紫蟹脂填腹。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199643'>后春莼茁滑于酥，先社姜芽肥胜肉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199643_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年12月</a>　岁暮，代参寥子作与钟公实启。<div id='poem_1204759' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204759' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_1204759'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204759'>伏承较艺数奇，献书遇合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204759_comment'></div>起家戎幕，受职儒宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204759_comment'></div>荣动一时，宠踰三舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204759_comment'></div>伏惟欢庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204759_comment'></div>窃以文高徐乐，才赡马周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204759_comment'></div>性理内融，事机旁照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204759_comment'></div>扣角负鼎，无羡昔人；<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年12月</a>　秦观有医者及赠医者邹放二诗，当作于熙宁元丰之间。作品：医者（块然一气初浑沦）赠医者邹放（百工皆圣作）<div id='poem_199545' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199545' </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199545")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199545_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199545'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199545'>块然一气初浑沦，散作六物相吐吞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199545'>主承客御胜复存，是为万物疾病原。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199545'>寥寥空陂游冤魂，诲此法术成轩辕。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199545'>金书玉册要不烦，焕如星宿不可扪。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年1月</a>　春正月，秦观作五百罗汉图记。<div id='poem_1204900' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204900' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204900")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204900_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204900'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204900'>《五百罗汉图》一轴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204900_comment'></div>入定于龛中者一人，荫树趺坐而说法者一人，左右侍听者八人，说经者六人，课经者六人，课已而收经、与诵而倚杖者各一人，环坐指画而议论者、麈挥手、杖支颐、相向而谈者各六人，归依宝塔者五人，和南合座者六人，稽首舍利光者八人，饭饿鬼者四人，食乌鸢者、施鱼鳖者各五人，云升者六人，指现五色光者、钵现白光者、泉涌于顶者、火燃于踵者、袒而洗耳、金环手随求而立者各一人，受斋请者七人，受龙女珠献者六人，受两猊花献者四人，受往生花献者七人，受衣冠从三牛谒者五人，受胡输赆者七人，受胡从两橐驼而致琛者四人，受海神跪宝者五人，骑龙者、跨虎者、乘马者、象驾者、狮子驭者各三人，为犀说法者一人，后座者三人，植锡而坐巨蟒上者一人，背树瞩山鹊者六人，注猱升者、仰凤集者、阅麋鹿者各四人，俛伏羱者、玩舞鹤者各五人，撷菡萏者一人，从后者五人，书蕉叶者五人，持蕉叶而涉笔者二人，焚香而茗饮者六人，临流而涤钵者三人，涤已而持归者一人，浣衣者、就树绞衣者、浣已而归者、将浣而进者、隔岸而觇者各一人，洗屦者、后洗而纳屦者、振衣而去者各一人，削发者、为削发者、沐而待者、解衣者、既解收衣者各一人，补毳者二人，操刀尺者一人，治线者三人，泉涌于石、远近而观者十六人，度石梁者三人，欲度者四人，行杖锡者二人，导者二人，赞者三人，芒屩担簦而归者三人，束装而行者一人，或坐、或行、或立、跏趺、款欠、杖柱、笠负、数珠、白绋、山曲水隈涂觏而卒遇者十八辈，合一百二十有三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204900_comment'></div>或坐、或行、或立、背楼观、凭栏楯、据危迫险、俛瞰仰睇、直视转盼、侧睨旁顾、近相目、远相望者二十八辈，合一百三十九人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204900_comment'></div>凡罗汉五百人，而佛处其中焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204900_comment'></div>佛之旁又有宝冠珠络、持如意、执莲花、座猊象者菩萨二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204900_comment'></div>右袒、徒跣、曲拳、和南而后侍者弟子十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204900_comment'></div>瞻赞而前谒者十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204900_comment'></div>甲胄、椎髻、挺剑、秉钺立左右者善神二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204900_comment'></div>别三十有一焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204900_comment'></div>又童子有抱经室、主茶奁、荷策、持瓶、典汤、彻器，凡十有六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204900_comment'></div>鬼有驭龙、驭马象、受施食、送斋书、鳞身鸟咮、衣短后、隐树而窥者，凡十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204900_comment'></div>杂人物有白衣胡跪献花香珍怪、衣冠而谒、驱牛以从、载犀象、挈筐篚而进、被甲服弓矢、愕而瞻叹者，凡十有九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204900_comment'></div>鸟兽有凤、鹤、鹊、乌、龙、虎、犀、象、师子、马、牛、橐驼、蟠蟒、戏猊、猿猱，大小四十有三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204900_comment'></div>然以罗汉为主，故号《五百罗汉图》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204900_comment'></div>世传吴僧法能之所作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204900_comment'></div>笔画虽不甚精绝，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1204900", 1204900, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>情韵</span>风趣，各有所得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204900_comment'></div>其绵密委曲，可谓至矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204900_comment'></div>昔戴逵常画佛像，而自隐于帐中，人有所臧否，辄窃听而随改之，积数年而就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204900_comment'></div>余意法能亦当研思若此，然后可成，非率然而为之决也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204900_comment'></div>余家既世崇佛氏，又尝览韩文公《画记》，爱其善叙事，该而不烦缛，详而有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1204900", 1204900, "Clauses/90/Comments/0")'>轨律</span>，读其文恍然如即其画，心窃慕焉，于是仿其遗意，取罗汉佛之像而记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204900_comment'></div>顾余文之陋，岂能使人读之如即其画哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204900_comment'></div>姑致叙之私意云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204900_comment'></div>元丰二年正月十五日弟子秦某记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1204900_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年春</a>　春，作次韵参寥三首。作品：次韵参寥三首（武陵渔子入花源；长安仕路与云齐；且折花枝醉复醒）<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年春</a>　秦观有春日杂兴二首，抒失意之情。作品：春日杂兴其三（潭潭故邑井）；其五（东方有美人）<div id='poem_199590' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199590' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_8_199590_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年春</a>　春初，秦观深居简出，闭门读书，得苏轼自徐所寄诗书、苏辙自南京所寄黄楼赋。作简覆苏轼，谓懋诚集引寻已付邵君刻石。作品：与苏公先生简三。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年春</a>　时秦观家居，钱节每与参寥子、徐子思兄弟相过从，浩歌剧饮，白眼视礼法士。节补官嘉禾，作序送之。后有诗，忆及此一时期生活。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='poem_sentence_2_199670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199670'>得亭真从寂寞间，卓古高标压群丑。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199670'>不须辨直致湘江，便觉满窗凉意透。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199670'>挺然叶节抱风孤，顿应君子虚心受。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199670'>雷迸箨龙龙欲走，樱笋纷纷徒适口。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年3月</a>　寒食前，苏辙因以现任为兄轼赎罪，贬监筠州酒税，过高邮，秦观相从两日，送至邵伯埭，有诗唱和，并托辙携书致其兄轼。作品：次韵子由召伯埭见别三首（孤篷短榜溯河流；青荧灯火照深更；冠盖纷纷不我谋）<div id='poem_199267' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199267' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199267?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵子由召伯埭见别三首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>牢愁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199267_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199267'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_199267_comment'></div></div><div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199266' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199266?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span
