id='poem_sentence_0_199266'>青荧灯火照深更，逐客舟航冷似冰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199266_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199266'>到处故应山作主，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_199266", 199266, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>随方</span>还有月为朋。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199266_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199266'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_199266_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199265' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199265' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199265?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年3月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_199265_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199265'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199265'>冠盖纷纷不我谋，掩关聊与古人游。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199265_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199265'>会须匹马淮西去，云巘风溪遂所求。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199265_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199265'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_199265_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='9426c561336d4a18b7f9bc2a58671211_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9426c561336d4a18b7f9bc2a58671211");'><span id='9426c561336d4a18b7f9bc2a58671211_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1081')">1080-1081年</a>，32-33岁</div><div id='9426c561336d4a18b7f9bc2a58671211' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年3月</a>　春，有和黄法曹忆建溪梅花诗，参寥、苏轼、苏辙皆和之，后王安石书于纨扇，黄庭坚书于花光梅树图。作品：和黄法曹忆建溪梅花（海陵参军不枯槁）<div id='poem_199569' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199569' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199569?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和黄法曹忆建溪梅花</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199569")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199569_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199569'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199569'>海陵参军不枯槁，醉忆梅花愁绝倒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199569'>为怜一树傍寒溪，花水多情自相恼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199569'>清泪班班知有恨，恨春相逢苦不早。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199569'>甘心结子待君来，洗雨梳风为谁好。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199569'>谁云广平心似铁，不惜珠玑与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_199569", 199569, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>挥扫</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199569'>月没<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_199569", 199569, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>参横</span>画角哀，暗香销尽令人老。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199569'>天分四时不相贷，孤芳转盼同衰草。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199569'>要须健步远移归，乱插繁华向晴昊。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199569'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_199569_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年4月</a>　四月，为杭州法惠院僧法言作雪斋记。<div id='poem_1204901' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204901' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204901?labeling=true' target='_blank'>雪斋记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204901")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204901_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204901'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204901'>雪斋者，杭州法会院言师所居室之东轩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204901_comment'></div>始，言师开此轩，汲水以为池，累石以为小山，又洒粉于峰峦草木之上，以象飞雪之集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204901_comment'></div>州倅太史苏公过而爱之，以为事虽类儿嬉，而意趣甚妙，有可以发人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1204901", 1204901, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>佳兴</span>者，为名曰雪斋而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204901_comment'></div>后四年，公为彭城，复命郡从事毕君景儒篆其名，并自作诗以寄之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204901_comment'></div>于是雪斋之名，浸有闻于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204901_comment'></div>士大夫喜幽寻而乐胜选者，过杭而不至，则以为恨焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204901_comment'></div>杭大州也，外带涛江涨海之险，内抱湖山竹林之胜，其俗工巧，羞质朴而尚靡丽，且事佛为最勤，故佛之宫室，棋布于境中者，殆千有馀区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204901_comment'></div>其登览宴游之地，不可胜计，然独不至雪斋，则人以为恨，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204901_comment'></div>盖公之才豪于天下，斥其弃馀以为词章字画者，亦皆绝妙一时，读而玩之，使人超然有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1204901", 1204901, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>孤举</span>远擢之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204901_comment'></div>是斋虽褊小，无足取称于人，而公所书诗，实在其壁，士大夫过杭，而不能一至其地以寓目焉，是岂所谓喜幽寻而乐胜选者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204901_comment'></div>以为恨焉宜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204901_comment'></div>昔李约得萧子云飞白大书「萧」字，持归东洛，遂号所寘亭为萧斋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204901_comment'></div>余谓后之君子，将有闻雪斋之风，不可得而见者矣，岂特为今日之贵耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204901_comment'></div>言师名法言，字无择，泊然萧洒人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204901_comment'></div>盖能作雪斋，从苏太史游，则不问可知其为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204901_comment'></div>元丰三年四月十五日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1204901_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年夏、秋</a>　入夏，得中暑疾，秋复转剧，为伤寒症，有遣疟鬼文及病中、秋夜病起怀端叔作诗寄之二诗。作品：遣疟鬼文。与孙莘老学士简。病中（疏帘薄幔对青灯）秋夜病起怀端叔作诗寄之（寝瘵当老秋）<div id='poem_1204973' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204973' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204973?labeling=true' target='_blank'>遣疟鬼文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年夏、秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204973")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204973_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204973'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204973'>邗沟处士秋得痎疟之疾，发以景中，起于毛端，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1204973", 1204973, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>伸欠</span>乃作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204973_comment'></div>其始也，凄风转雨，洒然薄人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204973_comment'></div>其少进也，如冱壑阴崖，单衣犯雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204973_comment'></div>龟穹蠖屈，奄奄欲绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204973_comment'></div>寒威既替，热复大来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204973_comment'></div>毕方媒毒，回禄嗣灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204973_comment'></div>躁外渴中，卧已复兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204973_comment'></div>欲挟斗杓，东适浡澥，酌以注嗌，未足为快。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204973_comment'></div>徂酉尽戌，淟然沾汗，然后乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204973_comment'></div>于是处士乃澡心虑，斥聪明，枕石藉茅，偃于洞房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204973_comment'></div>疲极而寐，梦五鬼物，异服丑形，朱丹其发，运斤鼓橐，縻绠注缶，挥以大箑，跳踉而进，曰：「嘻，良苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204973_comment'></div>惟子昔年，学道名山，把握风雷，与斗争威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204973_comment'></div>吏兵云屯，使者火驰，呼吸元气，悬鬼以嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204973_comment'></div>我属蓄忿，怒候间隙之日久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204973_comment'></div>孰为尔来，荒唐是师，跅𧿇是友，果于自为，横心肆口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204973_comment'></div>随世上下，金镕木楺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204973_comment'></div>尝于禁戒，隳灭应手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204973_comment'></div>交亲指议，传笑十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204973_comment'></div>而子岸然，恬不为丑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204973_comment'></div>我属缘是，得而甘心焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204973_comment'></div>于是处士惊遽，若失所以对者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204973_comment'></div>众鬼大笑，处士叱之曰：「来，汝鬼物，向吾示汝神明之机，天收其武，地藏其文，七纬十精，亡失光耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204973_comment'></div>而汝朋俦，漫不复省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204973_comment'></div>瞽矇之前，藻绘徒施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204973_comment'></div>叩宫流徵，而瞆者勿知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204973_comment'></div>尝以为未然，乃今信之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204973_comment'></div>蹇吾妙龄，志于幽玄，明师我违，以溺奇偏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204973_comment'></div>疑信相寇，于兹有年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204973_comment'></div>披收氛雾，乃睹青天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204973_comment'></div>樊然故艺，一夕弃捐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204973_comment'></div>饫食酣寝，以还本源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204973_comment'></div>若夫嫔御如云，珍货山积，后房弹吹，秀色可食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204973_comment'></div>马有副，车有二，人所同好，吾亦勿避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204973_comment'></div>久宦无成，家徒壁立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1204973_comment'></div>弹剑而哦，援琴自慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1204973_comment'></div>风埃蓝缕，儿女所羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1204973_comment'></div>人所共恶，吾亦勿求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1204973_comment'></div>好恶我无与天下俱，故造物之父与吾并驾而游，固非汝曹知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1204973_comment'></div>嗟汝鬼物，亦道之孙，经纬星辰，启阴闭阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1204973_comment'></div>何独迷缪，自丧耿光？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1204973_comment'></div>依凭草木，为此不祥」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1204973_comment'></div>于是众鬼相视失色，涕泗交颐，呿而不合，悔其所为，稽首再拜，称弟子而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1204973_comment'></div>处士寤，亦失厥疾矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1204973_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204774' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204774' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204774?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与孙莘老学士简</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年夏、秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204774")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204774_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204774'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204774'>某顿首，司谏学士丈丈：屡奉所赐教，诲慰殷勤，虽父兄之于子弟，无以过此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204774_comment'></div>仰荷盛意，不复胜言，幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204774_comment'></div>比日伏惟镇抚馀暇，尊候万福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204774_comment'></div>某自入夏，得中暑疾，去之不时，至秋遂大作，伏枕馀月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204774_comment'></div>今虽少间，而疲顿非常，气息仅属，人事殆废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204774_comment'></div>起居之问，旷然不进于下尘，职此之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204774_comment'></div>前书闻姨婆县君服药甚久，徐氏弟兄及妻子皆忧挠，不知所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204774_comment'></div>近闻得僧法宾者，调治已平，可胜忻慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204774_comment'></div>南方险远，风气固非人所安，然丈丈行已二年，北归之期甚近，更善调护数月，即达中州矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204774_comment'></div>越州祖父，得书甚安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204774_comment'></div>顷蒙教以先至会稽，迎侍祖父还家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204774_comment'></div>家叔径入都，甚荷留意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204774_comment'></div>已封所赐教，取禀于越州矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204774_comment'></div>苏黄州虽不得书，然昨苏子由著作过此，及南来士大夫具云，在黄甚能自处，了不以迁谪介意，日但杜门蔬食，诵经读书而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204774_comment'></div>昔之论者常患其才高太锐，今日之事，尤足以成其盛德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204774_comment'></div>前日辱齿及乱道，诲喻尤详，某虽不肖，请终身诵之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204774_comment'></div>自越归后，颇无事，幸不废所学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204774_comment'></div>但久去门下，闻见日益昏塞，虽复区区，卒无所得耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204774_comment'></div>诗文数篇，谩录呈左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204774_comment'></div>因风更乞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1204774", 1204774, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>指喻</span>教育之赐，幸甚幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1204774_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199330' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199330' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199330?labeling=true' target='_blank'>病中</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年夏、秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199330")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_199330_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199330'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199330'>疏帘薄幔<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>对青<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>灯，鸲鹆喧喧自转更。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199330_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199330'>风雨渺漫人卧病，地炉汤鼎更悲鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199330_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199330'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_199330_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_199330'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_199330_0'>⑴ 原作慢，据四库本改</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_199330_1'>⑵ 原作清，据张本、四库本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_199330_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_199601' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199601' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199601?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秋夜病起怀端叔作诗寄之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年夏、秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199601")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199601_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199601'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199601'>寝瘵当老秋，入夜庭轩空。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199601_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199601'>天光脆如洗，月色清<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_199601", 199601, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>无缝</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199601_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199601'>风飙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_199601", 199601, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>戾戾</span>轻，露气霏霏重。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199601_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199601'>檐花伴徐步，笼烛窥孤讽。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199601'>夫子淮海英，材大难为用。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199601_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199601'>秉心既绝俗，发语自惊众。<div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199601'>与时真楚越，于我实伯仲。<div id='poem_sentence_10_199601_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_199601'>尔来居邑邻，颇便书札贡。<div id='poem_sentence_13_199601_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_199601'>人生无根柢，泛若凌波葑。<div id='poem_sentence_14_199601_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_199601_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_199601'>彊颜入规模，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_199601", 199601, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>垂耳</span>受<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_199601", 199601, "Clauses/47/Comments/1")'>羁鞚</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_199601_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_199601'>行谋买竿枻，名理就折衷。<div id='poem_sentence_24_199601_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_199601'>但恐狂接舆，烦君更嘲弄。<div id='poem_sentence_25_199601_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_199601'></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_199601_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_199601'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_199601_0'>⑴ 原作拒，据各本改</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_199601_0'>⑵ 下原衍抟字，据各本删</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_20_199601_0'>⑶ 原作复，据各本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_199601_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年秋</a>　秋，黄庭坚自北京教授改知吉州太和县，过高邮，相从两日，为秦观书雪斋记并龙井记寄杭州勒石。庭坚出敝帚、焦尾两编，秦观为之心折。后有书往来。作品：《八音歌》、《次韵子由题斗野亭》、《黄法曹忆建溪梅花》<span class='inlineComment2'>（秦观《与黄鲁直简》云：“《八音歌》、《次韵斗野亭》、《次韵黄子理忆梅花诗》，凡四首，亦随以呈。”简作于元丰三年冬，可知此诗亦作于元丰三年。）</span><div id='poem_199374' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199374' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199374?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵子由题斗野亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199374")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199374_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199374'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199374'>满市花风起，平堤漕水流。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199374'>不堪春解手，更为晚停舟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199374'>古<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>埭天<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_199374", 199374, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>连雁</span>，荒祠木蔽牛。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199374'>杖藜聊复尔，转盼夕烟浮。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199374'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_199374'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_199374_0'>⑴ 张本、四库本作上</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_199374_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_199569' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199569' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199569?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和黄法曹忆建溪梅花</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199569")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199569_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199569'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199569'>海陵参军不枯槁，醉忆梅花愁绝倒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199569'>为怜一树傍寒溪，花水多情自相恼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199569'>清泪班班知有恨，恨春相逢苦不早。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199569'>甘心结子待君来，洗雨梳风为谁好。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199569'>谁云广平心似铁，不惜珠玑与<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_199569", 199569, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>挥扫</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199569'>月没<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_199569", 199569, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>参横</span>画角哀，暗香销尽令人老。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199569'>天分四时不相贷，孤芳转盼同衰草。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199569'>要须健步远移归，乱插繁华向晴昊。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199569'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_199569_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年秋</a>　未几，李端叔自楚如晋陵，过高邮相访，秦观出苏轼龙井题名记跋尾。端叔至金山，有诗寄秦观。作品：与参寥大师简。<div id='poem_1204781' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204781' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204781?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与参寥大师简</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204781")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204781_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204781'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204781'>某顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204781_comment'></div>懒慢滋甚，不奉问几一年，中间屡蒙惠书，赐责亦不加切，参寥师真知我者也，幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204781_comment'></div>仆自去年还家，人事扰扰，所往还者，惟黄子理、子思家兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204781_comment'></div>子思又已分居，困于俗事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204781_comment'></div>彦瞻每行县，辄得数日从游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204781_comment'></div>此外但杜门块处而已，甚无佳兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204781_comment'></div>至秋得伤寒病，甚重，食不下咽者七日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204781_comment'></div>汗后月馀，食粥畏风，如见俗人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204781_comment'></div>事事俱废，皆缘此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204781_comment'></div>比蒙录示黄州书并跋尾，幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204781_comment'></div>观其词意，忧患固未足以干其中，愈令人畏服尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204781_comment'></div>仆所题名，此却无本，烦嘱聪师写一通相寄为望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204781_comment'></div>仍并苏公跋尾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204781_comment'></div>前所寄者，已为端叔彊取去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204781_comment'></div>昨闻苏就移滁州，然未知实耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204781_comment'></div>果然，甚易谋见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204781_comment'></div>盖此去滁才三程，公便可辍四明之游，来此偕往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204781_comment'></div>琅琊山水，亦不减雪窦、天童之胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204781_comment'></div>子由春间过此，相从两日，仆送至南埭而还，后亦未尝得书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204781_comment'></div>渠在扬州淹留甚久，时仆值寒食上冢，故不得往从之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204781_comment'></div>莘老寿安君竟不起，子实遂丁忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204781_comment'></div>远方罹此祸，故殊可伤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204781_comment'></div>传师已闻作司农簿，声闻籍甚，恐旦夕得一美除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204781_comment'></div>公择近亦得书，说秋初尝至汤泉，到寄老庵见显之，恨不与吾侪同此乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204781_comment'></div>显之恐十数日间来此，为十数日之会，今已到天长矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204781_comment'></div>黄鲁直近从此赴太和令，来相访，为留两日，得渠新诗一编，高古妙绝，吾属未有其比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204781_comment'></div>仆顷不自揆，妄欲与之后先而驱，今乃知不及远甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204781_comment'></div>其为人亦放，此盖江南第一等人物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204781_comment'></div>黄诗未有力尽翻去，且录数篇，尝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1204781", 1204781, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>一脔</span>，足知一鼎味也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204781_comment'></div>又为仆手写两记，今封去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204781_comment'></div>如辩才、无择要入石，便可用此摸勒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204781_comment'></div>仆自病起，每把笔如雠，不知何谓，得此公为我书，殊增气也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204781_comment'></div>其字差瘦，更为润色，开时令尽墨为妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204781_comment'></div>中间更未安及不是处，但请就改之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1204781_comment'></div>若开得成，嘱二师各寄数本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1204781_comment'></div>李端叔在楚，音问不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1204781_comment'></div>比如毗陵，过此相见极欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1204781_comment'></div>扬州太守鲜于大夫，蜀人，甚贤有文，仆颇为其延礼，有唱和诗数篇，今录一通去，当一笑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1204781_comment'></div>顷闻公不作诗，有一小诗奉戏，又已复破戒矣，可谓熟处难忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1204781_comment'></div>聪师有书来要字序，仆近日无好意思，明年又应举，方欲就举子学时文，恐未有好言语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1204781_comment'></div>今但为渠取字曰「闻复」，盖取《楞严》所谓「闻复翳根除」者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1204781_comment'></div>钱塘多文士，可求人为作，不必须仆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1204781_comment'></div>蔡彦规已卒关中，今归葬山阳，可伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1204781_comment'></div>朋友彫落如此，独有仆数人朴钝落魄者无恙，又多病，少佳意，人世良可悲耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1204781_comment'></div>何时合并，以尽此怀？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1204781_comment'></div>不宣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1204781_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年秋</a>　仲秋，扬州守鲜于侁生日，秦观作诗贺之。作品：鲜于子骏使君生日（维昔高堂梦）<div id='poem_199481' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199481' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199481?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鲜于子骏使君生日<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作韩驹诗）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199481")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_199481_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199481'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199481'>惟昔高堂梦，熊罴兆吉占。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199481'>气钟西蜀秀，时应仲秋严。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199481'>江汉挥犀尾，风云下笔尖。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199481'>微辞追屈宋，精义到黄炎。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199481'>操履森寒柏，名声耿夜蟾。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199481'>击彊雕鹗健，治剧鸊鹈铦。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199481'>使者旌旄易，将军印绶添。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199481'>鸳鸿随步武，虎豹入韬钤。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199481'>锦覆郎官被<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本、四库本作绶）</span>，彤垂太守襜。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199481'>两行分蜜炬，十里上珠帘。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199481'>礼士常悬榻，诛奸或奋髯。<div id='poem_sentence_10_199481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_199481'>雨堂昏绛帐，风帙乱牙签。<div id='poem_sentence_11_199481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_199481'>银汉星初换，金茎露已沾。<div id='poem_sentence_12_199481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_199481'>欢声连北固，寿邑亘东渐。<div id='poem_sentence_15_199481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_199481'>贱子真殊幸，清标获屡觇。<div id='poem_sentence_16_199481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_199481'>误蒙雕朽木，猥辱画无盐。<div id='poem_sentence_17_199481_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_199481'>嘉运方熙洽，英才岂滞淹。<div id='poem_sentence_20_199481'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_199481_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年秋</a>　秋，有诗和王观琵琶梦。作品：和王通叟琵琶梦（鶗鴂鸣时众芳歇）<div id='poem_199564' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199564' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199564?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和王通叟琵琶梦</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_sentence_1_199564'>风惊玉露不成圆，一夜芙蕖泣秋月。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199564_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199564'>金纹捍面紫檀槽，曾抱花前送<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_3_199564'>庾郎江令费珠璧，小砑红笺挥兔毫。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199564_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199564'>风流云散令人瘦，忍看曲尘昏<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_6_199564_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年11月</a>　冬十一月，得苏轼书，勉以作文应举，并嘱代转与李端叔书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年11月</a>　本月，又有与李德叟简。<div id='poem_1204778' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204778' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204778?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与李德叟简</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204778")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204778_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204778'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204778'>某顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204778_comment'></div>昨得递中所寄书，甚慰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204778", 1204778, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>驰仰</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204778_comment'></div>寻欲作报，会得伤寒疾，甚重，不食七八日，伏枕又踰月乃平，遂因循至此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204778_comment'></div>黄鲁直去，必能道所以然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204778_comment'></div>岁莫苦寒，伏惟奉养吉庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204778_comment'></div>某去年除日还自会稽，乡里交朋，皆出仕宦，所与游者无一二人，杜门独居，日益寡陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204778_comment'></div>秋间本欲一至黄州，因过舒奉见，不意遭此疾病，遂不能远去亲侧，颇负平时区区之意，夫复何言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204778_comment'></div>别后所论著想甚多，殊不寄一二，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204778_comment'></div>然观所枉书，词翰妙绝，足以知他皆准此矣，仰服仰服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204778_comment'></div>鲁直过此，为留两日，虽匆遽不尽所怀，然有益于人多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204778_comment'></div>其《弊帚》、《焦尾》两编，文章高古，邈然有二汉之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204778_comment'></div>今时交游中，以文墨自业者，未见其比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204778_comment'></div>所谓珠玉在傍，觉人形秽，信此言也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204778_comment'></div>未缘展奉，愿与时自重，慰此驰情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204778_comment'></div>十一月十五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204778_comment'></div>不宣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1204778_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年</a>　是岁，蔡彦规殁于关中，归葬山阳，秦观作次韵徐仲车见寄以抒哀思。作品：次韵酬徐仲车见寄（渭清非胜泾）哭彦规七首。<div id='poem_199538' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199538' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199538?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵酬徐仲车见寄</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199538")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199538_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199538'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199538'>渭清非胜泾，兰芳本无慕。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199538_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199538'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199538_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年</a>　秦观有寄题卢君斗斋、题五柳亭二诗，皆与山阳有关，因系于本年。作品：寄题卢君斗斋（侠气轩轩翰墨场）题五柳亭（结构依流水）<div id='poem_199646' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199646' </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199646")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199646_comment'></div><div href='/Writing/199672?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题五柳亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年</a>　是岁，有简与福州孙觉，并以诗文数篇录呈。作品：与孙莘老学士简。<div id='poem_1204774' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204774' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204774?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与孙莘老学士简</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年夏、秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204774")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204774_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204774'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204774'>某顿首，司谏学士丈丈：屡奉所赐教，诲慰殷勤，虽父兄之于子弟，无以过此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204774_comment'></div>仰荷盛意，不复胜言，幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204774_comment'></div>比日伏惟镇抚馀暇，尊候万福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204774_comment'></div>某自入夏，得中暑疾，去之不时，至秋遂大作，伏枕馀月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204774_comment'></div>今虽少间，而疲顿非常，气息仅属，人事殆废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204774_comment'></div>起居之问，旷然不进于下尘，职此之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204774_comment'></div>前书闻姨婆县君服药甚久，徐氏弟兄及妻子皆忧挠，不知所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204774_comment'></div>近闻得僧法宾者，调治已平，可胜忻慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204774_comment'></div>南方险远，风气固非人所安，然丈丈行已二年，北归之期甚近，更善调护数月，即达中州矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204774_comment'></div>越州祖父，得书甚安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204774_comment'></div>顷蒙教以先至会稽，迎侍祖父还家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204774_comment'></div>家叔径入都，甚荷留意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204774_comment'></div>已封所赐教，取禀于越州矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204774_comment'></div>苏黄州虽不得书，然昨苏子由著作过此，及南来士大夫具云，在黄甚能自处，了不以迁谪介意，日但杜门蔬食，诵经读书而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204774_comment'></div>昔之论者常患其才高太锐，今日之事，尤足以成其盛德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204774_comment'></div>前日辱齿及乱道，诲喻尤详，某虽不肖，请终身诵之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204774_comment'></div>自越归后，颇无事，幸不废所学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204774_comment'></div>但久去门下，闻见日益昏塞，虽复区区，卒无所得耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204774_comment'></div>诗文数篇，谩录呈左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204774_comment'></div>因风更乞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1204774", 1204774, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>指喻</span>教育之赐，幸甚幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1204774_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　春，李之仪在毗陵，秦观有书，又曾以黄庭坚诗示之仪。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　秦，叔父秦定改官，秦观至会稽迎大父承议公还高邮，又安厝亡婶于扬州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　春，李琮来淮南，为秦观道东坡兴居之详，并传到东坡大慈宝藏记文。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年夏</a>　夏，与觏、觌两弟学时文，以求应举。家人贫病交迫。有与苏黄州简。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年夏</a>　孙莘老自福州徙知徐州，过高邮时与秦观相聚甚款。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年6月</a>　六月，俞充卒于环庆，秦观有挽词哀之。作品：俞公达待制挽词二首（词场英妙气如虹；一麾出守著威名）<div id='poem_199425' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199425' class='poemTitle ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年冬</a>　冬十月，有简寄黄州苏轼，谓将入京应举。作品：与苏公先生简四。<div id='poem_1204771' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204771' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204771?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与苏先生简<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204771")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204771_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204771'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204771'>某顿首再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204771_comment'></div>去冬伏奉所赐教，旋又李献甫过此，甚得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204771", 1204771, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>兴居</span>之详，欣慰何可胜言！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204771_comment'></div>寻欲上状，而区区之情，欲布于左右者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204771_comment'></div>一日复一日，人事无间断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204771_comment'></div>而自春已来，尤复扰扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204771_comment'></div>家叔自会稽得替，便道取疾入京改官，令某侍大父还高邮，又安厝亡婶灵柩在扬州，且买地，趁今冬举葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204771_comment'></div>入夏，又为诸弟辈学时文应举，而家叔至今虽已改官，尚滞京师未还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204771_comment'></div>老幼夏间多疾病，更遇岁饥，聚族四十口，食不足，终日忽忽无聊赖，本欲作书详道，至今不果，甚可笑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204771_comment'></div>想公当悉此意矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204771_comment'></div>即日初寒，伏惟尊候万福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204771_comment'></div>前得所赐书，承用道家方士之言，自冬至后，屏去人事，室居四十九日乃出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204771_comment'></div>又李漕传到《成都大慈宝藏记》文，诵书读记，想见公超然逸举于形骸埃𡏖之外，虽欲从之，不可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204771_comment'></div>辱诲谕，且令勉彊科举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204771_comment'></div>如某者，实无所有，岂敢求异于时？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204771_comment'></div>但长年颇惭，为儿女子所嗤笑耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204771_comment'></div>得公书，重以亲老之命，颇自摧折，不复如向来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1204771", 1204771, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>简慢</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204771_comment'></div>尽取今人所谓时文者读之，意谓亦不甚难及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204771_comment'></div>试就其体作数首，辄有见推可者，因以应书，遂亦蒙见录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204771_comment'></div>今复加工，如求应举时矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204771_comment'></div>但恐南省所取又不同，傥只如此，恐十有一二可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204771_comment'></div>前寄呈乱道，继亦作得十数篇，未敢附上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204771_comment'></div>子骏以公言，顾遇甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204771_comment'></div>尝令作《扬州集序》，并辩才法师见嘱作《龙井记》，言师嘱作《雪斋记》，二记皆黄鲁直为书，已刻成，尚未寄到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204771_comment'></div>今且录草去，因便却乞并此书转致高安先生处，幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204771_comment'></div>子骏以保任不当，罢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204771_comment'></div>莘老复固辞不来此，亦是无聊一事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204771_comment'></div>莘老云有两书托公择寄去，不知曾有书去否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204771_comment'></div>渠云非求答，但欲知达否尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204771_comment'></div>昨过此不多日，然相聚甚款，未尝无一日不数十次及公昆仲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204771_comment'></div>虽不求扬州，为公作黄楼主人，亦是吾党中一段佳事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204771_comment'></div>某来岁东归时，庶几到徐见之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204771_comment'></div>黄鲁直去年过此，出所为文，尤非昔时所见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204771_comment'></div>其为人亦称是，真所谓豪杰间出之士也，但恨去速，不得与之从容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204771_comment'></div>参寥在阿育王山琏老处，极得所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1204771_comment'></div>比亦有书来，昨云已断吟诗，闻说后来已复破戒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1204771_comment'></div>某数日间便西行，未缘侍坐，伏乞与时自重，下慰瞻依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1204771_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1204771_comment'></div>某再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1204771_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　是岁，得参寥子书，谓已断吟诗，今复破戒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　是岁，罗适知江都县，有惠绵扇诗，秦观次其韵。作品：次韵罗正之惠绵扇（吴扇新翻制素绵）<div id='poem_199396' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199396' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199396?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵罗正之惠绵扇</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199396")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199396_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199396'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199396'>吴扇新翻制素绵，名郎持赠意俱圆。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199396'>有人充户修明月，无女乘鸾向紫烟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199396'>供奉宜升清暑殿，动摇合作御风仙。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199396'>谁知挥却青蝇辈，功在春蚕一觉眠。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199396_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199396'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199396_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='cf3edb42b21a4db88484743c14e1be96_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1084')">1082-1084年</a>，34-36岁</div><div id='cf3edb42b21a4db88484743c14e1be96' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　是岁，大父承议公卒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年春</a>　春，李之仪在京，有诗寄秦观，秦观次其韵。作品：李端叔见寄次韵（君文豪赡无与俦）<div id='poem_199549' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199549' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199549?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李端叔见寄次韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199549")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199549_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199549'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199549'>君文豪赡<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>无与俦，使我吟讽忘离忧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199549'>浩如沅湘起阳侯，翻星转日吞数州。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199549'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_199549", 199549, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>华章</span>藻句饶风力，顷刻朱红迷畛域。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199549'>一班纵复为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_199549", 199549, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>管窥</span>，万派终难以蠡测。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199549'>区区文墨倦高情，解鞅还游恍惚庭。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199549'>半槽新水六尺簟，卧视云物行空青。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199549'>伊我篮舆抵京县，溽暑黄埃负初愿。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199549'>君家只在御城东，弥月不能三两见。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199549'>求仙未若醉中真，蚁斗蛾飞愁杀人。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199549'>清都梦断理归棹，回首一树琼枝新。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199549'>归来草木春风换，世事猬毛那可算。<div id='poem_sentence_10_199549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_199549'>幸谢故人频寄书，莫笑元郎自呼漫。<div id='poem_sentence_11_199549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_199549'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_199549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_199549'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_199549_0'>⑴ 原作胆，据各本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_199549_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年4月</a>　夏四月，中书舍人曾巩卒于江宁，秦观为作哀词。作品：曾子固哀词。<div id='poem_199656' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199656' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199656?labeling=true' target='_blank'>曾子固哀词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199656")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199656_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199656'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199656'>皇受命而熙洽兮，实千祀而一时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199656'>协气郁而四塞兮，与盛德其俱升。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199656'>麟凤出而旁午兮，犹氤氲而扶舆。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199656'>笃生我公兮，以文章为世师。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199656'>公神禹之苗裔兮，肇子爵而鄫封。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199656'>逮去邑而为氏兮，季叶汩其南征。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199656'>祖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_199656", 199656, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>骞翔</span>而绩著兮，考蜷跼而文鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199656'>公既生而多艰兮，踵祖武而好修。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199656'>既轻车又良御兮，遂大放乎厥词。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199656'>发天人之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_199656", 199656, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>奥秘</span>兮，约六艺而成章。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199656'>元气含而未泄兮，洞芒芴而窅冥。<div id='poem_sentence_10_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_199656'>挽天河而一泻兮，物应手而华昌。<div id='poem_sentence_11_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_199656'>揖扬马使先路兮，咸告公曰不敢。<div id='poem_sentence_12_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_199656'>彼崔蔡之纷纷兮，孰云窥其藩翰。<div id='poem_sentence_13_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_199656'>辰来<span class='inlineComment2'>（原缺，据各本补）</span>迟而去速兮，固前修以跋疐。<div id='poem_sentence_14_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_199656'>方<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_199656", 199656, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>盘礴</span>而上征兮，遽相羊而补外。<div id='poem_sentence_15_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_199656'>皇揆公之忠诚兮，即商墟而赐环。<div id='poem_sentence_16_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_199656'>䌷史谍乎东观兮，裁诰命乎西垣。<div id='poem_sentence_17_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_199656'>典章绝而复作兮，世争睹而快先。<div id='poem_sentence_18_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_199656'>正经纬乎终古兮，配维斗而昭然。<div id='poem_sentence_19_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_199656'>变化诡而难常兮，虽司命其或昧。<div id='poem_sentence_20_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_199656'>忽遭艰而去国兮，遂衔哀而即世。<div id='poem_sentence_21_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_199656'>述作纷其具存兮，怅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_199656", 199656, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>爽灵</span>之焉诣。<div id='poem_sentence_22_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_199656'>信百年不斯须兮，遒<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作犹）</span>电<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>灭而焱逝。<div id='poem_sentence_23_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_199656'>天不慭遗一老兮，固搢绅之所伤。<div id='poem_sentence_24_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_199656'>矧不肖以薄技兮，早获进于门墙。<div id='poem_sentence_25_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_199656'>路贯江而修阻兮，曾莫奠乎酒浆。<div id='poem_sentence_26_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_199656'>悲填膺而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_199656", 199656, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>茀郁</span>兮，聊自托于斯文。<div id='poem_sentence_27_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_199656'></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_199656_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_199656_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年6月</a>　闰六月，李常自淮西提刑召为太常少卿、迁礼部侍郎；孙觉自南京召为太常少卿、易秘书少监，秦观俱有诗。作品：寄李公择郎中（节旄淮畔脱秋风）寄孙莘老少监（一出承明七换麾）<div id='poem_199443' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199443' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199443?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄李公择郎中</a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199443")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199443_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199443'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199443'>节旄淮畔脱秋风，忽跨鲸鱼上碧空。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199443_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199443'>华秀两跗当重露，文成五色在高桐。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199443_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199443'>江南又说衣冠盛，廷右仍瞻礼乐隆。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199443_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199443'>朝睍既升淮海见，瀌瀌雨雪自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_199443", 199443, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>消融</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199443_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199443'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199443_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199441' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199441' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199441?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄孙莘老少监</a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199441")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199441_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199441'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199441'>一出承明七换麾，君恩复许上<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_199441", 199441, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>彤墀</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199441'>白衣苍狗无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_199441", 199441, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>常态</span>，璞玉浑金有定姿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199441'>天上图书森似旧，人间岁月浪如驰。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199441'>鳌头只在蓬山畔<span class='inlineComment2'>（原作伴，据张本、四库本改）</span>，行赴蟠桃熟后期。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199441'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199441_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年9月</a>　九月后，为王观之母李氏夫人作墓志铭。作品：李氏夫人墓志铭。<div id='poem_1204948' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204948' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204948?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李氏夫人墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰六年九月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204948")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204948_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204948'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204948'>至和中，先君游太学，事安定先生胡公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204948_comment'></div>岁时归觐，其言太学人物之盛，数称海陵王君观及其从弟觌有高才，力学而文，流辈无与比者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204948_comment'></div>余时为儿侍左右，闻而心慕之，愿即见，盖不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204948_comment'></div>后数年，二君相继举进士中第，其试于有司，皆为开封第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204948_comment'></div>名实既发，所与皆一时之豪，余遂以故人子，获从之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204948_comment'></div>元丰六年七月二十六日，寺丞君观之母李夫人卒，宣德君觌以书抵余，曰：「世母葬有日矣，伯氏荒迷不能请，愿有铭」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204948_comment'></div>嘻，先君友执之命也，其可以辞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204948_comment'></div>谨按，夫人李氏讳仁用，世为泰州如皋人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204948_comment'></div>年二十六归王氏，为府君讳惟清之夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204948_comment'></div>享年八十有三，以卒之年九月四日祔葬于如皋之赤崖乡府君之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204948_comment'></div>子男一人，寺丞君也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204948_comment'></div>女四人，其婿赵世昌为内殿崇班，蔡实、丁传、夏侯煦皆举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204948_comment'></div>孙男一人，曰谭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204948_comment'></div>孙女二人，一早卒，次尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204948_comment'></div>夫人性通达，治事有法度，凡内外之宗姻，下逮婢使，靡不得其欢心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204948_comment'></div>子既出仕，供养甚厚，及坐法免生理，萧然恬不以介意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204948_comment'></div>虽高年，视听不衰，手足便利，迄终无言乱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204948_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1204948'>于维夫人间且穆，来嫔王宗祗厥职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204948_comment'></div>内严外顺宗姻怿，既寿又康时酒食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204948_comment'></div>变故相诡独处廓，气形逮反超不失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204948_comment'></div>藏从其夫古原宅，词诏后来有幽刻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1204948_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>　是岁，又作徐氏夫人墓志铭。<div id='poem_1204946' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204946' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204946?labeling=true' target='_blank'>徐氏夫人墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰四年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204946")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204946_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204946'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204946'>夫人姓徐氏，真州扬子人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204946_comment'></div>供备库副使讳昌言之孙，太子左清道率府致仕讳守约之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204946_comment'></div>年二十一，归清河张氏，为内殿承制讳文英之夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204946_comment'></div>治平三年闰月二十八日以疾卒于京师，享年五十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204946_comment'></div>生男五人：清臣、良臣、尧臣、舜臣、禹臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204946_comment'></div>尧臣举进士，以学行闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204946_comment'></div>舜臣，应天府军巡判官、监楚州五祐盐场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204946_comment'></div>女二人：长适进士王搆，次适进士王谔，早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204946_comment'></div>以元丰四年十月癸酉祔葬于扬州江都县东兴乡马坊里承制君之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204946_comment'></div>承制君元配刘氏，无子，早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204946_comment'></div>既升朝，故事得封妻为县君，夫人请先刘氏，承制君义而从之，故夫人未及封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204946_comment'></div>而卒后二年，以恩始追赠寿昌县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204946_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1204946'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1204946", 1204946, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>懿懿</span>寿昌，女子之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204946_comment'></div>浑然平夷，不妄笑嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204946_comment'></div>初在厥家，孝谨是处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204946_comment'></div>逮嫔德门，益踵前武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204946_comment'></div>维亲及党，不汝瑕疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204946_comment'></div>岂伊黾免，天实我资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204946_comment'></div>承祭奉宾，事严且饬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204946_comment'></div>以身先之，畴敢不力？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204946_comment'></div>既美于躬，又相其夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204946_comment'></div>子多俊髦，亦泽之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204946_comment'></div>昆崙之西，冈阜蟠踞，镵词幽墟，以照不腐。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1204946_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>　是岁，发愤读书，作精骑集序；又有逆旅集序，附载于此。作品：精骑集序、逆旅集序。<div id='poem_1204816' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204816' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204816?labeling=true' target='_blank'>精骑集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204816")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204816_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204816'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204816'>予少时读书，一见辄能诵，暗疏之亦不甚失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204816_comment'></div>然负此自放，喜从滑稽饮酒者游，旬朔之间，把卷无几日，故虽有彊记之力，而常废于不勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204816_comment'></div>比数年来，颇发愤自惩艾，悔前所为，而聪明衰耗，殆不如曩时十一二，每阅一事，必寻绎数终，掩卷茫然，辄复不省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204816_comment'></div>故虽然有勤苦之劳，而常废于善忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204816_comment'></div>嗟夫，败吾业者，常此二物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204816_comment'></div>比读《齐史》，见孙搴答邢词云：「我精骑三千，足敌君羸卒数万」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204816_comment'></div>心善其说，因取经传子史事之可为文用者，得若干条，勒为若干卷，题曰《精骑集》云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204816_comment'></div>噫，少而不勤，无如之何矣，长而善忘，庶几以此补之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1204816_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204809' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204809' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204809?labeling=true' target='_blank'>逆旅集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204809")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204809_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204809'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204809'>余閒居有所闻，辄书记之，既盈编轴，因次为若干卷，题曰《逆旅集》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204809_comment'></div>盖以其智愚好丑，无所不存，彼皆随至随往，适相遇于一时，竟亦不能久其留也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204809_comment'></div>或曰：「吾闻君子言欲纯事，书欲纯理，详于志常，而略于纪异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204809_comment'></div>今子所集，虽有先王之馀论，周孔之遗言，而浮屠老子、卜医梦幻、神仙鬼物之说，猥杂于其间，是否莫之分也，信诞莫之质也，常者不加详，而异者不加略也，无乃与所谓君子之书言者异乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204809_comment'></div>余笑之曰：「鸟栖不择山林，唯其木而已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204809_comment'></div>鱼游不择江湖，唯其水而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204809_comment'></div>彼计事而处，简物而言，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1204809", 1204809, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>窃窃</span>然去彼取此者，缙绅先生之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204809_comment'></div>仆野人也，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1204809", 1204809, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>拥肿</span>是师，懈怠是习，仰不知雅言之可爱，俯不知俗论之可卑，偶有所闻，则随而记之耳，又安知其纯与駮耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204809_comment'></div>然观今世，人谓其言是，则矍然改容；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204809_comment'></div>谓其言信，则适然以喜，而终身未尝信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204809_comment'></div>则又安知彼之纯不为駮，而吾之駮不为纯乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204809_comment'></div>且万物历历，同归一隙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204809_comment'></div>众言喧喧，归于一源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204809_comment'></div>吾方与之沉，与之浮，欲有取舍而不可得，何暇是否信诞之择哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204809_comment'></div>子往矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204809_comment'></div>客去，遂以为序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1204809_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>　是岁，为俞充子次皋作御书手诏记。作品：代俞次皋作御书手诏记。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>　是岁，著有蚕书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年</a>　春正月，吕公著知扬州，五月，秦观上书干谒，并有投卷诗文。作品：上吕晦叔书。<div id='poem_1204783' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204783' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204783?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上吕晦叔书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204783")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204783_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204783'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204783'>五月日，进士秦某谨再拜献书知府大资阁下：某闻天下之功成于器识，来世之名立于学术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204783_comment'></div>古之大臣以道事君，不可则止，未始有意于功名，然其器识学术，博大而精微，则功名岿然，与时自至，虽欲深闭固拒，挥而去之，不可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204783_comment'></div>昔汉昭、宣之时，霍光以宿卫之臣，任汉室之寄，大器将倾，徐起而正之，神色不变，此其器识，实有以过人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204783_comment'></div>然操持国柄，不知消息盈虚之运，身死，肉未及寒，而宗族灭矣，则学术不明之弊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204783_comment'></div>其后<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1204783", 1204783, "Clauses/28/Comments/1")'>顺、桓</span>之间，李固以一时名儒，位居三事，扼奸臣之吭而夺其气，此其学术，真有古之遗风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204783_comment'></div>然易举轻发，不能定大计于无形，至争以口舌，申之书幐，事固不就，身亦随之丧焉，则器识不宏之弊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204783_comment'></div>非特二子为如此，大抵西汉之士，器识优于学术，故多成功而名不足；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204783_comment'></div>东汉之士，学术优于器识，故多令名而功不成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204783_comment'></div>夫君子以器为车，以识为马，学术者，所以御之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204783_comment'></div>西汉之士，如环人之车，驾以駃騠，驱通道，上峻阪，无所不可，然而日暮途远、倒行逆施者有焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204783_comment'></div>东汉之士，如泰豆氏持策揽辔，圆旋中规，方折中矩，然而车弊马羸，转薄于险阻之间，则固已败矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204783_comment'></div>某狂妄，尝以此说<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1204783", 1204783, "Clauses/67/Comments/0")'>推论</span>历世豪杰之士，又以默观当今之时，而搢绅先生有告某者，以谓器足以任天下之重，识足以致无穷之远，学足以探天人之赜，术足以偶事物之变，如古之所谓大臣，非阁下不足以与于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204783_comment'></div>又曰：阁下之道，如元气行乎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1204783", 1204783, "Clauses/78/Comments/0")'>浑茫</span>之中，其发为风霆雨露者，特糟粕耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204783_comment'></div>某时方食，闻之投匕箸而起，遂欲身从服役之后，求备扫洒之列，而困于无介绍，莫获自通，窃伏淮海，抱区区之愿，缺然未厌者有年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204783_comment'></div>比者，天幸阁下来守是邦，而某丘墓之邑，实隶麾下，是以辄忘贱陋，取其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1204783", 1204783, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>不腆</span>之文，录在异卷，贽诸下执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204783_comment'></div>又述其愿见之说，为书先焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204783_comment'></div>夫大冶无弃金，大陶无弃土，江海不却水，王侯不遗士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204783_comment'></div>某虽不能廉小谨曲以自托于乡闾，然古人所以处废兴而择去就者，窃尝讲其一二矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204783_comment'></div>傥阁下不赐拒绝而辱收之，请继此以进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204783_comment'></div>干冒台严，俯伏待命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204783_comment'></div>不宣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1204783_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='465eda69c4ff49cfb39c80f94495901e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("465eda69c4ff49cfb39c80f94495901e");'><span id='465eda69c4ff49cfb39c80f94495901e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年</a>，36岁</div><div id='465eda69c4ff49cfb39c80f94495901e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年</a>　春，王巩自宾州放还，秦观有诗。作品：次韵马忠玉喜王定国还自滨州（举证海相逢一解颜）<div id='poem_199376' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199376' class='poemTitle href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199376")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199376_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199376'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199376'>淮海相逢一解颜，纷纷岁月梦魂间。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199376'>初惊渔艇迷花去，忽认星槎拂斗还。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199376'>桂岭暮登猿断续，槐堂春到鸟绵蛮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199376'>石渠旧议行当复，未信佳时得自闲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199376'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199376_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='1403882adab04e50892150b828ada8bc_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年</a>，36岁</div><div id='1403882adab04e50892150b828ada8bc' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年8、9月</a>　八月下旬，秦观辞东坡自金山归高邮。九月五日，东坡以书荐秦观于王安石，安石亦答书，称其诗清新妩丽似鲍谢。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='4be0d5f91d2f43a0bfa3b3f7ed054a27_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("4be0d5f91d2f43a0bfa3b3f7ed054a27");'><span id='4be0d5f91d2f43a0bfa3b3f7ed054a27_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年</a>，36岁</div><div id='4be0d5f91d2f43a0bfa3b3f7ed054a27' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>十一月十三日，东坡舟次扬州竹西，为秦观题真赞，并有书。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>数日后，东坡至高邮与秦观相会。高邮有文游台，传为苏东坡、秦少游、孙莘老、王定国四贤雅集之所。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='78d477f5213f44228facd780809bedde_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("78d477f5213f44228facd780809bedde");'><span id='78d477f5213f44228facd780809bedde_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a gray;'>▪</span>冬，徐大正得之将归建安，秦观为作闲轩记并赋诗。作品：徐得之闲轩（建安自古多俊髦）闲轩记。<div id='poem_199621' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199621' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199621?labeling=true' target='_blank'>徐得之闲轩<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199621")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199621_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_199621_0'>① 按：本诗一作释道潜作，见《参寥子诗集》卷五，题作《寄题徐得之先生闲轩》。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199621'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199621'>建安自古多俊髦，徐子磊落<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_199621", 199621, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>尤其</span>豪。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199621'>论兵说剑走湖海，身勤事左无所遭。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199621'>绿林<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>五校已屠脍，黑衣三卫羞徒劳。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199621'>归来故山便卜筑，脱弃万事轻鸿毛。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199621'>横前涧水漱哀玉，傍舍老枥藏飞猱。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199621'>山蔬何用愧粱肉，鹤氅未必输青袍。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199621'>追寒弄月有真意，慎勿轻语传儿曹。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199621'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_199621_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_199621'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_199621_0'>⑴ 原作水，据王本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_199621_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1204904' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204904' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204904?labeling=true' target='_blank'>閒轩记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204904")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204904_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204904'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204904'>建安之北，有山岿然与州治相直，曰北山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204904_comment'></div>山之南有涧，涧之南有横阜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204904_comment'></div>背山而面阜，据涧之北滨，有屋数十楹，则东海徐君大正燕居之地也，其名曰閒轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204904_comment'></div>去轩数十里，有田可以给饘粥，供丝麻，宾婚燕祭之用取具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204904_comment'></div>君将归而老焉，而求记于高邮秦观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204904_comment'></div>观曰：士累于进退久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204904_comment'></div>弁冕端委于庙堂之上者，倦而不知归；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204904_comment'></div>据莽苍而佃，横清泠而渔者，闭距而不肯试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204904_comment'></div>二者皆有累焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204904_comment'></div>君虽少举进士，而便马善射，慷慨有气略，天下奇男子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204904_comment'></div>夫以精悍之姿，遇休明之时，齿发未衰，足以任事，而欲就閒旷，处幽隐，分猿狖之居，厕麋鹿之游，窃为君不取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204904_comment'></div>乃为词以招之，曰：山之云兮油然作，水循涧兮号不斁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204904_comment'></div>云为雨兮水为渎，时不淹兮难骤得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204904_comment'></div>念夫君兮武且力，矢奔星兮弧挽月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204904_comment'></div>夜参半兮投袂起，探虎穴兮虏其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204904_comment'></div>破千金兮购奇服，抚剑马兮气横出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204904_comment'></div>山之中兮岁将阑，木樛枝兮水惊湍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204904_comment'></div>鹰隼击兮蛟龙蟠，熊咆虎啸兮天为寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204904_comment'></div>四无人兮谁与言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204904_comment'></div>膏君车兮秣君马，轩之中兮不可以久閒。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1204904_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>冬，秦观将赴京应举，淮海闲居集由儿辈协助编成。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>是岁，作次韵安州晚行寄传师。作品：次韵安州晚行寄传师（投暮安州北）<div id='poem_199389' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199389' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199389?labeling=true' "poem_title_199389")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199389_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199389'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199389'>投暮安州北，苍烟乱眼昏。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199389_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199389'>茅茨人外路，砧杵月边村。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199389_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199389'>野水飞云薄，空林噪雀繁。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199389_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199389'>几人堪此乐，逢客莫轻论。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199389_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199389'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199389_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>是岁冬，乔执中奉使吴越，谓宰相王圭尝齿及秦观，秦观作诗送之。作品：送乔希圣（鴳翔蓬蒿非所悲）<div id='poem_199605' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199605' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199605?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送乔希圣</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_sentence_0_199605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199605'>贵贱穷通尽偶然，回头总是东海水。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199605_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年夏</a>　九月，秦观有诗题杨康功醉道士石。作品：题杨康功醉道士石（黄冠初饮何人酒）<div id='poem_199674' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199674' </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199674")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199674_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199674'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199674'>黄冠初饮何人酒，径醉颓然不知久。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199674_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199674_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199674'>异物终为贤俊得，野老田夫岂宜有。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199674_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199674'>华阴杨公香桉吏，一见遂作忘年友。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199674_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199674'>日暮西垣视草归，往往对之倾数斗。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199674_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199674'>大梦之间无定论，启母望夫天所诱。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199674_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_199529' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199529' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199529?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵邢敦夫秋怀十首<span
