id='poem_sentence_16_199581_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年冬</a>　初冬，朝奉郎知登州苏轼为礼部郎中，秦观有贺启。作品：贺苏礼部启。<div id='poem_1204734' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204734' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204734?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺苏礼部启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204734")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204734_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204734'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204734'>伏审光膺<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1204734", 1204734, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>睿命</span>，入拜仪曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204734_comment'></div>凡有识知，所同欣抃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204734_comment'></div>窃以大儒之出处，实为当世之重轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204734_comment'></div>三仁去而商<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1204734", 1204734, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>寖微</span>，二老归而周始大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204734_comment'></div>长孺仕汉，诸侯寝谋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204734_comment'></div>中立相唐，列藩听命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204734_comment'></div>殆亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1204734", 1204734, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>天时</span>之有数，岂伊人力之能为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204734_comment'></div>伏惟礼部郎中先生道贯神明，智周事物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204734_comment'></div>决科射策，亟闻董相之风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204734_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1204734", 1204734, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>逆指犯颜</span>，屡夺史鱼之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204734_comment'></div>周旋台阁，而风采可畏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204734_comment'></div>流落江湖，而容貌不枯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204734_comment'></div>盖好仁无以尚之，故特立有如此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204734_comment'></div>斯文未丧，果蒙日月之照临；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204734_comment'></div>吾道将兴，更属风云之盛会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204734_comment'></div>既补郡守，俄迁侍郎，虽未厌于人情，渐当陪于国论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204734_comment'></div>昔神龙失水，几为蝼蚁之所侵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204734_comment'></div>今猛虎在山，将见藜藿之不采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204734_comment'></div>某久操󷗻彗，获侍门墙，叹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1204734", 1204734, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>刻鹄</span>之未成，念<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1204734", 1204734, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>攀鸿</span>而何敢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204734_comment'></div>闻之不寐，知告于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204734_comment'></div>睍见曰消，颇动雪云之态；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204734_comment'></div>厦成相贺，独申燕雀之私。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1204734_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年冬冬至日</a>　冬至日，吕希绩官吏部，秦观代人作回吕吏部启。未几，又有谢颍州吕吏部启。作品：代回吕吏部启、谢颍州吕吏部启。<div id='poem_1204754' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204754' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204754?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代回吕吏部启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年冬冬至日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204754")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204754_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204754'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204754'>密室飞灰，见阳生于本律；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204754_comment'></div>清台课候，知日起于初躔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204754_comment'></div>恭惟某官望重本朝，材高当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204754_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1204754", 1204754, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>一时千载</span>，韦、平之遇已稀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204754_comment'></div>四世五公，袁、杨之兴未艾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204754_comment'></div>既承召节，仍属嘉辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204754_comment'></div>宜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1204754", 1204754, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>戬谷</span>之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1204754", 1204754, "Clauses/12/Comments/1")'>骈臻</span>，顾颂言而何既？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204754_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1204754_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204765' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204765' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204765?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢颍州吕吏部启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年冬冬至日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204765")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204765_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204765'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204765'>叨奉宸恩，谬当藩郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204765_comment'></div>境预四邻之末，润沾九里之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204765_comment'></div>凭几占书，未进河南之牍；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204765_comment'></div>朵云号体，俄蒙郇国之函。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204765_comment'></div>仰荷谦冲，退增悚愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204765_comment'></div>恭以某官器周事变，学造渊微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204765_comment'></div>出四世五公之门，遇千载一时之运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204765_comment'></div>文辞则操觚立就，政事则投刃皆虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204765_comment'></div>荀氏八龙，尽继高阳之美；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204765_comment'></div>河东三凤，尤推鸑鷟之奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204765_comment'></div>会公旦之相周，俾伯禽而侯鲁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204765_comment'></div>布宣诏令，已成师帅之功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204765_comment'></div>近省君亲，行陟股肱之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204765_comment'></div>某承风兹久，觌德未遑，企颂之怀，敷宣罔既。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1204765_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年冬</a>　冬，何子温提举淮南东路常平，过高邮 北上，秦观有诗。作品：次韵何子温（一星就起海隅旁）<div id='poem_199393' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199393' class='poemTitle -----title
盱眙（泗州）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='4e7a7d361d25420b85b25766ce0a0a40_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("4e7a7d361d25420b85b25766ce0a0a40");'><span id='4e7a7d361d25420b85b25766ce0a0a40_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>，21岁</div><div id='4e7a7d361d25420b85b25766ce0a0a40' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　游泗州、盱眙，作《浮山堰赋》<div id='poem_1204697' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204697' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204697?labeling=true' target='_blank'>浮山堰赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（并引）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204697")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204697_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204697'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204697'>梁武帝天监十三年，用魏降人王足计，欲以淮水灌寿阳，乃假太子右卫康绚节督卒二十万，作浮山堰于钟离，而淮流湍驶漂疾，将合复溃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204697_comment'></div>或曰：「淮有蛟龙，喜乘风雨坏岸，其性恶铁」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204697_comment'></div>绚以为然，乃引东西冶铁器数千万斤，益以薪石沉之，犹踰年乃合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204697_comment'></div>堰袤九里，水逆淮而上，所蒙被甚广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204697_comment'></div>魏人患之，果徙寿阳戍顿八公山，馀民分就冈垄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204697_comment'></div>未几淮暴涨，堰坏，奔于海，有声如雷，水之怪祅蔽流而下，死者数十万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204697_comment'></div>初，镇星犯天江，而堰实退舍而坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204697_comment'></div>呜呼，异哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204697_comment'></div>感而作《浮山堰赋》，其词曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1204697'>繄四渎之并酾兮，实脉络于坤灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204697_comment'></div>惟长淮之湠漫兮，自桐柏而发源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204697_comment'></div>贯江河以下骛兮，拉泗、沂而左奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204697_comment'></div>走狞雷以赴海兮，驾扶摇而薄山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204697_comment'></div>固元气之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1204697", 1204697, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>宣节</span>兮，熄众兆之灾患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204697_comment'></div>粤萧梁之服命兮，抗北魏以争衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204697_comment'></div>信降虏之诡计兮，阻汤汤而倒征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204697_comment'></div>依两崖以受土兮，羌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1204697", 1204697, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>合脊</span>于中央。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204697_comment'></div>揵竹甾石之不足兮，又沈铁以厌不祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204697_comment'></div>袤九里以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1204697", 1204697, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>中峙</span>兮，截万派之奔茫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204697_comment'></div>大堤矻乎如墉兮，杞柳菀其成行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204697_comment'></div>展源深而支永兮，虽暂否而必通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204697_comment'></div>倏鲸吼以奔溃兮，与苍苍而俱东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204697_comment'></div>若燃犀之照渚兮，旅百怪而争遒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204697_comment'></div>𩣡马怒而嘘蹀兮，虎蛟咆而相纠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204697_comment'></div>哀死者之数万兮，孤魂逝其焉游？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204697_comment'></div>背自然以司凿兮，固神禹之所恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204697_comment'></div>世苟近以昧远兮，或不改其此度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204697_comment'></div>螳螂怒臂以当车兮，精卫衔石而填海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204697_comment'></div>憯梁人之不思兮，卒取非于异代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204697_comment'></div>岂方迫于寻引兮，不遑议夫无穷？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204697_comment'></div>将奸臣取容以幸入兮，公相援而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1204697", 1204697, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>欺蒙</span>？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204697_comment'></div>抑五材囚壮之有数兮，特假手于憧憧？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204697_comment'></div>系曰：敦阜寇冥大川屯，精气扶舆变乾文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204697_comment'></div>运徒力顿漂无垠，潮波复故弥亿年。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1204697_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='09d0cf780d65408a95d7c279c890cb86_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("09d0cf780d65408a95d7c279c890cb86");'><span id='09d0cf780d65408a95d7c279c890cb86_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>，46岁</div><div id='09d0cf780d65408a95d7c279c890cb86' class='detail'><a href="javascript: 湖州

showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199637?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陪李公择观金地佛牙</a><span class='authorDate'>（1076年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199637'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199637'>薄伽梵相含空虚，化人分段同璠玙<span class='inlineComment2'>（原作凡与，据各本改）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199637'>尔来示灭二千岁，真骨万里传中区。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_199637", 199637, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>假设</span>象似开群愚。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199637'>偶从好事至霅上，持出瞻玩相欢娱。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199637'>灵牙<span class='link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1076&endYear=1076')">1076年2月</a>　受陈舜俞令举宴请，席上赋陈令举妙奴诗。作品：陈令举妙奴诗（西湖水滑多娇嫱）<div id='poem_199552' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199552' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_4_199482'>丛薄开罗帐，沦漪写镜屏。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199482'>疏篱窥窅窕，支港泛笭箵。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年7月</a>　秋七月，乌台诗案发，苏轼被逮。秦观闻讯，急渡钱塘，至吴兴，见陈书记、钱主簿，探询得实，赋霅上感怀以抒伤感。作品：霅上感怀（七年三过白蘋洲）<div id='poem_199341' class='_poem'><div -----title
扬州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='a9611bc6d1f44c4f94e11a94a5056d59_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a9611bc6d1f44c4f94e11a94a5056d59");'><span id='a9611bc6d1f44c4f94e11a94a5056d59_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>，24岁</div><div id='a9611bc6d1f44c4f94e11a94a5056d59' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　扬州守钱公辅将受代，公辅养有二鹤，出入相从，秦观感而作叹二鹤赋。<div id='poem_1204701' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204701' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204701?labeling=true' target='_blank'>叹二鹤赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204701")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204701_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204701'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204701'>广陵郡宅之圃，有二鹤焉，昂然如人，处乎幽閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204701_comment'></div>翅翮摧伤，弗能飞翻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204701_comment'></div>虽雌雄之相从，常<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1204701", 1204701, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>悒悒</span>其鲜欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204701_comment'></div>时引吭而哀唳，若对客而永叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204701_comment'></div>圃吏告予曰：「此紫薇钱公之鹤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204701_comment'></div>公熙宁时实守此邦，心虚一而体道，治清净而忘言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204701_comment'></div>既不耽乎豆觞，又不嗜乎匏弦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204701_comment'></div>惟此二鹤，与之周旋，居则俛仰于宾掾之后，出则飞鸣乎导从之先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204701_comment'></div>故鹤之来也，则知使君之将至；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204701_comment'></div>鹤之往也，则知使君之将还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204701_comment'></div>是时一郡之人，好甚于姻，敬愈于客，如爱子之居家，若宠臣之在国，昼从乎风亭之滨，夜栖乎月台之侧，谓此幸之可常，颇超摇而自得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204701_comment'></div>逮公之去，于今几时，人各有好，鹤谁汝私？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204701_comment'></div>具名物于有司，鸡鹜易而侮之，傍轩楹而蒙叱，历阶戺而遭麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204701_comment'></div>惟主人之故客，间一遇而嗟咨」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204701_comment'></div>余闻而叹曰：「噫嘻，有恃而生者，失其所恃则悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204701_comment'></div>彼有啄乎广莫之野，饮于清泠之渊，随林丘而止息，顺风气而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1204701", 1204701, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>腾骞</span>，一鸣九皋，声闻于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204701_comment'></div>若然者，又岂卫侯之能好，而支遁之可怜哉」！</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1204701_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='1501296006774d148380cda83f88fd31_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1501296006774d148380cda83f88fd31");'><span id='1501296006774d148380cda83f88fd31_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>，26岁</div><div id='1501296006774d148380cda83f88fd31' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　作御街行词于扬州刘太尉家。作品：《御街行》（银烛生花如豆）<div id='poem_199758' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199758' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199758")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199758_comment'></div><div 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199287")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_199287'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_199287_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199285' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199285' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_0_199551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199551'>过尽行人都不起，忽闻水<span class='inlineComment2'>（谢本作冰）</span>响一齐飞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199551'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_199551_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>寒食至广陵上坟，阎木求仁有诗谢参寥彦温访于坟所，秦观亦作诗答之。作品：答阎木求仁谢参寥彦温访于坟所（老濞城西木半摧）<div id='poem_199454' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199454' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199454?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答阎求仁谢参寥彦温访于坟所</a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199454")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199454_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199454'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199454'>老濞城西木半摧，昆崙冈下路新开。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199454_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199454'>故人此地衔忧去，禅客他时问疾回。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199454_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199454'>闻为树风增永感，却因水鸟證西来。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199454_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199454'>已谋寒食驱羸马，细听清谈动玉哀。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199454_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199454'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199454_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='ac389329e7ac4f45916a9e4bd0c8895c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ac389329e7ac4f45916a9e4bd0c8895c");'><span id='ac389329e7ac4f45916a9e4bd0c8895c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>，31岁</div><div id='ac389329e7ac4f45916a9e4bd0c8895c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年4月</a>　夏，四月初，与参寥子随苏轼南下，如越省亲。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='24cecbea88b5434c958695dda4311eb6_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("24cecbea88b5434c958695dda4311eb6");'><span id='24cecbea88b5434c958695dda4311eb6_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年</a>，32岁</div><div id='24cecbea88b5434c958695dda4311eb6' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>自会稽还家后，日以文史自娱，并常游扬州诸名胜，有望海潮词，抒怀古之幽情。作品：望海潮（星分牛斗）<div id='poem_199751' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199751' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199751?labeling=true' target='_blank'>望海潮<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>四首</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199751")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199751_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199751'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199751'>星分牛斗，疆连淮海，扬州万井提封。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199751_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199751'>花发路香，莺啼人起，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_199751", 199751, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>朱帘</span>十里春风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199751_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199751'>豪俊气如虹，曳照春金紫，飞盖相从。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199751_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199751'>巷入垂杨，画桥南北<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_199751", 199751, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>翠烟</span>中。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199751_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199751'>追思故国繁雄。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199751_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199751'>有迷楼挂斗，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_199751", 199751, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>月观</span>横空。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199751_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199751'>纹锦制帆，明珠溅雨，宁论爵马鱼龙。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199751_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199751'>往事逐孤鸿，但乱云流水，萦带离宫。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199751_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199751'>最好挥毫万字，一饮拚千钟。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_199751_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>鲜于侁为扬州守，命教授马希孟编扬州集，秦观为作序。作品：扬州集序。<div id='poem_1204810' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204810' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204810?labeling=true' target='_blank'>扬州集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204810")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204810_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204810'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204810'>《扬州集》者，大夫鲜于公领州事之二年，始命教授马君希孟采诸家之集而次之，又搜访于境内简编碑板亡缺之馀，凡得古律诗洎箴赋合二百二篇，勒为三卷，号《扬州集》云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204810_comment'></div>按《禹贡》曰：「淮海惟扬州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204810_comment'></div>彭蠡既潴，三江既入，震泽底定」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204810_comment'></div>而《周礼·职方氏》亦称：「东南曰扬州，其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1204810", 1204810, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>山镇</span>曰会稽，其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1204810", 1204810, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>泽薮</span>曰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1204810", 1204810, "Clauses/15/Comments/1")'>具区</span>，川曰三江，浸曰五湖」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204810_comment'></div>则三代以前所谓扬州者，西北剧淮，东南距海，江湖之间尽其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204810_comment'></div>自汉已来，既置刺史，于是称扬州者，往往指其刺史所治而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204810_comment'></div>盖西汉刺史无常治，东汉治历阳，或徙寿春，又徙曲阿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204810_comment'></div>魏亦治寿春，或徙合肥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204810_comment'></div>吴治建业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204810_comment'></div>西晋、后魏、后周皆因魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204810_comment'></div>东晋、宋、齐、梁、陈皆因吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204810_comment'></div>惟宋常以建业为王畿，而东扬州为扬州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204810_comment'></div>东扬州者，会稽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204810_comment'></div>隋以后皆治广陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204810_comment'></div>繇是言之，凡称扬州者，东汉指历阳，或寿春，或曲阿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204810_comment'></div>中原自魏至周指寿春，或合肥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204810_comment'></div>江左自吴至陈指建业，或会稽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204810_comment'></div>隋唐五代乃指广陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204810_comment'></div>广陵在二汉时，尝为吴国、江都国、广陵郡，宋为南兖州，北齐为东广州，后周为吴州，唐初亦为邗州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204810_comment'></div>其为扬州，自隋始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204810_comment'></div>繇是言之，凡称吴国、江都、广陵、南兖、东广、吴州、邗州者，皆今之扬州也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204810_comment'></div>此集之作，自魏文帝诗已下，在当时虽非扬州，而实今之广陵者，皆取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204810_comment'></div>其非广陵，而当时为扬州者，皆不复取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204810_comment'></div>至扬子云《箴》，本约《禹贡》为辞，则广陵自在其中，固不得而不录也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204810_comment'></div>既成，公又属某推表废兴迁徙之迹，而究其端，使夫览之者有考焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1204810_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>邵彦瞻为扬州从事，秦观为作集瑞图序，并有简。作品：集瑞图序。与邵彦瞻简二则。<div id='poem_1204814' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204814' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204814?labeling=true' target='_blank'>集瑞图序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204814")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204814_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204814'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204814'>熙宁九年，燕国邵舜文与诸弟持其先君之丧于宜兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204814_comment'></div>数月，有双瓜生于后圃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204814_comment'></div>后二年，又生紫芝三，双桃、双莲一，凡六物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204814_comment'></div>于是乡之耆老闻而叹曰：「邵氏其兴乎，何其瑞之多也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204814_comment'></div>舜文因集六物者而图之，号《集瑞图》云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204814_comment'></div>余谓万物皆天地之委和，而瑞物者又至和之所委也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204814_comment'></div>至和之气，磅礴氤氲而不已，则必发见于天地之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204814_comment'></div>其精者盖已为盛德，为尊行，为豪杰之材；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204814_comment'></div>其浮沉而下上者，则又为景星、卿云、甘露、时雨、醴泉、芝草、连理之木、同颖之禾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204814_comment'></div>而栖翔游息乎其中者，则又为凤凰、麒麟、神马、灵龟之属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204814_comment'></div>晔乎光景色象之异也，蔼乎华实臭味之殊也，卓乎形声文章之无与及也，于是世指以为瑞焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204814_comment'></div>繇是言之，世之所谓瑞者，乃盛德尊行、魁奇之才所钟、和气之馀者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204814_comment'></div>邵氏之祖考，既以潜德隐行见推乡闾，至舜文、彦瞻、端仁，又以文学收科第，弟兄相继有闻于时，而诸子森然皆列于英俊之域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204814_comment'></div>则是至和之气钟于其家久矣，宜其馀者发为草木之瑞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204814_comment'></div>昔杨宝得王母使者白环四枚，而宝生震，震生秉，秉生赐，赐生彪，凡四世为三公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204814_comment'></div>以往推今，即邵氏六物之瑞，岂徒生而已夫？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204814_comment'></div>盖有应之者矣！</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1204814_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='f6469094b5c54453ae8497248c0443df_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f6469094b5c54453ae8497248c0443df");'><span id='f6469094b5c54453ae8497248c0443df_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1080&endYear=1080')">1080年</a>，32岁</div><div id='f6469094b5c54453ae8497248c0443df' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>寒食前，苏辙因以现任为兄轼赎罪，贬监筠州酒税，过高邮，秦观相从两日，送至邵伯埭，有诗唱和，并托辙携书致其兄轼。作品：次韵子由题斗野亭（满市花风起）次韵子由广陵五题。<div id='poem_199374' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199374' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199374?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵子由题斗野亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199374")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199374_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199374'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199374'>满市花风起，平堤漕水流。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199374'>不堪春解手，更为晚停舟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199374'>古<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>埭天<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_199374", 199374, "Clauses/4/Comments/1")'>连雁</span>，荒祠木蔽牛。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199374'>杖藜聊复尔，转盼夕烟浮。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199374'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_199374'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_199374_0'>⑴ 张本、四库本作上</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_199374_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_199355' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199355' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199355?labeling=true' target='_blank'>广陵五题<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>次韵子由题九曲池</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199355")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199355_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_199355_0'>① 按：题原作《次韵子由题九曲池》题下注，实为五诗总题。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199355'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199355'>萧瑟通池閟茂林，岸傍无复属车音。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199355_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199355'>涵春似恨隋家远，涨晓疑连蜀井深。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199355_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199355'>斗草事空烟冉冉，司花人远树阴阴。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199355_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199355'>劳生俛仰成陈迹，纵有遗声<span class='inlineComment2'>（各本作音）</span>可用寻。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199355_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199355'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199355_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199489' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199489' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199489?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>次韵子由题平山堂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年3月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199489_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199489'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199489'>栋宇高开古寺间，尽收佳处入雕栏。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199489'>山浮海上青螺远，天转江南碧玉宽。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199489'>雨槛幽花滋浅泪，风卮清酒涨微澜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199489'>游人若论登临美，须作淮东第一观。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199489'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199489_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199356' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199356' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199356?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span>次韵子由题蜀井</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年3月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199356_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199356'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199356'>蜀冈精气滀多年，故有清泉发<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_199356", 199356, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>石田</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199356_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199356'>乍饮肺肝俱澡雪，久窥杖屦亦轻便。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199356_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199356'>炊成香稻流珠滑，煮出新茶泼乳鲜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199356_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199356'>坐使二公乡思动，放杯西望欲挥鞭<sup class='reference class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199358' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199358?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span>次韵子由题摘星亭<span id='poem_sentence_1_199358'>不见烧香成宿雾，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_199358", 199358, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>虚传</span>裁锦作障泥。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199358'>萤流花苑飞星乱，芜满春城绿发齐。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199358'>长忆凭栏风雨后，断虹明处海天低<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199358_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199591'>天鸡一号叫，剑戟明遥空。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199591_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199591'>溪谷相径复，深林杳攒丛。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年8月</a>　中秋日，郡守吕公著宴于扬州云山阁，秦观有中秋口号。作品：中秋口号（云山檐楯椄低空）<div id='poem_199361' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199361' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199361?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中秋口号<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199361")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199361_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_199361_0'>① 按：本诗《淮海后集》卷三重出，已删重出诗。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199361'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199361'>云山檐楯接低空，公宴初开气郁葱。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199361_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199361'>照海旌幢<span class='inlineComment2'>（重出诗作幡）</span>秋色里，激天鼓吹月明中。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199361_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199361'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_199361", 199361, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>香槽</span>旋滴珠千颗，歌扇惊围玉一丛。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199361_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199361'>二十四桥人望处，台星正在广寒宫。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199361_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199361'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199361_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年秋</a>　秋，王元龙赴泗州粮料院，秦观作诗送之。元龙尝以其家藏李廷圭墨赠秦观，后尝论其词。作品：送王元龙赴泗州粮料院（子猷风味最诸王）<div id='poem_199430' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199430' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199430?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送王元龙赴泗州<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本、四库本下有粮料院三字）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年秋）</span><span id='poem_sentence_2_199430_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199430'>顾我行为大梁役，一卮薄酒话愁肠<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作为公系马一传觞）</span>。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年秋</a>　未几，秦观与张倪老、姜伯辉游扬州九曲池，有诗怀元龙、参寥。并为倪老撰芝室记。作品：与倪老伯辉九曲池有怀元龙参寥（云月娟娟淮海秋）芝室记。<div id='poem_199241' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199241' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199241?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与倪老伯辉九曲池有怀元龙参寥</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199241")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_199241_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199241'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199241'>云月娟娟淮海秋，隋家池上共浮游。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199241_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199241'>可怜一段风流事，特欠支郎与子猷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199241_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199241'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_199241_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204905' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204905' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204905?labeling=true' target='_blank'>芝室记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204905")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204905_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204905'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204905'>河南张倪老，既以其父宣义君命，奉其母彭城君之丧，殡于广陵石塔佛舍，遂与其弟曼老、冲老庐于殡侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204905_comment'></div>数月，有芝生于庐中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204905_comment'></div>余闻而谒观焉，盖附土而出者数本，其色正赤，泽而坚悍，若傅髹彤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204905_comment'></div>余抚而叹曰：「天下之物，固有未易诘其所以然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204905_comment'></div>夫濡雨露而生，被霜雪而死，下荄而上蔓者，草之常性也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204905_comment'></div>今芝亦草耳，而孝士大夫之家则生，贤诸侯之国则生，明天子之世则生，徙之不可，莳之不能，岂所谓未易诘其所以然者欤」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204905_comment'></div>有浮屠闻而笑之曰：「是不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204905_comment'></div>天下之物，皆吾心也，心之本体，明白空洞，实无一毫可得而有，惟其觉真蔽于尘幻，由是清激而升者为想，浊污而堕者为情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204905_comment'></div>夫情想之于心，犹珠鉴之有影像，江海之有浪沤，形固具存，非其本矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204905_comment'></div>故无穷如虚空，有物如天地，爰逮日月斗星、金石草木之属，凡悦可于吾心意者，皆善想之所变，而憎恶于吾耳目者，皆恶情之所生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204905_comment'></div>吾闻彭城君承其先夫人之凶，五日而以毁死，诸子庐于殡侧，刺血书经，哀动道路，善想交感，室为生芝，异于凡草，理固然矣，其又奚疑？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204905_comment'></div>若夫善恶毕寂，情想究空，芝于此时，瑞为何物」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204905_comment'></div>已而叹曰：「奇哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204905_comment'></div>吾不能以告子矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204905_comment'></div>余未尝读佛书，固不知所论中否，然窃怪其语宏博瑰奇，有足观者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204905_comment'></div>明年，张氏兄弟服除而归广陵，士大夫因号其庐曰芝室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204905_comment'></div>惧来者之不知也，而嘱余为记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204905_comment'></div>余既论次其事，遂追疏浮屠之语而并载之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204905_comment'></div>倪老名康伯，以召试中选，今为南都教授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204905_comment'></div>曼老名节孙，前参海陵军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204905_comment'></div>冲老名康道云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1204905_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>暑换，寤寐经从处。<div id='poem_sentence_11_199570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_199570'>忽蒙珠璧投，了与云峦遇。<div id='poem_sentence_15_199570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_199570'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_199570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_199570'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_11_199570_0'>⑴ 张本、四库本作星</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_199570_comment'></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='10480d550f564efeba25f616aab9bf27_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("10480d550f564efeba25f616aab9bf27");'><span id='10480d550f564efeba25f616aab9bf27_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>，34岁</div><div id='10480d550f564efeba25f616aab9bf27' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年9月</a>　秋九月，作圆通禅师行状。<div id='poem_1204940' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204940' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204940?labeling=true' target='_blank'>圆通禅师行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204940")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204940_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204940'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204940'>师讳怀贤，字潜道，俗姓何氏，温州永嘉人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204940_comment'></div>在襁褓中，能合掌僧坐，父母异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204940_comment'></div>时郡之西山有僧嗣仁，修西方白莲净观，行甚高，众归之勤，号嗣仁社主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204940_comment'></div>乃以师从社主出家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204940_comment'></div>天禧二年普度天下僧，遂落发受具戒，时年四岁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204940_comment'></div>师既得法器，又幼得高僧为之依归，艺行日进，同辈无与比者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204940_comment'></div>有讲肄辄往听，未几尽传其学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204940_comment'></div>及长，慨然有游方之志，即辞社主去，遍参知识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204940_comment'></div>所至处，延居上游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204940_comment'></div>最后见达观禅师昙颖于润之因圣，遂得其法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204940_comment'></div>皇祐初，润守王公琪雅闻师名，乃具礼请传法于甘露，而太平之繁昌亦以隐静召师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204940_comment'></div>以甘露近城邑而隐静僻在深山中，遂从太平繁昌之请，开堂于郡之瑞竹院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204940_comment'></div>初，师从瑞新禅师游十有二年，具知宗门承袭宾主之事，自谓无以复加矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204940_comment'></div>比至达观会中，闻所开示，类皆世缘俗谛，或杂以嵬琐谈谐之言，又尝以事斥一僧去，每升堂，辄追骂至累日犹不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204940_comment'></div>师心陋之，乃潜诣丈室，谓达观曰：「为人天师，当只说法，奈何预以世俗间事？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204940_comment'></div>且僧有过，斥去则已矣，何足追骂至累日乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204940_comment'></div>达观颔而不答，师因此省悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204940_comment'></div>至是以信香嗣达观法云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204940_comment'></div>居隐静七年，王公移守金陵，复召师以清凉，辞不赴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204940_comment'></div>明年，达观自明州雪窦徙金山之龙游，州人乃以雪窦召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204940_comment'></div>师既行，道过龙游，留一月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204940_comment'></div>会达观<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1204940", 1204940, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>示寂</span>，润州之衣冠缁素因以状诣郡守，请止师继焉，而龙游主者，故事当禀于朝廷，郡守以白部使者上之，报可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204940_comment'></div>龙游自火灾之后，栋宇灰烬，瑞新禅师实中兴之，功未既而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204940_comment'></div>师至，修新公故事，大兴土木，积八年，殿堂廊庑皆具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204940_comment'></div>今宫室之盛冠绝淮海者，盖始于新而成于师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204940_comment'></div>然其地当孔道，客至无虚日，师颇厌之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204940_comment'></div>熙宁元年，遂谢去，隐于金牛山，去丹阳县数十里，人迹罕至，事委其徒觉澄主之，师一切不问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204940_comment'></div>庭养猿、鹤、孔雀、鹦鹉、白鹇，皆就掌取食，号五客，各为一诗赠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204940_comment'></div>士大夫欲相见者，就山中访焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204940_comment'></div>三年，刘公述谪守九江，以圆通召师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204940_comment'></div>师素闻匡庐山水之富，常以未至为恨，得疏欣然从之，题诗壁间，而其卒章云：「岁晚当期返竹门」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204940_comment'></div>至圆通一年，果谢去，复还金牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204940_comment'></div>明州复以雪窦来请，固以疾辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204940_comment'></div>史馆刁公约谓师曰：「雪窦，东南名山，明觉、达观嗣居其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1204940_comment'></div>二十年间请者三至，可谓勤矣，今又不赴，无乃孤其望乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1204940_comment'></div>师素厚刁公，心善其说，遂登舟由海道去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1204940_comment'></div>北转海门，遇大风卒起，风樯摧败，夜漂至慈溪之东岸，舟破，从者百馀人皆散走，师独安坐水中不动，从者还救之，乃免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1204940_comment'></div>居雪窦一年，复谢去，还金牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1204940_comment'></div>以元丰五年九月甲午<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1204940", 1204940, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>示寂</span>，俗寿六十七，僧腊六十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1204940_comment'></div>觉澄等即以某月丁未葬师于金牛之西垄，累坟遂塔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1204940_comment'></div>师操行卓越，而遇人有恩意，虽对宾客，未尝与众异馔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1204940_comment'></div>夜辄从众僧寝于堂中，不入丈室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1204940_comment'></div>雅性乐施，所得金钱缯帛，率缘手尽，其徒以此归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1204940_comment'></div>又多才艺，工于诗，字画有法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1204940_comment'></div>閒居绝口不挂事，事虽交至错出，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1204940", 1204940, "Clauses/161/Comments/0")'>处之晏然</span>，无不集者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1204940_comment'></div>当时贤士大夫闻其风，皆倾意愿与之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1204940_comment'></div>始用参知政事高公若讷奏，赐紫方袍，又用节度使李公端愿奏，赐号圆通大师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1204940_comment'></div>凡十被请，从之者四，皆天下名山巨刹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1204940_comment'></div>道化方行，辄托事隐去，州郡虽欲挽而留之，不可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1204940_comment'></div>弟子五十有五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1204940_comment'></div>所著诗、颂、文集凡五卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1204940_comment'></div>又撰次其自少至老出处之迹一篇，号《稚耄典记》，以自见云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1204940_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1204940_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: -----title
和县（历阳）

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年5月</a>　夏，遇钱节于京师，相得甚欢，浩歌剧饮，白眼视礼法士。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年秋</a>　秋试不售，参寥子作诗慰之，苏轼和作，并有书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1078&endYear=1078')">1078年</a>　在京时，尝干谒王存。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='b8cd014222e347d7ad4c01ad3bb219fb_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b8cd014222e347d7ad4c01ad3bb219fb");'><span id='b8cd014222e347d7ad4c01ad3bb219fb_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>，34岁</div><div id='b8cd014222e347d7ad4c01ad3bb219fb' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>春，秦观在京应举，生活澜浪，有辇下春晴诗，参寥子和之。作品：辇下春晴（楼阙过朝雨）<div id='poem_199457' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199457' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199457?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辇下春晴</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199457")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199457_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199457'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199457'>楼阙过朝雨，参差动霁光。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199457'>衣冠纷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_199457", 199457, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>禁路</span>，云气绕宫墙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199457'>乱絮迷春阔，荐花困日长。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199457'>经旬辜<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>酒伴，犹未献长杨<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199457'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199457_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_199457'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_199457_0'>⑴ 张本、四库本作牵</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_199457_0'>⑵ 二句《诗话总龟》前集卷八引作平庸何处是，十里带垂杨。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_199457_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>应试落第，赋画堂春词，写失意之感。作品：画堂春（落红铺径水平池）<div id='poem_199722' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199722' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199722?labeling=true' target='_blank'>画堂春</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199722")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199722_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199722'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199722'>落红铺径水平池。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199722'>弄晴小雨霏霏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199722'>杏园憔悴杜鹃啼。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199722'>无奈春归。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199722_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199722'>柳外画楼独上，凭阑手撚花枝。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199722'>放花无语对斜晖。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199722'>此恨谁知。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_199722_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_199722'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(199722)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在京时，曾肇曾曲加推毂，既归，有书谢之。肇亦答以书。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='695a5b823cb64c418e919bb6bb57190b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("695a5b823cb64c418e919bb6bb57190b");'><span id='695a5b823cb64c418e919bb6bb57190b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>，37岁</div><div id='695a5b823cb64c418e919bb6bb57190b' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年3月</a>　春三月戊戌，神宗崩于福宁殿，秦观有神宗皇帝晏驾功德疏。<div id='poem_1204979' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204979' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204979?labeling=true' target='_blank'>神宗皇帝晏驾功德疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204979")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204979_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204979'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204979'>宫车晏驾，率土崩心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204979_comment'></div>爰输殒裂之诚，用结精严之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204979_comment'></div>伏愿皇灵妙湛，天仗超摇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204979_comment'></div>大圆鉴中，既證无生之忍；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204979_comment'></div>妙高峰上，更旋不退之轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204979_comment'></div>庆逮邦家，泽流寰海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204979_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1204979_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　是时，秦观有王安国注论语序，斥王安石新书，谓神宗之重经术非主于一家。作品：王定国注论语序。<div id='poem_1204813' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204813' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204813?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王定国注论语序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204813")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204813_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204813'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204813'>元丰二年，眉阳苏公用御史言，文涉谤讪，属吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204813_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204813", 1204813, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>狱具</span>，天子薄其罪，责为黄州团练副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204813_comment'></div>于是梁国张公、涑水司马公等三十六人，素厚善眉阳，得其文不以告，皆罚金，而太原王定国独谪监宾州盐税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204813_comment'></div>定国，相家子，少知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204813_comment'></div>一朝坐交游斥海上，人皆意其日饮无何，不复以笔砚为职矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204813_comment'></div>而定国至宾，益自刻励，晨起入局，视盐税之事唯谨，退则穷经著书，或赋诗自娱，非疾病庆吊辄不废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204813_comment'></div>七年罢还，诣东上閤门奏书曰：「臣无状，幸缘先臣之故，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1204813", 1204813, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>获齿</span>仕版，不能慎事，陷于罪戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204813_comment'></div>念无以自赎，间因职事之暇，妄以所见，注成《论语》十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204813_comment'></div>未敢以进，唯陛下裁哀之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204813_comment'></div>明日，诏御药院取其书去，未报，而神宗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1204813", 1204813, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>弃天下</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204813_comment'></div>呜呼，自熙宁初，王氏父子以经术得幸，下其说于太学，凡置博士试诸生，皆以新书从事，不合者黜罢之，而诸儒之论废矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204813_comment'></div>定国于时处放逐之中，蛮夷瘴疠之地，乃能自信不惑，论著成一家之言，至天子闻之取其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204813_comment'></div>非其气过人，何以及此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204813_comment'></div>传曰：「天不为人之恶寒而辍其冬，地不为人之恶险而辍其广，君子不为小人之匈匈而易其行」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204813_comment'></div>于斯言可信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204813_comment'></div>余比多事，未获请观其书，而定国乃以副本来属予为序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204813_comment'></div>顾余文之陋，岂能发定国之所蕴乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204813_comment'></div>姑掇其大概，使夫览之者知定国著书之时为如此，又知神宗向经术，亦非主于一家而已。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1204813_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年春</a>　春，王圭为相，尝言及秦观名字，是时上书干谒，并代其侄王仲甫撰表。作品：上王岐公论荐士书。<div id='poem_1204782' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204782' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204782?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上宰相王岐公论荐士书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204782")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204782_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204782'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204782'>月日，高邮进士秦某谨再拜献书仆射相公阁下：某淮海一介之士，行能无取，比汲汲焉惟犬马之养是营，釜钟之禄是干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204782_comment'></div>行年三十有七矣，而脂韦汩没，德义不加充，问学不加进，可谓无以别于常人者，岂敢侥倖万一求知于搢绅先生之门哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204782_comment'></div>比者，先人之友乔君执事奉使吴越，道过淮南，具言常辱相公齿及名氏，属乔君喻意，使进谒于门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204782_comment'></div>夫布衣之贱，获见知宰相，此古人所以书亟上、日扫门而求者也，顾某之不肖，何足以辱此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204782_comment'></div>幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204782_comment'></div>虽然，某尝闻之矣，祸莫大于蔽贤，福莫长于荐士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204782_comment'></div>汉武之大臣，其功莫如卫、霍，其酷莫如张汤，青、去病之后，侯失国除，其传不过一再，而汤之子孙，茅土相袭，逮乎东京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204782_comment'></div>何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204782_comment'></div>一身之功过，不足以易天下之利害，故青、去病受蔽贤之祸，而汤获荐士之福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204782_comment'></div>虽微二三子，古之人其孰不然哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204782_comment'></div>周公曰：「我一沐三握发，一饭三吐哺，起以待士，犹恐失天下之贤人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204782_comment'></div>盖其封于少昊之墟曲阜，庙食者三十有四世，其别封者，又为凡、蒋、邢、茅、胙、祭之国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204782_comment'></div>夫周公之求贤，岂有意于求福哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204782_comment'></div>天之报施，自当然耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204782_comment'></div>伏惟相公辅先帝已来，阴阳调和，庶政具举，吏民效职，夷狄宾贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204782_comment'></div>其度数、声名、文物之盛，粲然与唐虞同风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204782_comment'></div>逮承顾命，立今天子，宗社至计，定于从容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204782_comment'></div>事已，缺然若无所预，其功德可谓冠百辟而通神明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204782_comment'></div>当此之时，虽持尊养严，却客疏士，固于盛致未可云损，然犹孜孜诹访，发于至诚，如某之不肖，尚挂左右之馀论，又况盛德尊行、魁奇隽伟之才乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204782_comment'></div>诚推所以辱赐不肖之意，思天下所谓盛德尊行、魁奇隽伟之才，抱能而不试、已用而未显者，兼收并进之，使朝野内外，才能各当其分，无一人失其所者，则相公虽不求福于天，天之所以报王氏之子孙者，亦当不下于周公矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204782_comment'></div>辄以所为诗文一卷，待命于下执事，惟相公察焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204782_comment'></div>干冒钧严，俯伏惟命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204782_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204782_comment'></div>傅校王本。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1204782_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年4月</a>　夏四月，朝议欲以苏轼使高丽，有大臣白罢之，秦观与孙觉同赋诗纪其事。作品：客有传朝议欲以子瞻使高丽大臣有惜其去者白罢之作诗以纪其事（文章异域有知音）<div id='poem_199583' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199583' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199583?labeling=true' target='_blank'>客有传朝议欲以子瞻使高丽大臣有惜其去者白罢之作诗以纪其事<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199583")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199583_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_199583_0'>① 与莘老同赋（按：原收二首，第一首诗末注：“此一首莘老作”。今删入存目。）</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199583'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199583'>学士风流异域传，几航云海使南天。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199583_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199583'>不因名动五千里，岂见文高二百年。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199583_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199583'>贡外别题求妙札，锦中<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_199583", 199583, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>翻样</span>织新篇。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199583_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199583'>淹留却恨鸳行旧，不得飞觞驻跸前<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《淮海集》卷八）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199583_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199583'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199583_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年5月</a>　五月丙辰，秦观登焦蹈榜进士，除定海主簿，有谢及第启。<div id='poem_1204732' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204732' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204732?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢及第启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204732")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204732_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204732'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204732'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1204732", 1204732, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>光灵</span>遽被，愧幸特深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204732_comment'></div>窃以圣神临御之初，实惟祖宗熙洽之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204732_comment'></div>戈兵收偃，经艺著明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204732_comment'></div>风俗莫荣于为儒，材能咸耻乎未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204732_comment'></div>圜冠方履，求自试者几十万焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204732_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1204732", 1204732, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>血指汗颜</span>，获见收者才四百耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204732_comment'></div>既甚严其程度，宜尽得于豪英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204732_comment'></div>如某者，淮海孤生，衣冠末系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204732_comment'></div>志在流水，尝辱子期之知；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204732_comment'></div>困于盐车，颇为伯乐之顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204732_comment'></div>徒以为养而求仕，故虽被黜以忘惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204732_comment'></div>惩于羹者吹齑，自知其妄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204732_comment'></div>不量凿而正枘，人指为狂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204732_comment'></div>岂意力田而逢年，亦称长袖而善舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204732_comment'></div>大羹焉用，以贵本而不遗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204732_comment'></div>昌歜甚微，缘嗜偏而见取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204732_comment'></div>方贤书之上献，俄吏议之旁连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204732_comment'></div>窃鈇致疑，事非在我；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204732_comment'></div>解骖见赎，世鲜其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204732_comment'></div>尚赖平反，卒蒙昭雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204732_comment'></div>折剑既以重铸，死灰因而复燃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204732_comment'></div>究其倚伏之难常，益信穷通之有定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204732_comment'></div>属皇明之继照，推睿泽以横流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204732_comment'></div>特免试言，径跻仕版。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204732_comment'></div>技能莫效，初如不战而屈人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204732_comment'></div>名宦亟成，更类无功而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1204732", 1204732, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>受禄</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204732_comment'></div>退而省察，殆有夤缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204732_comment'></div>此盖伏遇某官诱进人材，主张士类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204732_comment'></div>离奇蟠木，素为左右之先；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204732_comment'></div>璀璨馀光，复自比邻之借。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204732_comment'></div>致兹寒陋，亦预采收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204732_comment'></div>敢不慎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1204732", 1204732, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>操修</span>之方，明出处之致？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204732_comment'></div>庶期末路，获报明恩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204732_comment'></div>过此以还，未知所措。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1204732_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年5月</a>　五月，以蔡确为尚书左仆射兼门下侍郎，秦观有代贺蔡相公启。<div id='poem_1204748' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204748' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204748?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代贺蔡相公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204748")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204748_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204748'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204748'>光膺制书，荣还内殿，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204748_comment'></div>恭以判府观文相公道贯精微，智周事变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204748_comment'></div>以文章擅一时之誉，以器业结万乘之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204748_comment'></div>姚元崇入赞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1204748", 1204748, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>鸿钧</span>，初闻远略；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204748_comment'></div>霍子孟逮承顾命，益见忠谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204748_comment'></div>勋业显隆，夷夏欢颂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204748_comment'></div>惟三郡均劳之久，当二圣图旧之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204748_comment'></div>既奉纶言，复青毡之旧物；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204748_comment'></div>伫瞻绣衮，反黄阁之故居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204748_comment'></div>某猥辱异知，欣承嘉命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204748_comment'></div>属缪分于符竹，阻祗庆于门闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204748_comment'></div>系颂实深，敷宣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1204748", ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年夏</a>　夏，秦观欲荐陈师道于章惇，师道作书却之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年夏</a>　傅尧俞亦欲因秦观以识陈师道，皆不见。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='83b7a6597ca24f30b66e5e1371b41db3_label'><a href='javascript:
