id='poem_note_199421_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_199422' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199422' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199422?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>送平仲学士</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年9月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199422_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199422'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199422'>须句别驾伟仪刑，陵谷初无见坦平。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199422_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199422'>七子建安推世艺，五经中秘擅家声。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199422_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199422'>南宫参掇端如梦，东观分携空复情。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199422_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199422'>莫爱溪堂好风月，早来龙尾道前行<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《淮海集》卷九）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199422_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199422'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199422_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年秋</a>　秋，有晚出左掖诗。作品：晚出左掖（金爵觚棱转夕晖）<div id='poem_199332' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199332' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199332?labeling=true' target='_blank'>晚出左掖</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199332")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_199332_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199332'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199332'>金爵觚棱转<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_199332", 199332, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>夕晖</span>，翩翩宫叶堕秋衣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199332_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199332'>出门<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_199332", 199332, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>尘障</span>如黄雾，始觉身从天上归。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199332_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199332'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_199332_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年秋</a>　秋，秦观子湛处度应试未出，秦观独坐兴国寺浴室院，有诗纪之。作品：兴国浴室院独坐时儿子湛就试未出（满城车马没深泥）<div id='poem_199255' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199255' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199255?labeling=true' target='_blank'>兴国浴室院独坐时儿子湛就试未出</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199255")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_199255_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199255'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199255'>满城车马没深泥，院里安闲总不知。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199255_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199255'>儿辈未来钩箔坐，长春花上雨如丝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199255_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199255'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_199255_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年10月</a>　冬十月，滕元发达道卒，秦观有挽词二首。时达道之弟申欲凌暴诸孤，秦观笃于风谊，走告御史中丞苏辙，出榜止之。作品：滕达道挽词（早岁峨冠侍冕旒；江南江北奉周旋）<div id='poem_199466' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199466' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199466?labeling=true' target='_blank'>滕达道挽词<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199466")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199466_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199466'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199466'>早岁峨冠侍冕旒，白头<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_199466", 199466, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>淹恤</span>外诸侯。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199466_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199466'>箧中尚有东封草，塞下曾无北顾忧。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199466_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199466'>心系汉廷长入梦，气吞胡虏不防秋。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199466_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199466'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_199466", 199466, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>经纶</span>未了埋黄土，精爽还应属斗牛。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199466_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199466'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199466_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199465' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199465' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199465?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年10月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199465_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199465'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199465'>江南江北奉周旋，合散如云二十年。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199465_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199465'>春郡胜游花蔽马，夜山清话雨连天。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199465_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199465'>共惊万里长城坏，独把千金宝剑悬。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199465_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199465'>平日书题多散乱，呼儿寻聚一潸然。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199465_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199465'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199465_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年10月8日</a>　十月八日，哲宗生辰，秦观有兴龙节疏二道。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年</a>　秦观有魏景传，眇倡传，似亦作于本年。作品：魏景传、眇倡传。<div id='poem_1204935' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204935' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204935?labeling=true' target='_blank'>魏景传</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204935")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204935_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204935'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204935'>魏景字同叟，淮南高邮之隐君子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204935_comment'></div>身长六尺，骨如削石，瞳子碧色有光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204935_comment'></div>尝卖缯于市，遇华山元翁，从受鍊丹铸剑长生之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204935_comment'></div>元翁名碧天，其师曰刘海蟾，海蟾之师曰吕洞宾，洞宾之师曰钟离权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204935_comment'></div>自权至景，凡五世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204935_comment'></div>景问元翁曰：「余欲兼忘，其方奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204935_comment'></div>翁曰：「执汝身，守汝一，谨而勿失」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204935_comment'></div>景曰：「执害通，守害变，则如之何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204935_comment'></div>翁曰：「不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204935_comment'></div>子以为构中天之台者，土木未考，则能无经乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204935_comment'></div>适千里之国者，车马未馆，则能无行乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204935_comment'></div>故将欲通之，必固执之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204935_comment'></div>将欲变之，必固守之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204935_comment'></div>此其理也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204935_comment'></div>于是景以为然，乃述碧天之意，著书万馀言，论神仙事，号《太冲子》云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204935_comment'></div>《太冲子》曰：「道者，盗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204935_comment'></div>释者，识也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204935_comment'></div>盗天地阴阳之机，谓之道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204935_comment'></div>识万物之理，谓之释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204935_comment'></div>甚矣，人心之神也，虽造化亦无加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204935_comment'></div>今夫天地之生物，煦之以阳，肃之以阴，然后乃成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204935_comment'></div>人心则不然，一举而物已生矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204935_comment'></div>故天生万物，地生万物，人心生万物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204935_comment'></div>是故人心之形象天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204935_comment'></div>阴中生阳，阳中生阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204935_comment'></div>非阳不能养阳，非阴不能养阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204935_comment'></div>故修阳法者，去阴以纯其阳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204935_comment'></div>修阴法者，去阳以纯其阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204935_comment'></div>阳用其精，阴假诸物，此阴阳之法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204935_comment'></div>水之性润下，火之性炎上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204935_comment'></div>众人《离》上而《坎》下，故不交；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204935_comment'></div>真人《坎》上而《离》下，故交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204935_comment'></div>气，真气也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204935_comment'></div>气，谷气也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1204935_comment'></div>真人真气纯，众人谷气杂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1204935_comment'></div>神仙之道，有中立无，无中立有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1204935_comment'></div>死而不亡者至矣，一身而形二者次矣，不死不亡、一身而形不二者，又其次也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1204935_comment'></div>其大略如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1204935_comment'></div>同叟颖脱彊记，得于自然，凡阴阳医药锻鍊之技，无所不精，而能讳其术，所以世莫知焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1204935_comment'></div>颇解属文，亦工于诗，其《赠元翁》篇云：「幽断青松骨，鍊尽江月心」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1204935_comment'></div>佳句多此类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1204935_comment'></div>呜呼，自大道隐，学者各师异习，鲜得其本真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1204935_comment'></div>于是趋灭而不知生者，为佛氏之缘觉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1204935_comment'></div>趋生而不知灭者，为道家之神仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1204935_comment'></div>二者不同，其蔽一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1204935_comment'></div>然比夫生而行，死而伏，冥然日用而不知者，固有间矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1204935_comment'></div>如同叟者，虽不足以窥老庄之藩翰，亦葛稚川之流乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1204935_comment'></div>余素与之友善，别之且六年矣，既思其人而不可见，又惜其事泯泯，不少槩见于世，如古之所谓隐逸者也，乃撰次行义，并择其言之雅者，书而记之，聊以致余之意云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1204935_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204934' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204934' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204934?labeling=true' target='_blank'>眇倡传</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204934")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204934_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204934'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204934'>吴倡有眇一目者，贫不能自赡，乃计谋与母西游京师，或止之曰：「倡而眇，何往而不穷？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204934_comment'></div>且京师，天下之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204934", 1204934, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>色府</span>也，美眄巧笑，雪肌而漆发，曳珠玉，服阿锡，妙弹吹，籍于有司者以千万计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204934_comment'></div>使若具两目犹恐往而不售，况眇一焉，其瘠于沟中必矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204934_comment'></div>倡曰：「固所闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204934_comment'></div>然谚有之：『心相怜，马首圆』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204934_comment'></div>以京师之大，是岂知无我俪者」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204934_comment'></div>遂行，抵梁，舍于滨河逆旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204934_comment'></div>居一月，有少年从数骑出河上，见而悦之，为解鞍留饮燕，终日而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204934_comment'></div>明日复来，因大嬖，取置别第中，谢绝姻党，身<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1204934", 1204934, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>执爨</span>以奉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204934_comment'></div>倡饭，少年亦饭，倡疾不食，少年亦不食，嗫嚅伺候，曲得其意，唯恐或不当也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204934_comment'></div>有书生嘲之曰：「间者缺然不见，意有奇遇，乃从<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1204934", 1204934, "Clauses/47/Comments/1")'>相矢</span>者处乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204934_comment'></div>少年忿曰：「自余得若人，还视世之女子，无不馀一目者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204934_comment'></div>夫佳目，得一足矣，又奚以多为」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204934_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1204934'>赞曰：前史称刘建康嗜疮痂，其门下二百人常递鞭之，取痂以给膳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204934_comment'></div>夫意之所蔽，以恶为美者多矣，何特眇倡之事哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204934_comment'></div>传曰：「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1204934", 1204934, "Clauses/63/Comments/1")'>播糠眯目</span>，则天地四方易位」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204934_comment'></div>余尝三复其言而悲之。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1204934'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1204934_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年</a>　是岁，秦观有庆禅师塔铭。<div id='poem_1204944' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204944' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204944?labeling=true' target='_blank'>庆禅师塔铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元祐五年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204944")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204944_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204944'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204944'>师讳昭庆，字显之，俗姓林氏，泉州晋江人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204944_comment'></div>少跅弛，以气自任，尝与乡里数人相结为贾，自闽粤航海道，直抵山东，往来海中者十数年，资用甚饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204944_comment'></div>皇祐中祀明堂恩，度天下僧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204944_comment'></div>师为儿时，父母尝许为僧，名隶漳州开元寺籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204944_comment'></div>至是辄谢诸贾，以财物属同产，使养其亲，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1204944", 1204944, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>徒手</span>入寺，毁须发，受具戒，乡人异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204944_comment'></div>居无何，谓其曹曰：「出家儿当寻师访道，求脱生死，若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1204944", 1204944, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>匏系</span>一方，乃土偶人耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204944_comment'></div>遂去开元，遍参知识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204944_comment'></div>至禾山楚才禅师会中，因看风幡话，忽然有悟，以为道妙尽于此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204944_comment'></div>及见黄龙惠南禅师，示以佛手驴脚因缘，辄漫不省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204944_comment'></div>因服役左右，数年不去，始尽得黄龙之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204944_comment'></div>故师后出世，法嗣黄龙云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204944_comment'></div>熙宁中游淮南，往来广陵、天长、高邮之间，三邑之人，见师如旧相识，莫不靡然心服，愿为弟子，而高邮之人，遂以乾明请师出世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204944_comment'></div>师凡三住道场，初高邮之乾明，次乌江之惠济，最后广陵之建隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204944_comment'></div>惟惠济僻在深山中，地有汤泉，人迹罕至，心乐居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204944_comment'></div>乾明、建隆，皆为檀越士大夫所彊，遁去不获，非其好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204944_comment'></div>师所得法，广大微妙，又学术无不通达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204944_comment'></div>其为人法，或以经论，或以老庄，或以卜筮，或以方药，下至种种一切俗谛之事，随其根器，示大方便，不独守古人言句而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204944_comment'></div>自唐以来，禅家盛行于世者，惟云门、临济两宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204944_comment'></div>是时云门苗裔，分据大刹，相望于淮浙之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204944_comment'></div>临济之后，自江以北，惟师一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204944_comment'></div>故云门之徒或不以师为然，师闻而笑曰：「此吾所以为临济儿孙也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204944_comment'></div>晚岁多病，谢住持事，寓止高邮醴泉法嗣处安会中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204944_comment'></div>一日，召安师及诸禅者，以偈两首示之，明日饭后，奄然归寂，实元祐四年八月十六日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204944_comment'></div>俗寿六十三，僧腊四十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204944_comment'></div>其徒智勤等二十有二人，与广陵檀越奉师灵骨归，建陵，起塔而葬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204944_comment'></div>明年，智潭自广陵走京师，乞铭于某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204944_comment'></div>呜呼，始师出世，某之外舅故潭州宁乡县主簿徐君赓，实为檀越首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204944_comment'></div>及师在惠济，某尝从故龙图阁直学士孙公觉莘老、钱塘僧道潜参寥，访师于汤泉山中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204944_comment'></div>时乌江令，则今承议郎阎君木求仁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204944_comment'></div>高邮士大夫孙、阎诸公皆参问于师，而为役之久，缘契最深者，殆莫如某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204944_comment'></div>然则铭师之塔，某何敢辞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204944_comment'></div>乃为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_1204944'>呜呼我师，法妙难思，与物并作，而不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1204944", 1204944, "Clauses/124/Comments/0")'>磷缁</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204944_comment'></div>经论老庄，卜筮方药，是皆黄龙，佛手驴脚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204944_comment'></div>我从中證，决定无疑，非迁陀客，当大笑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1204944_comment'></div>山河既露，水鸟又谈，能事毕矣，汝复何参？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1204944_comment'></div>少贾之雄，老禅之伯，求其异相，亦不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1204944_comment'></div>有冈昆崙，南直海门，尽未来际，我师长存。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1204944_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年</a>　是岁，作书晋贤图后，与李公麟雅谑。时张耒亦从其说。<div id='poem_1204823' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204823' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204823?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书晋贤图后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204823")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204823_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204823'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204823'>此画旧名《晋贤图》，有古衣冠十人，惟一人举杯欲饮，其馀隐几、杖策、倾听、假寐、读书、属文，了无沾醉之态。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204823_comment'></div>龙眠李叔时见之，曰：「此《醉客图》也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204823_comment'></div>盖以唐窦蒙画评有毛惠远《醉客图》，故以名之焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204823_comment'></div>叔时善画，人所取信，未几转相摹写，遍于都下，皆曰：「此真《醉客图》也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204823_comment'></div>非叔时畴能辨之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204823_comment'></div>独谯郡张文潜与余以为不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204823_comment'></div>此画晋贤宴居之状，非醉客也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204823_comment'></div>叔时易其名，出奇以眩俗耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204823_comment'></div>余旧传闻，江南有一僧，以赀得度，未尝诵经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204823_comment'></div>闻有书生欲苦之，诣僧问曰：「上人亦尝诵经否」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204823_comment'></div>僧曰：「然」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204823_comment'></div>生曰：「《金刚经》几卷」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204823_comment'></div>僧实不知，卒为所困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204823_comment'></div>即诬生曰：「君今日已醉，不复可语，请俟他日」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204823_comment'></div>书生笑而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204823_comment'></div>至夜，僧从邻房问知卷数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204823_comment'></div>诘旦，生来，僧大声曰：「君今日乃可语耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204823_comment'></div>岂不知《金刚经》一卷也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204823_comment'></div>生曰：「然则卷有几分」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204823_comment'></div>僧茫然，瞪目熟视曰：「君又醉耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204823_comment'></div>闻者莫不绝倒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204823_comment'></div>今图中诸公，了无醉态，而横被沈湎之名，然后知昔所传闻为不谬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204823_comment'></div>虽然，余惧叔时以余与文潜异论，亦将以醉见名，则余二人者，将何以自解也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204823_comment'></div>叔时好古博雅君子，其言宜不妄，岂评此画时，方在酩酊邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204823_comment'></div>图中诸客，洎予二人，孰醉孰不醉，当有能辨之者。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1204823_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年</a>　是时，秦观有观易元吉猿獐图歌。<div id='poem_199542' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199542' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199542?labeling=true' target='_blank'>观易元吉獐猿图歌</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199542")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199542_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199542'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199542'>参天老木相樛枝，嵌空怪石衔青漪。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199542'>两猿上下一旁挂，两猿熟视苍蛙疑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199542'>萧萧丛竹山风吹，海棠杜宇相因依。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199542'>下有两獐从两儿，花餐草齧含春嬉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199542'>艺老笔精湖海推，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_199542", 199542, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>画<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>意</span>忘形形更奇。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199542'>解衣一扫神扶持，他日自见犹嗟咨。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199542'>金钱百万酒千鸱，荆南将军欣得之。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199542'>老禅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_199542", 199542, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>豪取</span>橐为垂，白昼掩门初许<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>窥。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199542'>房栊烱烱明冬曦，榛丛羽革分豪釐。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199542'>残编未终且归读，岁暮有间重借披。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199542'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_199542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_199542'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_4_199542_0'>⑴ 原作书，据张本、四库本改</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_7_199542_0'>⑵ 原作诈，据各本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_199542_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年</a>　是岁，黄庭坚题秦观弟觏诗卷，称其文字舋舋日新。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年</a>　是岁，乡人崔公度知蔡州，秦观有贺崔学士启。<div id='poem_1204738' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204738' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204738?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺崔学士启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204738")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204738_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204738'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204738'>伏审显膺明命，荣领近藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204738_comment'></div>凡在庇庥，所同欣抃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204738_comment'></div>恭以知府学士妙知德奥，精契道真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204738_comment'></div>斥百氏之奇偏，传七师之要妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204738_comment'></div>著于书者，乃其糟粕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204738_comment'></div>见乎业者，亦其绪馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204738_comment'></div>即之如浑金璞玉而难名，望之如高山深林而莫测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204738_comment'></div>作歌而去，陋晁、董之不为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204738_comment'></div>应聘而兴，指皋、夔而自许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204738_comment'></div>既参璧水之直，俄预道山之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204738_comment'></div>入则陪国论于五房，出则督工徒于二监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204738_comment'></div>世推前辈，地号要津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204738_comment'></div>然而了不器于盈虚，澹无心于舒卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204738_comment'></div>愿奉三年之最，固辞五兵之曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204738_comment'></div>邸音播腾，士论耸叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204738_comment'></div>矧汝南之奥壤，为右辅之名区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204738_comment'></div>仙圣所栖，英豪斯聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204738_comment'></div>竞欲识先生之杖屦，匪徒瞻太守之旂旌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204738_comment'></div>昔诵高辞，极太行之表里；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204738_comment'></div>行观美化，遍汝水之阴阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204738_comment'></div>尚疑未驾于征轺，固已召还于法从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204738_comment'></div>某谬联服役，叨预婚姻，顾罪悔之方虞，幸依归之遽获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204738_comment'></div>车逢峻阪，空嗟两耳之垂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204738_comment'></div>船在中流，实有一壶之望。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1204738'></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1204738_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年2月</a>　春二月，有诗和尚书右仆射刘挚、尚书左丞苏颂。作品：和刘仆射感旧言怀寄苏左丞（三禁提衡系扰龙）<div id='poem_199417' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199417' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199417?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和刘仆射感旧言怀寄苏左丞左丞昔守南京仆射方为幕客今同为执政作此诗仆射诗略记其一联云论文青眼今犹在报国丹心老更同</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199417")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199417_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199417'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199417'>三禁提衡系扰龙，拜无烧尾有家风。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199417'>班行旧号青云士，宾主今为黄閤公。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199417_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199417'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199417_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年3月</a>　三月壬午，秦观弟觏中马涓榜进士第。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年3月</a>　春，有次韵李安上惠茶诗。作品：次韵李安上惠茶（故人早岁佩飞霞）<div id='poem_199400' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199400' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199400?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵谢李安上惠茶</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199400")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199400_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199400'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199400'>故人早岁佩飞霞，故遣长须致茗芽。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199400'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_199400", 199400, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>寒橐</span>遽收诸品玉，午瓯初试一团花。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199400'>著书懒复追鸿渐，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_199400", 199400, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>辨水</span>时能效易牙。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199400'>从此道山春困少，黄书剩校两三家。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199400'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199400_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_note_199603_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年3月</a>　三月，孙升权中书舍人，秦观代作谢表。作品：代中书舍人（孙君孚）谢表。<div id='poem_1204719' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204719' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204719?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代中书舍人谢表<span class='inlineComment2'>（孙君孚）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204719")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204719_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204719'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204719'>臣某言：伏奉制命，除臣中书舍人，仍改赐章服者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204719_comment'></div>蒙恩承乏，方怀旷职之忧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204719_comment'></div>拜命为真，更窃非才之愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204719_comment'></div>宠荣遽逮，惊惧交增。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204719_comment'></div>伏以三省之兴，实先朝之盛典；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204719_comment'></div>西禁之任，尤当代之要津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204719_comment'></div>上润色于训词，下稽参于政理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204719_comment'></div>自非文章妙绝，可先诸子之鸣，吏术精通，能最群工之课，则何以当文士之极任，备宰相之属官？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204719_comment'></div>如臣者，地胄素寒，资材尤戆，以童子雕虫之技，偶得科名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204719_comment'></div>用司空城旦之书，尝更州县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204719_comment'></div>比从柱后，擢立螭头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204719_comment'></div>阅岁月之推移，乏毫分之称效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204719_comment'></div>惟虞罢斥，归耕寂寞之滨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204719_comment'></div>岂谓遭逢，入直禁严之地？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204719_comment'></div>光增末路，望过初心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204719_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下在宥中区，统和元气，上则承周太姒求贤之意，下则纳召康公用士之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204719_comment'></div>耆老毕归，俊英咸事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204719_comment'></div>镆铘满库，未忘一割之铅刀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204719_comment'></div>骅騄成群，不弃十驾之驽马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204719_comment'></div>遂令拔擢，爰及钝顽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204719_comment'></div>臣敢不敬佩德音，恪居官守，竭心思之逮及，效耳目之闻知？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204719_comment'></div>经宿进碑，敢效矜夸于近世；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204719_comment'></div>累年无草，愿希慎密于前人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204719_comment'></div>臣无任感天荷圣、激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1204719_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_2_1204766_comment'></div>兹盖伏遇某官，以仁义兴《韶》、《韶》，载赓岩廊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204766_comment'></div>以礼乐易干戈，爰靖海宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204766_comment'></div>颂声胥穆，盖远继于猗那。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204766_comment'></div>微健笔其谁宜为，岂老生敢专数事？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204766_comment'></div>指青山而长往，忍自弃于明时？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204766_comment'></div>镂白玉以纪封，尚窃期于后日。</div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年8月</a>　是时，党争日趋激烈，并及秦观。八月戊子朔，贾易、赵君锡交章论列。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年8月</a>　八月己丑，贾易又上章言苏辙，并及秦观；翌日，太皇太后高氏封付宰相吕大防、刘挚，且谕令未得遍示三省官，事遂寝。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年8月</a>　八月己丑，外戚李端愿卒，秦观有开府李公挽章。作品：开府李公搀章（报国封章数；戚里薨耆旧）<div id='poem_199493' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199493' class='poemTitle id='poem_title_199493_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199493'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199493'>报国封章数，论交意气真。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199493_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199493'>先朝贵公子，当代老成人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199493_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年8月</a>　同日，侍御史贾易以本官知庐州，亦上章论秦观。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年8月</a>　秦观既罢正字，有小艇渔翁之思，作题赵团练画江干晚景四绝。作品：题赵团练画江干晚景四绝（本自江湖客；鸟外云峰晚；公子歌钟里；晓浦烟笼树）<div id='poem_199347' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199347' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年8月</a>　秦观有二侯说，盖有所寓，疑作于此时。<div id='poem_1204893' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204893' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204893?labeling=true' target='_blank'>二侯说</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204893")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204893_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204893'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204893'>闽有侯白，善阴中人以数，乡里甚憎而畏之，莫敢与较。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204893_comment'></div>一日遇女子侯黑于路，据井<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204893", 1204893, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>傍佯</span>，若有所失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204893_comment'></div>白怪而问焉，黑曰：「不幸堕珥于井，其直百金，有能取之，当分半以谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204893_comment'></div>夫子独无意乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204893_comment'></div>白良久计曰：「彼女子亡珥，得珥固可绐而勿与」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204893_comment'></div>因许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204893_comment'></div>脱衣井旁，缒而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204893_comment'></div>黑度白已至水，则尽取其衣亟去，莫知所涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204893_comment'></div>故今闽人呼相卖曰：「我已侯白，伊更侯黑」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204893_comment'></div>余谓二侯皆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1204893", 1204893, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>俚巷</span>滑稽之民，适相遭而角其技势，固不得不然，于其所亲戚游旧，未必尔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204893_comment'></div>而今世荐绅之士，閒居负道德，矜仁义，羞汉唐而不谈，真若无徇于世者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204893_comment'></div>一旦爵位显于朝，名声彰于时，稍迫利害，则释易而趋险，叛友而诬亲，挤人而售己，更相伺候，若弈棋然，唯恐计谋之不工，侥倖一切之胜，而曾白黑之不若者，武相仍，袂相属也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204893_comment'></div>则二侯之事，亦何所怪哉？</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1204893_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年8月22日</a>　闰八月二十二日，苏轼到颍州任，谓少游近致一场闹剧。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年</a>　是时，秦观有献东坡诗一首，或云秦少章作。<br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_3_1204758_comment'></div>璞献者三，竟为美瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204758_comment'></div>虽邅回之可叹，建遭际以尤荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204758_comment'></div>而观者，昔陪绛帐之生，近被棘闱之属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204758_comment'></div>儿宽早岁，尝为褚大之徒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204758_comment'></div>梦得晚年，翻作奇章之客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204758_comment'></div>矧惟季弟，又获同年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204758_comment'></div>交情既重于他人，喜气亦殊于他日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204758_comment'></div>追惟二纪，有同梦寐之游；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204758_comment'></div>复会一时，如阅简编之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204758_comment'></div>未修鄙牍，遽辱华缄，感佩之私，敷陈罔既。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1204758_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年</a>　是岁，秦观有诗寄少仪。作品：寄少仪弟（一隔音尘月屡迁）<div id='poem_199440' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199440' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199440?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄少仪弟</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199440")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199440_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199440'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199440'>一隔音尘月屡迁，忽收来问涕潸然。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199440'>栖迟册府吾如昨，流落江村汝可怜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199440'>梦里漫成池草句，愁来空诵棣华篇。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199440'>卑飞暂尔无多恨，会有高风送上天。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199440'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199440_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年</a>　是岁，秦观有俞紫芝字序，述道家思想。<div id='poem_1204895' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204895' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204895?labeling=true' target='_blank'>俞紫芝字序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204895")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204895_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204895'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204895'>余昔游玉笥山，周行二十四峰，访萧子云故隐，道见灵芝焉，生乎磐石之上，回环而有叶，秀泽而不根，信天下之异草也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204895_comment'></div>窃爱久之，留不能去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204895_comment'></div>俄有童子朱颜绀发，自松阴中，距石辄止，抚芝叹曰：「嘻，道人无本，其亦如是矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204895_comment'></div>余异而问曰：「适吾子有绪言，不敏未知所谓，愿终其说」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204895_comment'></div>童子笑曰：「子求终乎，终之久矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204895_comment'></div>以为未耶，没身无终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204895_comment'></div>虽然，尝试为汝言其崖略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204895_comment'></div>夫<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1204895", 1204895, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>德人</span>以有本为宗，道人以无本为宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204895_comment'></div>天下皆知有物所以失己也，不知有己所以失己也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204895_comment'></div>而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1204895", 1204895, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>德人</span>知之，于是内观无是，外观无彼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204895_comment'></div>无是故能以己为物，无彼故能以物为己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204895_comment'></div>己物不二，谓之真一，夫是谓以有本为宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204895_comment'></div>天下皆知有伪所以丧真也，不知有真所以丧真也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204895_comment'></div>而道人知之，于是前际无舍，后际无取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204895_comment'></div>无舍故不断一切伪，无取故不住一切真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204895_comment'></div>真伪两忘，亦无真一，夫是之谓以无本为宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204895_comment'></div>盖非有本，则不能离相而归空；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204895_comment'></div>非无本，则不能即空而證实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204895_comment'></div>有本然后明心，无本然后见性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204895_comment'></div>夫子识之，人间所谓道德者，固不出乎此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204895_comment'></div>虽然，有本无本，吾岂能识之哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204895_comment'></div>语未既，有老人复杖策自松阴中来，顾谓童子曰：「适何所言」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204895_comment'></div>童子欲语，老人引杖击之，童子走松阴，忽然不见，还视老人，亦以亡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204895_comment'></div>于是余<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1204895", 1204895, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>茫然自失</span>，私识其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204895_comment'></div>后九年游京师，遇金华居士俞紫芝，请余改字，因思昔日玉笥童子之言，字曰无本，复以其说为序赠焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1204895_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年</a>　是岁，秦观有一丛花词，咏李师师；又赋满园花词，以俚语写艳情。作品：一丛花（年时今鹰爪见师师）满园花（一向沉吟久）<div id='poem_199686' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199686' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199686?labeling=true' target='_blank'>一丛花</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199686")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199686_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199686'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199686'>年时今夜见师师，双颊酒红滋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199686'>疏帘半卷微灯外，露华上、烟袅凉飔。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199686'>簪髻乱抛，偎人不起，弹泪唱新词。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199686_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199686'>佳期。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199686'>谁料久参差。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199686'>愁绪暗<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_199686", 199686, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>萦丝</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199686'>想应妙舞清歌罢，又还对、秋色嗟咨。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199686'>惟有画楼，当时明月，两处照相思。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_199686_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199760' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199760' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199760?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_1_199760_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199760'>我当初不合、苦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_199760", 199760, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>撋就</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199760_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199760'><span class='link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年</a>　在京时，秦观曾赋调笑令十首，乃流行于教坊之转踏体。<div id='poem_199748' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199748' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199748")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199748_comment'></div><div 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199749")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199749_comment'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_199494_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199550' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199550' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199550?labeling=true' target='_blank'>调笑令<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span>灼灼</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199550")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199550_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_199550'>诗曰：锦城春暖花欲飞。灼灼当庭舞柘枝。相君上客河东秀，自言那复旁人知。妾愿身为梁上燕。朝朝暮暮长相见。云收月堕海沈沈，泪满红绡寄肠断。</div><div id='poem_preface_199550_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199550'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199550'>肠断。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199550'>绣帘捲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199550'>妾愿身为梁上燕。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199550'>朝朝暮暮长相见。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199550'>莫遣恩迁情变。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199550'>红绡粉泪知何限。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199550'>万古空传遗怨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_199550_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199745' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199745' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199745?labeling=true' target='_blank'>调笑令<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span>盼盼</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199745")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199745_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_199745'>诗曰：百尺楼高燕子飞。楼上美人颦翠眉。将军一去音容远，只有年年旧燕归。春风昨夜来深院。春色依然人不见。只馀明月照孤眠，唯望旧恩空恋恋。</div><div id='poem_preface_199745_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199745'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199745'>恋恋，楼中燕。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199745'>燕子楼空春日晚，将军一去音容远。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199745'>空锁楼中深怨，春风重到人不见。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199745'>十二阑干倚遍。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_199745_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199636' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199636' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199636?labeling=true' target='_blank'>调笑令<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span>莺莺</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199636")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199636_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_199636'>诗曰：崔家有女名莺莺。未识春光先有情。河桥兵乱依萧寺，红愁绿惨见张生。张生一见春情重。明月拂墙花树动。夜半红娘拥抱来，脉脉惊魂若春梦。</div><div id='poem_preface_199636_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199636'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199636'>春梦，神仙洞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199636_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199636'>冉冉拂墙花树动。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199636_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199636'>西厢待月知谁共？<div id='poem_sentence_2_199636_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199636'>更觉玉人情重。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199636_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199636'>红娘深夜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_199636", 199636, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>行云</span>送，困亸钗横金凤。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199636_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_199636'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(199636)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><div id='poem_199744' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199744' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199744?labeling=true' target='_blank'>调笑令<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其八 </span>采莲</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199744")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199744_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_199744'>诗曰：若耶溪边天气秋。采莲女儿溪岸头。笑隔荷花共人语，烟波渺渺荡轻舟。数声水调红娇晚。棹转舟回笑人远。肠断谁家游冶郎，尽日踟蹰临柳岸。</div><div id='poem_preface_199744_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199744'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199744'>柳岸，水清浅。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199744'>笑折荷花呼女伴，盈盈日照新妆面。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199744'>水调空传幽怨，扁舟日暮笑声远。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199744'>对此令人肠断。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_199744_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199746' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199746' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199746?labeling=true' target='_blank'>调笑令<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其九 </span>烟中怨</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199746")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199746_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_199746'>诗曰：鉴湖楼阁与云齐。楼上女儿名阿溪。十五能为绮丽句，平生未解出幽闺。谢郎巧思诗裁剪。能使佳人动幽怨。琼枝璧月结芳期，斗帐双双成眷恋。</div><div id='poem_preface_199746_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199746'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199746'>眷恋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199746_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199746'>西湖岸。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199746_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199746'>湖面楼台侵云汉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199746_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199746'>阿溪本是飞琼伴。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199746_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199746'>风月朱扉斜掩。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199746_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199747' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199747' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199747?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十 </span>离魂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199747_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_199747'>诗曰：深闺女儿娇复痴。春愁春恨那复知。舅兄唯有相拘意，暗想花心临别时。离舟欲解春江暮。冉冉香魂逐君去。重来两身复一身，梦觉春风话心素。</div><div id='poem_preface_199747_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年1月1日</a>　春正月元旦，秦观谒常立子允。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年1月</a>　春正月，陈传道自徐至颍，探其弟师道。过汴时，秦观次其韵二首，并以后一首呈张舜民。作品：次韵陈传道（白发三冬学）次韵陈传道自适兼呈都司芸叟学士（楚国陈夫子）<div id='poem_199401' class='_poem'><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年1月</a>　春初，刘景文自两浙兵马都监擢知隰州，秦观有赠刘使君景文诗，并为其父撰录壮悯刘公遗事。作品：赠刘使君景文（落落衣冠八尺雄）录壮悯刘公遗事。<div id='poem_199472' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199472' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199472?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠刘使君景文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_199472_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199472'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199472'>落落衣冠八尺雄，鱼符新赐大河东。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199472_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199472'>穰苴兵法申司马，曹植诗原出国风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199472_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199472_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204936' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204936' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204936?labeling=true' target='_blank'>录壮悯刘公遗事</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204936")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204936_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204936'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204936'>壮悯刘公未显时，凡三与贼遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204936_comment'></div>始为常州无锡县尉，有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204936", 1204936, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>枭贼</span>刘铁枪者，起浙西，转扰诸郡，捕盗官不能制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204936_comment'></div>公一日沾醉夜归，适报铁枪入境，遂乘酒赴之，与贼接战，手杀铁枪及其徒五人，馀悉散走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204936_comment'></div>部使者上其功，改大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204936_comment'></div>后知果州南充县，丁先太师忧，解官东还，道出兴州境上，遇群贼奄至，掠其行李，发之，惟文书百馀帙，布数匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204936_comment'></div>贼魁詈其徒曰：「此穷官人，何足劫」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204936_comment'></div>公时在后，闻变驰至，瞋目叱之，贼众披靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204936_comment'></div>俄发三矢，辄毙三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204936_comment'></div>馀遂遁去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204936_comment'></div>雍帅寇莱公表其事，诏迁官知泸川，后移倅汝阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204936_comment'></div>过安陆，遇故人留饮，家属先行，复遇盗劫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204936_comment'></div>倒橐，得一银扣剑，洎一䃋石腰带，持去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204936_comment'></div>后贼败于齐安，狱具，法归赃于主，有司以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204936_comment'></div>时陕西转运使员缺，执政方以公进拟，真宗曰：「是人为郡守，而止有一䃋石带，廉可知也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204936_comment'></div>遂除公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204936_comment'></div>行状、墓志及国史本传皆载无锡及兴州事，独安陆一节，遗而不书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204936_comment'></div>元祐壬申岁，公之子隰州使君某，与余会于京师，尝道公之遗事，具以天禧中劄示余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204936_comment'></div>因论次之，附于中劄之后，以补史氏之缺云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1204936_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年2月</a>　二月，秦观弟觏赴仁和主簿，秦观作诗送之。作品：送少章弟赴仁和主簿（我宗本江南）<div id='poem_199604' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199604' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199604?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送少章弟赴仁和主簿</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199604")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199604_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199604'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199604'>我宗本江南，为将门列戟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199604'>中叶徙淮海，不仕但潜德。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199604'>先祖实起家，先君始缝掖。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199604'>议郎为名士，余亦忝词客。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199604'>风流以及汝，三通桂堂籍。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199604'>汝弱不好弄，文章有风<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>格。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199604'>干将入砥砺，騕袅就衔勒。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199604'>勿矜孔鸾姿，不乐栖枳棘。<div id='poem_sentence_10_199604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_199604'>吴中多高士，往往寄老释。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199772'>冉冉来还去，持酒劝云云且住，凭君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_199772", 199772, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>碍断</span>春归路。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_199772_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年3月</a>　又有春日杂兴十首之八，疑亦作于元祐中。作品：春日杂兴十首之八（客从远方来）<div id='poem_199593' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199593' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199593?labeling=true' target='_blank'>春日杂兴十首<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span id='poem_sentence_0_199593'>飘忽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_199593", 199593, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>星气</span>徂，青阳迫迟暮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199593'>鸣飞各有适，赤白纷无数。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199593'>雨砌堕危芳，风轩纳飞絮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199593'>褰帏香雾横，岸帻云峰度。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199593'>林影舞窗扉，池光染衣屦。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199593_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年3月</a>　春，与邓慎思沐于启圣院，遇李端叔，有诗纪其事。作品：与邓慎思沐于启圣遇李端叔（羸兵瘦马犯黄尘）<div id='poem_199486' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199486' class='poemTitle ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年3月</a>　春，秦观有春日寓直有怀参寥诗。作品：春日寓直有怀参寥诗（觚棱金爵自岧峣）<div id='poem_199426' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199426' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199426?labeling=true' target='_blank'>春日寓直有怀参寥</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199426'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199426'>觚棱金爵自岧峣，藏室春深更寂寥。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199426'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199426_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年4月</a>　四月，秦观书曹辅颜鲁公新庙记。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年6月</a>　六月望日，传秦观曾作孙彦同职官分纪叙，附此备考。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年6月</a>　六月丙寅，孙升出守南京，秦观代作谢表。作品：代南京谢上表。<div id='poem_1204721' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204721' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204721?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代南京谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204721")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204721_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204721'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204721'>训词失当，宜正严诛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204721_comment'></div>恩贷特优，止从外补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204721_comment'></div>任忝别都之重，职叨秘殿之华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204721_comment'></div>祗荷宠灵，载深感涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204721_comment'></div>伏念臣猥以一介之贱，误蒙二圣之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204721_comment'></div>本出书生，朝无党援；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204721_comment'></div>屡为御史，身有怨仇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204721_comment'></div>间虽窃于科名，实不长于文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204721_comment'></div>因缘宠数，冒昧班联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204721_comment'></div>既不能被命固辞，以防涯分之过；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204721_comment'></div>又不能先时引去，以避贤俊之升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204721_comment'></div>满器难持，孤根易毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204721_comment'></div>及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1204721", 1204721, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>越樽</span>而求治，果<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1204721", 1204721, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>代斲</span>以致伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204721_comment'></div>然犹冒文儒弄翰之名，玷侍从均劳之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204721_comment'></div>省循备至，侥倖实多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204721_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下盛德海涵，至仁天覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204721_comment'></div>念尝更于任使，遽未忍于弃捐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204721_comment'></div>虽去掖廷，犹分<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1204721", 1204721, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>宫钥</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204721_comment'></div>天都甚迩，常瞻佳气之郁葱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204721_comment'></div>乡国非遥，益见湛恩之汪濊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204721_comment'></div>永期糜溃，用报生成<span class='inlineComment2'>（《淮海集》卷二七。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204721_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1204721'>宋蜀本题下有「孙君孚」三小字。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1204721_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年夏</a>　夏，秦观有和东坡双石诗。作品：和子瞻双石（天镵海滨石）<div id='poem_199560' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199560' class='poemTitle ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　冬至日，哲宗合祭天地于圜丘，秦观进南郊庆成诗并表，且有次韵侍祠南郊诗。作品：进南郊庆成诗并表。次韵侍祠南郊（风马云车下九天）<div id='poem_199479' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199479' id='poem_sentence_20_199479_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204724' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204724' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204724?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进南郊庆成诗表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204724")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204724_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204724'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204724'>右臣伏睹皇帝陛下肇修典礼，冬日之至，亲有事于南郊，仍复祖宗故事，以皇天地祗合祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204724_comment'></div>前期之日，阴云蔽空，将祀之夕，月缠毕宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204724_comment'></div>《诗》云：「月离于毕，俾滂沱矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204724_comment'></div>于法当雨，而是夜开霁，特甚晏温，星月昭明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204724_comment'></div>礼毕之明日，雨雪乃作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204724_comment'></div>朝市郊野相告欣然，颂叹之声形于中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204724_comment'></div>非二圣有作，上当天心，神祇顾享，何以逮此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204724_comment'></div>臣虽疏贱，通籍秘省，预见熙事，不胜犬马区区之情，辄将舆人之颂，撰成《郊礼庆成五言二十韵》诗一首，随状上进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204724_comment'></div>干冒宸严，臣无任瞻天望圣、激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1204724_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199395' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199395' </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199395")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199395_comment'></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　秦观有咏茶词，疑作于元祐间，姑系于此。作品：满庭芳（北苑研膏）<div id='poem_199762' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199762' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年11月</a>　十一月，为南京守孙升代作谢历日表。作品：代谢历日表。<div id='poem_1204723' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204723' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204723?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代谢历日表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204723")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204723_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204723'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204723'>被命守藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204723_comment'></div>方念阙庭之远；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204723_comment'></div>蒙恩告朔，重惊岁月之新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204723_comment'></div>仰服训词，俯增愧汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204723_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下钦崇天道，敬授人时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204723_comment'></div>颁太史之占前，谨清台之课候；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204723_comment'></div>罢诸家之疏远，正历世之缪差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204723_comment'></div>上考邓平，法取黄钟之妙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204723_comment'></div>下参一行，术推大衍之微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204723_comment'></div>斗建龙躔，于焉有序；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204723_comment'></div>珠连璧合，由是可窥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204723_comment'></div>岂惟百辟之奉行，足使四夷之承用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204723_comment'></div>臣猥缘寄委，叨奉宠灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204723_comment'></div>宣布诏条，预识<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1204723", 1204723, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>金穰</span>之岁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204723_comment'></div>省观风俗，不疑绛老之年。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1204723_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　是岁，秦观有四绝赠道流，并有次韵奉酬丹元秦观诗一首，多写道家思想。作品：四绝。次韵奉酬丹元先生（金华紫烟客）<div id='poem_199248' class='_poem'><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　是岁，秦观姑母卒，与姑父李常宁合葬，有李状元墓志铭。<div id='poem_1204943' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204943' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204943?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李状元墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元祐七年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204943")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204943_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204943'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204943'>元祐三年春三月，上始临轩，策有司所贡士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204943_comment'></div>被选者凡数百人，而廪延李君为第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204943_comment'></div>君讳常宁，字安邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204943_comment'></div>自嘉祐中举进士，数为春官所却。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204943_comment'></div>至是，始获奉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1204943", 1204943, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>大对</span>于廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204943_comment'></div>上刺六经之文，旁猎百氏之言，下通当世之务，其词奥衍，有汉唐之遗风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204943_comment'></div>进御一读，遂为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1204943", 1204943, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>举首</span>，天下莫不异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204943_comment'></div>是时朝廷耇老谋王体、断国论者，皆累朝旧臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204943_comment'></div>君于斯时，年踰知命，褎然得隽于翰墨之场，世以为万户侯如以契券取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204943_comment'></div>而君释褐授宣义郎、签书镇海军节度判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204943_comment'></div>是岁六月以疾卒，享年五十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204943_comment'></div>有司以闻，诏赐钱三十万恤其家，天下莫不悲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204943_comment'></div>君困于科举盖三十年，其得名宦才数月尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204943_comment'></div>呜呼，何起之难而偾之易邪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204943_comment'></div>然君子疾没世而名不称焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204943_comment'></div>君以诸生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1204943", 1204943, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>崛兴</span>，名动海内，其视碌碌无闻而殁者，亦可以无憾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204943_comment'></div>君结发学问，晚而弥励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204943_comment'></div>事亲孝，于二弟友爱，为人恭俭洁廉，其取予，一毫不妄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204943_comment'></div>曾祖讳益，祖讳知进，世居开封禀延，不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204943_comment'></div>考讳永昌，始仕为从事郎、鼎州司户参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204943_comment'></div>夫人秦氏，先大父承议之女，后君四年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204943_comment'></div>虽除君丧，犹布衣蔬食，以终其身，平生端烈类如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204943_comment'></div>子二人：长曰弼，有学行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204943_comment'></div>次未名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204943_comment'></div>女二人，尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204943_comment'></div>以卒之年，葬于开封府雍丘县大善乡裴村西谷山林之原先府君之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204943_comment'></div>初，君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1204943", 1204943, "Clauses/69/Comments/0")'>襄事</span>期迫，不暇纳幽堂之铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204943_comment'></div>逮夫人祔葬，始镵铭而纳之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204943_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1204943'>帝初临轩，策士于廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204943_comment'></div>有器晚成，冠我群英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204943_comment'></div>大道孔夷，其御又良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204943_comment'></div>阊阖玉堂，行矣翱翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204943_comment'></div>庆者在门，吊者在闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204943_comment'></div>胡亟只且，世为嗟吁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1204943_comment'></div>如霆忽厉，风雨奄至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1204943_comment'></div>俛仰而阙，孰知其自？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1204943_comment'></div>大椿久荣，朝菌暂敷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1204943_comment'></div>竟复何殊，同于空虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1204943_comment'></div>隋渠之壖，杞国之疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1204943_comment'></div>佳城苍苍，刻文是藏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1204943_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年春</a>　春，与米元章游，有次韵答米元章、次韵米元章斋居即事二诗。作品：次韵答米元章（嗜好清无滓）次韵米元章斋居即事（庭木双株茂）<div id='poem_199535' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199535' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199535?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵答米元章</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199535")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199535_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199535'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199535'>嗜好清无滓，周旋粲有文。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199535_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
