id='poem_sentence_2_199535_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199535'>惟应读雌蜺，差不愧王筠。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199535_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199535'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199535_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199392' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199392' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199392?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵米元章斋居即事</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199392")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199392_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199392'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199392'>庭木双株茂，盆池一掬悭。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199392_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199392'>支颐鱼出乐，入眦鸟知还。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199392_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199392'>老境行将及，仙书读未闲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199392_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199392'>因君歌凤过，通昔梦归山。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199392_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199392'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199392_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年春</a>　春，冯如晦出守梓州，秦观有送冯梓州序。<div id='poem_1204806' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204806' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204806?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送冯梓州序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204806")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204806_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204806'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204806'>上即位之明年，有诏侍从之官各举部使者二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204806_comment'></div>故龙图阁直学士滕公与二三耆老，皆以冯侯叔明应诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204806_comment'></div>即日除陕西路提点刑狱公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204806_comment'></div>观尝问于滕公曰：「冯侯何如人」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204806_comment'></div>公曰：「有守君子也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204806_comment'></div>观曰：「何以知之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204806_comment'></div>公曰：「昔高平范公之帅环庆也，环将种古以宁守史籍变其熟羌狱，上书讼冤，且言高平公不法者七事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204806_comment'></div>朝廷疑之，即宁州置狱，而冯侯以御史推直，实奉诏往讯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204806_comment'></div>是时高平公坐言事去，执政有恶之者，欲中以危法久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204806_comment'></div>此狱之起，人皆为惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204806_comment'></div>及冯侯召对，神宗曰：「帅臣不法，万一有之，恐误边事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204806_comment'></div>然范纯仁为时名卿，宜审治，所以遣吏者，政恐有差误耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204806_comment'></div>即赐绯衣银鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204806_comment'></div>冯侯拜赐出，执政谓曰：「上怒庆帅甚，君其慎之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204806_comment'></div>冯侯曰：「上意亦无他」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204806_comment'></div>因诵所闻德音，执政不悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204806_comment'></div>及考按连逮，熟羌之狱实不可变，而古所言高平公七事皆无状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204806_comment'></div>附置以闻，执政殊失望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204806_comment'></div>会史籍有异词，诏遣韩晋卿覆治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204806_comment'></div>执政因言范纯仁事亦恐治未竟，愿令晋卿尽覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204806_comment'></div>神宗曰：「范纯仁事已明白，勿复治也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204806_comment'></div>狱具，如冯侯章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204806_comment'></div>于是籍、古皆得罪，而高平公独免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204806_comment'></div>执政大不快。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204806_comment'></div>未几高平公复为邻帅所奏，谪守信阳，而冯侯失用事者意，亦竟罢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204806_comment'></div>繇是言之，非有守君子而何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204806_comment'></div>观曰：「如公所云，殆古之遗直也，岂特部使者而已哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204806_comment'></div>后六年，冯侯自尚书郎出守梓潼，加集贤校理，实始相识，质其事信然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204806_comment'></div>呜呼，古语有之：「人能胜天，天定亦能胜人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204806_comment'></div>信斯言也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204806_comment'></div>方高平公被诬，上有明天子之无私，下有良使者之不挠，可以免矣，而二三子表里为奸，始终巧请，至于抵罪而后已，可不谓人能胜天乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204806_comment'></div>然当时所谓用事之臣与诸附丽之者，今日屈指数之，几人为能无恙？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204806_comment'></div>而高平公方以故相之重，保釐西洛郊，冯侯亦通籍儒馆，持节乡郡，其福禄寿考，功业未艾也，可不谓天定亦能胜人乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204806_comment'></div>冯侯将行，同舍之士二十有八人，饯饮于慈孝佛寺，又相属赋诗，而观以拙陋，所欲言者，不能尽之于诗，乃以旧闻，并以尝所感叹者，为序赠之。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1204806'></div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1204806_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年4月</a>　夏四月，为祖无颇作祖氏先茔芝记。<div id='poem_1204906' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204906' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204906?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祖氏先茔芝记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204906")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204906_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204906'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204906'>大夫祖公无颇，自西蜀使者，得请以崇福祠官燕居于蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204906_comment'></div>将还朝，谓高邮秦观曰：「祖氏本幽州之范阳，晋将军逖实我远祖，其后稍徙深州，至道间始来居蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204906_comment'></div>今汝阳县阳安乡十里冈之源，则我先府君之墓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204906_comment'></div>元丰初，有芝数十本产于茔中，其后岁岁有之，迨今不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204906_comment'></div>夫岂一气之运，偶然感发，莫诘其所以然耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204906_comment'></div>抑天时人事之际，或有以致之也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204906_comment'></div>子其为我记之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204906_comment'></div>观曰：草之有芝，犹鸟之有凤，兽之有麟，从古相传，以为瑞物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204906_comment'></div>今乃岁生于先茔之中者，殆汝南和气之应，祖氏方大之祥，其非偶然，决也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204906_comment'></div>何以明之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204906_comment'></div>汝南在汉为佳郡，陈蕃、黄宪、二许、诸袁之徒，实皆郡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204906_comment'></div>俗尚风节，轻势利，士不守道，则妻妾耻之，故天下号汝南为名氏之区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204906_comment'></div>迨唐之世，始建彰义节度使，屯宿重兵，而李希烈、吴元济、秦宗权之属，盗有其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204906_comment'></div>王泽不流，民氓无知，父以弄兵诏子，兄以杀人诲弟，故天下号淮西为盗贼之薮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204906_comment'></div>皇朝受命，定都大梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204906_comment'></div>蔡去京师七驿，遂为辅郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204906_comment'></div>百馀年间，良二千石接武而至，兴学校，修贡举，以宣布教化，故盛德尊行、魁奇俊伟之才，相继出焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204906_comment'></div>盖唐之旧俗浸微，而汉之遗风复起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204906_comment'></div>当此之时，祖氏一门，显者数人，府君之仲弟士衡，掌诰掖垣，从子无择通籍内阁，大夫践更中外，为省名郎，作时肤使，行且登用，诸子森然，多有植立，其庆未艾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204906_comment'></div>由是言之，芝为汝南和气之应，祖氏方大之祥，岂不信然？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204906_comment'></div>昔新丰市李兴庐于父之墓左，有紫芝白芝二本生于庐上，柳宗元以为孝治神化，阴中其心，克致斯事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204906_comment'></div>矧今芝出于股肱之郡，侍从之家也哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204906_comment'></div>宜得一时文学之士，比物属辞，归美于上，度为乐歌，荐之郊庙，追配元封《斋房》之篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204906_comment'></div>观也何足以与于此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204906_comment'></div>姑承大夫之命，论次其事，以备作者采择而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204906_comment'></div>府君讳士龙，字德骧云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204906_comment'></div>元祐八年四月吉日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1204906_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1204906'><span class='label'>按：</span>《淮海集》卷三八。又见康熙《上蔡县志》卷一五，《古今图书集成》职方典卷四七六、草木典卷四九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1204906_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年5月</a>　五月壬辰，谏官劾东坡，秦观亦在被弹之列，诏不许。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年5月</a>　五月，延平黄裳有二诗赠秦观，秦观次其韵。作品：次韵黄冕仲寄题顺兴步云阁（故山无期大刀头）次韵黄冕仲寄题延平泠风阁（泠风三伏是清秋）<div id='poem_199533' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199533' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199533?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵黄冕仲寄题顺兴步云阁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199533")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199533_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199533'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199533'>故山无期大刀头，黄尘溽暑未罢休。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199533_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199533'>步云之篇忽我投，便见冰玉悬清秋。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199533_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199533'>顺兴山川甲闽瓯，无风万壑松飕飕。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199533_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199533'>步云之人人品优，御风御寇真其俦。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199533_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199533'>仙人乘槎凌斗牛，回环十见天星周。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199533_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199533'>猿鹤忽惊空蕙帐，周家正要磻溪望。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199533_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199533'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_199533_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199419' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199419' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199419?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和黄冕仲寄题延平泠风阁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199419")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199419_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199419'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199419'>泠风三伏是清秋，虽有炎蒸不汝留。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199419_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199419'>满地溪山归藻井，有时丝管下沧洲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199419_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199419'>快哉便得逍遥趣，偶尔还成汗漫游。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199419_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199419'>谁为发挥无妙手，赋凌楚玉有家丘。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199419_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199419'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199419_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年5月</a>　五月，文彦博子及甫权工部侍郎，秦观代作谢表。作品：代工部文侍郎谢表。<div id='poem_1204718' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204718' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204718?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代工部文侍郎谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204718")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204718_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204718'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204718'>入司太仆，已惭称效之虚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204718_comment'></div>进贰冬官，尤愧选抡之误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204718_comment'></div>顾叨尘之已甚，念辞避之弗容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204718_comment'></div>承命惟惊，抚躬以惧<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204718_comment'></div>伏念臣身承家训，世受国恩，荷先朝特达之知，蒙二圣生成之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204718_comment'></div>左选都司之要，既获备员；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204718_comment'></div>内阁秘殿之严，更容通籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204718_comment'></div>以至外专两郡，内阅三卿，徒为岁月之淹，莫见事功之举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204718_comment'></div>方虞罢黜，退伏于田庐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204718_comment'></div>敢意推迁，遽陪于法从？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204718_comment'></div>材微任过，恩重报难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204718_comment'></div>此盖伏遇盛德海涵，至仁天覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204718_comment'></div>以臣父某历四朝而被遇，登三事以退居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204718_comment'></div>知父子至情，欲慰桑榆之景；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204718_comment'></div>念君臣难遇，遂收菅蒯之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204718_comment'></div>岂惟一敝族之荣，时乃百执事之劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204718_comment'></div>臣敢不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1204718", 1204718, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>鞭策</span>驽蹇，淬砺钝顽，以捐躯报国之诚，为竭力事亲之义。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1204718_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年6月</a>　六月甲寅，叔父定为江南东路转运判官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年6月</a>　六月乙丑，秦观复擢为正字，有谢馆职启。<div id='poem_1204737' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204737' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204737?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢馆职启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204737")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204737_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204737'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204737'>法同博士，阅五载而迁官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204737_comment'></div>例比编书，通三年而改秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204737_comment'></div>宠灵既逮，愧惧实深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204737_comment'></div>伏念某族系单微，器能浅陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204737_comment'></div>少时好赋，仅成童子之雕虫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204737_comment'></div>中岁穷经，未究古人之糟粕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204737_comment'></div>始策名于进士，俄充赋于直言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204737_comment'></div>滥居方物之前，叨被传车之召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204737_comment'></div>文章末技，固非道义之尊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204737_comment'></div>箕斗虚名，祇取谤伤之速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204737_comment'></div>亟从引避，几至颠隮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204737_comment'></div>褒未就于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1204737", 1204737, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>衮华</span>，恶已成于疮痏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204737_comment'></div>三期之内，王尊乍佞而乍贤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204737_comment'></div>七年之中，鲁田一与而一夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204737_comment'></div>但以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1204737", 1204737, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>偏亲</span>垂老，生计屡空，聊复腼颜以居，未能投劾而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204737_comment'></div>日期沙汰，分绝进升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204737_comment'></div>岂期积日以累劳，辄亦逢年而遇合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204737_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1204737", 1204737, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>束缊还妇</span>，虽蒙假借之私；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204737_comment'></div>惩羹吹齑，尚虑谴诃之及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204737_comment'></div>窃观前史，具见鄙宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204737_comment'></div>西蜀中郎，孔明呼为学士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204737_comment'></div>东海钓客，建封任以校书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204737_comment'></div>虽为将相之品题，实匪朝廷之选用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204737_comment'></div>夫何寡陋，遽有遭逢？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204737_comment'></div>此盖伏遇某官道欲济时，仁能锡类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204737_comment'></div>始怜贫女，稍分秦壁之光；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204737_comment'></div>终念播臣，为激越江之水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204737_comment'></div>矧兹奇蹇，亦与甄收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204737_comment'></div>敢不以古人行己之方，为国士报君之义？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204737_comment'></div>千金弊帚，聊依翰墨以自娱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204737_comment'></div>一割铅刀，或冀事功之可立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204737_comment'></div>过此以往，未知所裁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1204737_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年6月</a>　夏，同馆吕大临卒，秦观有挽章四首。作品：吕与叔挽章四首（举举西州士；数日音容隔；追惟献岁发春间；风流云散了无余）<div id='poem_199372' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199372' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199372?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吕与叔挽章四首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199372")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199372_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199372'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199372'>举举西州士，来为邦国华。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1204711_comment'></div>重念臣少而愚贱，长更屯奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204711_comment'></div>积累岁时，尚虑人情之未与；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204711_comment'></div>超踰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1204711", 1204711, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>涯分</span>，岂为物议之所容？<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204711_comment'></div>况儒馆之中，资任高于臣者不少；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204711_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1204711", 1204711, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>班行</span>之内，学术过于臣者甚多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204711_comment'></div>与其容菲薄以滥居，不若择英豪而改授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204711_comment'></div>伏望圣慈，追寝新命，检会臣近申三省，除臣一外任差遣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1204711_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: -----title
无锡
-----detail

苏州（吴县）

绍兴（会稽）

"poem_title_199452")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199452_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199452'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199452_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199452'>溪傍五云清逗玉，松分八面翠成宫。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199452_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199452'>归途父老欣相语，今日程公昔谢公。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199452_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199452'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199452_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199377' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199377' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199377?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵公辟会流觞亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年夏秋间）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199377")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199377_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199377'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199377'>偷引湖光一派飞，咏<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>觞还却似当时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199377'>吴歌送酒随流急，越艳浮花转曲池。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199377'>山庙早因前守彻，冰盘元是故工遗。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199377'>年年禊饮今非昔，不到兰亭到北池。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199377'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_199377'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_199377_0'>⑴ 原作泳，据各本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_199377_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_199328' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199328' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199328?labeling=true' target='_blank'>圆通院白衣阁<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年夏秋间）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199328")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_199328_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_199328_0'>① 按：原收三首，底本目录作“和圆通院白衣阁二首”，并注唱首诗附；文本题下注：“公辟首唱”。第一首应为程师孟诗，今删入存目。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199328'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199328'>无边刹境一毫端，同住澄清<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_199328", 199328, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>觉海</span>间。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199328'>还似此花并此叶，坏空成住未曾闲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199328'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_199328_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199619' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199619' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199619?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年夏秋间）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_199619_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199619'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199619'>一根反本六根同，古佛传家有此风。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199619'>满目红蕖参翠盖，不唯门里获圆通。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199619_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199619'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_199619_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年夏</a>　夏，得参寥子自杭所寄诗。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='1c4ab13b82804cb1978659db6fb9ec45_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1c4ab13b82804cb1978659db6fb9ec45");'><span id='1c4ab13b82804cb1978659db6fb9ec45_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>，31岁</div><div id='1c4ab13b82804cb1978659db6fb9ec45' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年秋</a>　回越，适宝林寺修复，秦观有诗文。作品：录宝林事实。宝林寺开堂疏。代程给事乞祝圣表。观宝林塔张灯次胡瑗韵。<div id='poem_1204898' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204898' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204898?labeling=true' target='_blank'>录宝林事实</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204898")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204898_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204898'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204898'>宝林禅院始于宋元徽中，浮图惠基得郡人皮道舆所施宅，因山以造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204898_comment'></div>梁大同中赐号宝林寺，唐会昌中废，乾符中复兴，更号应天寺，本朝因之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204898_comment'></div>其山一名宝林，一名飞来，一名龟山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204898_comment'></div>上有鳗井，岁旱祷雨辄应，事见图记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204898_comment'></div>熙宁十年八月丙申，一夕火，栋宇灰烬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204898_comment'></div>十月，给事中集贤修撰程公来领州事，登其山故址而叹悼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204898_comment'></div>于是郡之衣冠缁素数十人诣州自陈，请修复故寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204898_comment'></div>公为具其事以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204898_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1204898", 1204898, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>逾月</span>，赐号宝林禅院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204898_comment'></div>遂以明年三月兴工，复率僚属亲至其上劝劳之，众皆感激思奋，奔走承事，下至刮摩塼石之技，咸尽其能，而贫富各以财力施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204898_comment'></div>其制盖即山巅为多宝塔，塔有环屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204898_comment'></div>其北为罗汉殿，殿旁如塔之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204898_comment'></div>其南降而夷山腹为法堂，法堂之东为寝堂，又东为方丈，又降而南得平地，为佛大殿，殿有两庑以达于东西序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204898_comment'></div>前为三门，其左则钟楼、幡刹、厨库之所相望也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204898_comment'></div>其右则转轮、经藏、僧堂之所相属也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204898_comment'></div>缭以高垣，甃以方甓，未踰再期，而金石土木之观侈于旧三倍，都人士女俯仰瞻叹，疑有神鬼相之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204898_comment'></div>凡吴越之间，塔庙以火废者，其复未有如宝林之遽者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204898_comment'></div>盖越之城南左右数十里，疾驰屹立，皆属于秦望，而秦望又率其左右之山，因鉴水谒于越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204898_comment'></div>越城之中，能与秦望为主客者凡三山：卧龙，宝林，蕺山也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204898_comment'></div>卧龙为郡守所治，而蕺山少东，不能正受秦望之谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204898_comment'></div>是越之形势，自卧龙已下，未有如宝林者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204898_comment'></div>其地如此，宜其废不踰时而复兴矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204898_comment'></div>方寺之未火时，便房曲道，各自为家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204898_comment'></div>山川之胜，蔽亏隔阂者十六七，而前世词臣才士，如元稹、李绅、徐浩之徒，犹诵叹不已，见于篇章，矧今制度一新，神工天巧，廓然披露，可以岸巾凭几而尽得之，使数子而在，其所诵叹又可知已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204898_comment'></div>然则前日之废，岂非所以为今日之兴乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204898_comment'></div>公一日率宾客至其上，顾谓观曰：「宝林之中兴，天也，余何力焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204898_comment'></div>虽然，不可使其事掩抑，不少概见于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204898_comment'></div>前日赐号，革为十方，集贤孙公既为之记矣，今栋宇垂备，将乞文于集贤林公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204898_comment'></div>子亦与见吾事者也，盍摭厥实以请，庶几二集贤之文相与传于无穷，不亦韪欤」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204898_comment'></div>观承命，掇其大概，并公之意而次之，号曰《宝林事实》，以献诸集贤云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1204898_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204982' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204982' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204982?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宝林寺开堂疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204982")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204982_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204982'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204982'>弥勒开门，惟善财而能入；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204982_comment'></div>毗耶丈室，非摩诘以难居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204982_comment'></div>宝林禅院，南宋遗区，东吴胜概。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204982_comment'></div>本惠休翻经之地，实澄观隶业之坊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204982_comment'></div>法水湾环，妙峰孤秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204982_comment'></div>下奁玉鉴，涵日月于昏明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204982_comment'></div>傍穴金虬，化风雷于呼吸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204982_comment'></div>既川源之绣错，仍丹雘之鼎新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204982_comment'></div>飞阁浮阶，就山为势；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204982_comment'></div>方疏圆井，因水成姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204982_comment'></div>即之而智慧生，望之而尘劳破。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204982_comment'></div>九重雁塔，现多宝之庄严；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204982_comment'></div>万石鲸钟，示观音之方便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204982_comment'></div>允非开士，难称觉场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204982_comment'></div>大师雅称圣箭，素号禅关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204982_comment'></div>投虎峰而出家，遇龙浮而得法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204982_comment'></div>祖师衣钵，昔因书壁而传；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204982_comment'></div>首座山林，今以跃瓶而获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204982_comment'></div>了无异议，实有圣缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204982_comment'></div>往开大总持门，以继铄迦罗眼。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1204982_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204726' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204726' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204726?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代程给事乞祝圣表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204726")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204726_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204726'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204726'>本州管内，旧有应天寺者，造于宋元徽中，其地据宝林山巅，南直秦望，北负卧龙，蕺山挟其左，鉴水趋其前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204726_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204726", 1204726, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>圜视</span>井邑，如阅图画，越之形胜，十得六七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204726_comment'></div>比于熙宁十年八月遇火，金石土木之观，一夕殆尽，楼观宫室，化为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1204726", 1204726, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>丘墟</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204726_comment'></div>父老过之，徜徉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1204726", 1204726, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>悼叹</span>，若失所依凭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204726_comment'></div>因相率诣州自陈，愿以私钱修复故寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204726_comment'></div>本州寻具其事上闻，仍乞易为十方，蒙朝廷报可，赐号宝林禅院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204726_comment'></div>于是郡之衣冠缁素，无不悦豫鼓舞，以谋报上，因大出力财，争先请奋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204726_comment'></div>浮图栋宇，次第告成，曾未踰年，已复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1204726", 1204726, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>旧观</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204726_comment'></div>盖所据之地胜，故兴也易；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204726_comment'></div>所遭之时盛，故成也速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204726_comment'></div>不然何以至是哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204726_comment'></div>谨按宝林禅院，其地本名龟山，前世文士见于篇章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204726_comment'></div>上有鳗井，岁旱祷雨辄应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204726_comment'></div>臣等窃以为：龟，神物也，有先事之智，而寿踰千岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204726_comment'></div>鳗，龙类也，有施泽之仁，而功被万物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204726_comment'></div>位正南方，与时相见；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204726_comment'></div>势出人境，足以有临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204726_comment'></div>稽之于名，效之于物，参之于方位，考之于形势，而酌之于民情，理从事顺，实宜永为颂祝陛下圣寿之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204726_comment'></div>臣等自今后，每遇同天节，只于本院启建道场及祷祠雨泽吉祥斋供。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204726_comment'></div>其馀官中道场，并不令于本院启建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204726_comment'></div>夫下达士民之愿，上报君父之恩，臣子之职也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204726_comment'></div>臣等荷国厚恩，无以答生成之万一，庶几因缘塔庙，少伸犬马之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204726_comment'></div>仰瞻阙庭，不胜大愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204726_comment'></div>伏望圣慈，特赐俞允。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1204726_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199476' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199476' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199476?labeling=true' target='_blank'>观宝林塔张灯次胡瑗韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年秋）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199476")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_199476_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199476'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199476'>飞来峰上塔，然蜜<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>奉慈观。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199476_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199476'>互照三山<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>冢，分辉七宝栏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199476_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199476'>势擎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_199476", 199476, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>金界</span>迥，影蘸玉奁寒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199476_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199476'>次第边烽举，高低祭烛攒。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199476_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199476'>虹旌排阵堞，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_199476", 199476, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>火伞</span>御灵官。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199476_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199476'>魏乘珠千颗，隋帆锦万端。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1204985_comment'></div>次则香严童子，得罗汉而證圆通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204985_comment'></div>觉至性之清严，破尘寰之浊秽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204985_comment'></div>肆求<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1204985", 1204985, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>善友</span>，同结<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_5_1204985_comment'></div>规模既远，誓愿尤长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204985_comment'></div>若秣若圆，得无碍法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204985_comment'></div>非烟非火，转不退轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204985_comment'></div>偶就印以成文，常干空而作盖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204985_comment'></div>无前后去来之际，有解脱知见之因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204985_comment'></div>晔乎若光明之云，佳哉如郁葱之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204985_comment'></div>反闻闻性，八百之功德以成；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204985_comment'></div>自觉觉他，亿万之河沙斯遍。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1204985_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　为纪念赵抃、赵概及程师孟，秦观有三老堂诗及越州请立程给事祠堂状。作品：三老堂。越州请立程给事祠堂状。<div id='poem_199484' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199484' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199484?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三老堂<span class='inlineComment2'>（赵少师、张少保、赵通议）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199484")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199484_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199484'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199484'>堂堂三元老，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_199484", 199484, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>业履</span>冠俦匹。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199484'>至今领麾地，讴吟遍蓬荜。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199484'>酬献<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>埃壒外，珠玉在挥笔。<div id='poem_sentence_10_199484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_199484'>风标傲松鹤，颜发移丹漆。<div id='poem_sentence_11_199484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_199484'>邈然超世姿，彷佛得十七。<div id='poem_sentence_13_199484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_199484'>辟廱礼寂灭，麟阁事萧瑟。<div id='poem_sentence_14_199484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_199484'>兹焉出民愿，名实更炳蔚。<div id='poem_sentence_15_199484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_199484'>琬琰琢<span class='inlineComment2'>（文本作瑑）</span>高词，龙兰燎深室。<div id='poem_sentence_16_199484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_199484'>福履既所绥，光华无终毕。<div id='poem_sentence_17_199484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_199484'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_199484_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_199484'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_199484_0'>⑴ 张本、四库本作献酬</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_199484_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1204731' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204731' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204731?labeling=true' target='_blank'>越州请立程给事祠堂状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204731")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204731_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204731'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204731'>浙水之东七州，独越为都会，凡七州之军事督焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204731_comment'></div>其地西带江，北被海，多雄山杰泽，有桑麻鱼稻、藤荈竹箭之饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204731_comment'></div>土沃而流，水清而不迫，非舟车足力所会，故其民喜耕耨，勤织纴，尊本而薄末，狡狯诋欺之弊，视他州为少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204731_comment'></div>然以险阻之故，豪强恶少、跌宕不逞之民，一失其业，则往往什聚伍行，剽攘攻劫于江海之上，不时去之，则蔓延而成大盗矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204731_comment'></div>为太守者，审知风俗之厚，刑政并修，则一方可以指麾而治，不然虽惫力劳心，犹无益也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204731_comment'></div>熙宁十年，诏以给事中、集贤殿修撰广平程公知军州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204731_comment'></div>公素以治行称天下，越人无不踊跃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1204731", 1204731, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>竦企</span>，愿见公之所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204731_comment'></div>及至，政尚简肃，不为苟且苛细之事，事至而后必行，亦无所假借。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204731_comment'></div>发隐擿伏，敏捷如神，每得所谓豪强恶少、跌宕不逞之民，草斩而兽逐之，至断绝乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204731_comment'></div>于是距吴际闽、楚，千里肃然，盗贼不敢发，川行途止，如即其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204731_comment'></div>狱讼衰息，风雨时至，仍岁大穰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204731_comment'></div>乃礼贤俊，仁耆孤，简练士卒，缮修官寺，至于邮亭刻漏，为之一新，颓废<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1204731", 1204731, "Clauses/57/Comments/0")'>偃僵</span>，斩然俱起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204731_comment'></div>然后知公之才，所遇纵横无穷，其所厌伏东西、逆销变故于未形者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204731_comment'></div>非特越人受其赐也，使行且大用于朝，推其道于天下，则其所就者，又可量耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204731_comment'></div>先是，太子少保南阳赵公有惠政于越，既去而公承其后，故议者谓近世越州之政，未有如二公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204731_comment'></div>南阳公尝命画史图太子少师天水赵公并公与己游从之像，号三老图，而越之好事者遂作三老堂以寘之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204731_comment'></div>元丰二年公还朝，郡之衣冠、缁黄、耆艾之士若干人，乞留于部使者，三为之上，不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204731_comment'></div>因相与泣曰：「公去矣，其像虽存于三老堂，然吾人之心未厌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204731_comment'></div>闻公尝帅洪、福、广三郡，三郡皆有生祠，岂越独无有？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204731_comment'></div>今宝林院者，公之所兴建也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204731_comment'></div>若即其地为堂立公之像，如三郡故事，以慰吾人之思，不亦可乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204731_comment'></div>众曰：「然」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204731_comment'></div>于是又以状白使者，请立公之祠堂焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204731_comment'></div>是时某适自淮南来省亲，将还，越人谓某曰：「吾州更<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1204731", 1204731, "Clauses/100/Comments/1")'>饥歉</span>札疠之后，程公实抚养而教诲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204731_comment'></div>去年冬，福州太守司谏孙公尝道于此，具见其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204731_comment'></div>今祠堂成有日矣，谋为记，宜莫如孙公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204731_comment'></div>闻子与孙公乡里且门人也，盍摭厥实以为我请乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204731_comment'></div>某既叹程公之政有以媚于民，又嘉越人能大其施而推报之也，乃为论次其事，并州之风俗具而载之，以备孙公之采择焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1204731_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　赵抃守杭、程师孟守越，有会稽唱和诗，秦观为之手写二十二镵诸石，并有序。作品：会稽唱和诗序。<div id='poem_1204811' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204811' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204811?labeling=true' target='_blank'>会稽唱和诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204811")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204811_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204811'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204811'>给事中、集贤殿修撰、广平程公守越之二年，南阳赵公自杭以太子少保致仕，道越以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204811_comment'></div>南阳公与广平公其登进士第也为同年，其守浙东西也为邻国，又皆喜登临，乐吟赋，故其雅好，视游从中为厚，而山川览瞩之美，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204811", 1204811, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>酬献</span>之娱，一皆寓之于诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204811_comment'></div>旧所唱和多矣，集贤林公既为之序，而道于越也，复得二十有二篇，东南衣冠争诵传之，号为盛事，以后见为耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204811_comment'></div>或曰：「昔之业诗者，必奇探远取，然后得名于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204811_comment'></div>今二公之诗，平夷浑厚，不事才巧，而为世贵重如此，何邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204811_comment'></div>窃尝以为激者辞溢，夸者辞淫，事谬则语难，理诬则气索，人之情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204811_comment'></div>二公内无所激，外无所夸，其事核，其理当，故语与气俱足，不待繁于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1204811", 1204811, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>刻划</span>之功，而固已过人远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204811_comment'></div>鲍昭曰：「谢康乐诗如初发芙蓉，自然可爱」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204811_comment'></div>盖如其言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204811_comment'></div>某既获睹盛德之事为幸，因手写二十二篇之诗以遗越人，使镵诸石，又述其所以然者，发其端云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1204811_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　程公辟怀前守蒋堂，以诗记其事，相与唱和者六人，秦观为之序。作品：怀乐安蒋公唱和诗序。<div id='poem_1204812' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204812' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204812?labeling=true' target='_blank'>怀乐安蒋公唱和诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204812")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204812_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204812'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204812'>会稽之为镇旧矣，岂惟山川形势之盛，实控扼于东南哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204812_comment'></div>其胜游珍观，相望乎枫楠竹箭之上，枕带乎藻荇芙藻之滨，可以从事云月、优游而忘年者，殆亦非他州所及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204812_comment'></div>而卧龙山、鉴湖尤为一郡佳处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204812_comment'></div>盖府第之所占，城堞楼雉之所凭，非若穷崖绝壑，游鹿豕而家鱼龙，不可与民同乐者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204812_comment'></div>前太守贰卿乐安蒋公，尝以山富草木，樵苏所采，为令于公府止之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204812_comment'></div>湖地沃衍，由于豪夺，为表于朝廷复之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204812_comment'></div>又废山西淫祠，分湖之别派，覆以缔构，为流觞曲水，以追永和故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204812_comment'></div>于是湖山自然之观，始深密空明，不复为人力所败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204812_comment'></div>闻山水间，棹歌之诗，至今称焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204812_comment'></div>熙宁十年，广平程公以给事中、集贤殿修撰来领州事，览其遗迹而叹曰：「此前贤所以遗后来也，使予无一日之雅，犹当奉以周旋，况尝被其知遇乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204812_comment'></div>乃述乐安之志，手植松千馀章于卧龙山之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204812_comment'></div>狂枝恶蔓，斩薙以时，秀甲珍牙，无得辄取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204812_comment'></div>每春秋佳日，开池籞，具舟舰，与民共游而乐之，复为诗以记其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204812_comment'></div>元老名儒属而和者凡六人，而乐安之从子金部预焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204812_comment'></div>公素以诗名天下，其所述作，必有深属远寄，不独事章句而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204812_comment'></div>翟公曰：「一死一生，乃见交情」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204812_comment'></div>时乐安之没几三十年，而公想像风流，眷眷不忘如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204812_comment'></div>然则是诗之作也，岂特与山水俱传而不朽哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204812_comment'></div>闻其风者，可以兴起矣！</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1204812_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　在越时，程公辟赋赟阇黎化去之什，秦观次其韵。作品：和程给事赟阇黎化去之什（风流云散越王城）<div id='poem_199420' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199420' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199420?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和程给事赟阇黎化去之什</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199420")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199420_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199420'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199420'>风流云散越王城，珍重阇黎愿力成。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199420'>不使邓尼惊倒化，祇教白傅叹先行。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199420'>早因<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_199420", 199420, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>妙契</span>窥曹洞，竟以清芬继肇生。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199420'>回首中庭旌骑散，月华还可一方明。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199420'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199420_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　秋，在越，又有次韵公辟会蓬莱阁、次韵公辟闻角有感、次韵公辟州宅月夜偶成二首、次韵公辟即席呈太虚诸诗。作品：次韵公辟会蓬莱阁（林声摵摵动秋风）次闻公辟闻角有感（秉烛何人犹把盏）次韵公辟州宅月夜偶成。次韵公辟即席呈太虚（更漏一声闻晓角）<div id='poem_199378' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199378' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199378?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵公辟会蓬莱阁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199378")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_3_199378'>非是登高能赋客，可怜猿鹤自相容。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199378_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199378'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199383_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199379' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199379' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199379?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_1_199379'>翠木玲珑藏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_199379", 199379, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>宝界</span>，白烟浓淡锁华堂。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199379_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199379'>书名越艳谁兴发，角动单于自感伤。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199379_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199380'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199380'>缭绕千重雨后凉，月含秋色上东方。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199380_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199380'>风催络纾<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作纬）</span>归金井，月转檀栾荫画堂。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199380_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199380'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_199380", 199380, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>游目骋怀</span>佳兴发，感时抚事壮心伤。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199380_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199380_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199381' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199381' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199381?labeling=true' "poem_title_199381")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199381_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199381'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199381'>与君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_199381", 199381, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>邻并</span>共烟霞，乘兴时时过我家。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199381'>更漏一新闻晓角，门阑数级看秋花。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199381'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199381_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　在越，赋有望海潮、满庭芳、虞美人词。满江红（姝丽）似亦少游作于越州。作品：望海潮（秦峰苍翠）满庭芳（雅燕飞觞）虞美人（行行信马横塘畔）满江红《姝丽》（越艳风流）<div id='poem_199752' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_7_199759_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199759'>谩从今、一点在心头，空成忆。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199759_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　在越，尚有南池、越王诗，并再赋流觞亭。作品：南池。越王。再赋流觞亭。<div id='poem_199580' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199580' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_199580'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199580'>汎汎池中凫，上下与水俱。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199580_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199580_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199663' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199663' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199663?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_1_199663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199663'>终酬会稽耻，列国不敢干。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>镂一朝至，身与名俱残。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199663_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199663'>兔走猎狗悲，鸟尽良弓闲。<div 原作蜀，据四库本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_199663_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_199510' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199510' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199510?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再赋流觞亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199510")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199510_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199510'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199510'>仙山游观甲寰瀛，不比人间自<span class='inlineComment2'>（各本作目）</span>雨亭。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199510'>歌断瑶池云杳杳，酒行金谷水泠泠。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199510'>珠帘卷雨惊秋近，罗袜凌波笑客醒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199510'>月下佩环声更好，应容挥麈伴公听。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199510'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199510_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　秋，张耒有诗称誉少游之作。秦观之识张耒，在熙宁、元丰之间。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　冬，郡守程公辟将受代，秦观为作乞致仕表，并有次韵公辟将受代书蓬莱阁诗。作品：代程给事乞致仕表。次韵公辟将受代书蓬莱阁。<div id='poem_1204713' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204713' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204713?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代程给事乞致仕表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204713")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204713_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204713'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204713'>臣某言：臣闻未老遽归，非臣子报君之义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204713_comment'></div>既衰犹仕，岂儒生处己之方？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204713_comment'></div>惟去就适合其时，乃进退不愆于礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204713_comment'></div>辄陈悃愊，仰渎高明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204713_comment'></div>臣诚惶诚恐，顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204713_comment'></div>伏念臣家本单微，材尤绵薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204713_comment'></div>早缘章句声律之末技，偶中上科；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204713_comment'></div>继以簿书狱讼之微劳，误更剧任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204713_comment'></div>三持使节，八领郡麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204713_comment'></div>以至承乏小行人之官，备位大司农之属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204713_comment'></div>山川陟涉，几遍于五方；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204713_comment'></div>日月推移，殆踰于四纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204713_comment'></div>遂叨兰省之秩，仍忝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1204713", 1204713, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>秘殿</span>之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204713_comment'></div>每抚心而自循，纵没齿其焉报？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204713_comment'></div>昨以蒙恩罢守，被旨归班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204713_comment'></div>身虽寄于海隅，梦已升于帝所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204713_comment'></div>非不知怀金结绶，侍清光而足荣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204713_comment'></div>佩玉鸣驺，联法从之为幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204713_comment'></div>但以风霜渐迫，蒲柳遽衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204713_comment'></div>爰及上印之期，当批乞骸之恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204713_comment'></div>日莫途远，顾己分之非安；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204713_comment'></div>漏尽钟鸣，亦人言之可畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204713_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下恢覆载之量，廓照临之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204713_comment'></div>怜其实知止而请身，察其非偷安而避事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204713_comment'></div>俾还官政，获反里闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204713_comment'></div>况臣北陌东阡，雅多游旧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204713_comment'></div>左饘右粥，良给岁时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204713_comment'></div>是以诵歌真主之稀逢，盛述圣朝之难遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204713_comment'></div>马方羸老，徒结恋于轩墀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204713_comment'></div>木已朽枯，或能蒸于芝菌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204713_comment'></div>臣不任祈天俟命、激切屏营之至。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1204713'></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1204713_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199382' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199382' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199382?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵公辟将受代书蓬莱阁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199382")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199382_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199382'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199382'>城连湖岸水为关，旦暮樵风自往还。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199382_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199382'>龟负宝林新佛地，龙蟠使宅老仙山。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199382_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199382'>平生仕宦今何得，终日登临独未闲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199382_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199382'>岁满徘徊难遽别，就中潇洒异人间。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199382_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199382'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199382_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　岁暮，别程公辟北归，作诗并谢启，又赋满庭芳（山抹微云）、南歌子（夕露沾芳草）二词。苏轼、晁补之尝评满庭芳一阕。作品：谢程公辟启。满庭芳（山抹微云）南歌子（夕露沾芳草）<div id='poem_1204736' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204736' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204736?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢程公辟启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204736")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204736_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204736'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204736'>某启：比缘省觐，薄游勾践之都；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204736_comment'></div>获执扫除，叨预老聃之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204736_comment'></div>辱品题之已过，惭报效之何从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204736_comment'></div>伏念某少也妄庸，长而屯贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204736_comment'></div>枘方乖凿，人指为狂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204736_comment'></div>钩直失鱼，自知其拙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204736_comment'></div>碌碌抱箦中之耻，栖栖衔跨下之羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204736_comment'></div>不谓修撰给事误赐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1204736", 1204736, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>采葑</span>，曲加推毂，引置<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1204736", 1204736, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>金台</span>之馆，俾参珠履之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204736_comment'></div>萧洒兰亭，尝继孙、王而奉笔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204736_comment'></div>风流莲社，屡陪刘、阮以焚香。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204736_comment'></div>既令冯子而出舆，仍为穆生而设醴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204736_comment'></div>至于升将军之故第，泛宾客之旧湖，兴与天横，情随水远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204736_comment'></div>牙樯锦缆，拥南国之佳人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204736_comment'></div>玉斝金罍，醉西园之清夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204736_comment'></div>往来乎十洲三岛之上，俯仰乎千岩万壑之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204736_comment'></div>曾微琼玉以报刀，祗枉明珠而弹雀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204736_comment'></div>从游八月，大为北客之美谈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204736_comment'></div>酬唱百篇，永作东吴之盛事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204736_comment'></div>退而省察，何以堪胜？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204736_comment'></div>血指汗颜，徒为今日；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204736_comment'></div>输肝剖胆，期在异时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204736_comment'></div>庶追国士之风，少尽门人之礼。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1204736_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199761' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199761' id='poem_sentence_1_199761_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199761'>多少蓬莱旧事，空回首，烟霭纷纷。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199761_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
杭州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='70f35f00096640abb7a1c22621432426_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("70f35f00096640abb7a1c22621432426");'><span id='70f35f00096640abb7a1c22621432426_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>，31岁</div><div id='70f35f00096640abb7a1c22621432426' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年8月16日</a>　中秋后一日，自吴兴还杭州，从参寥、辩才二僧登照阁，游观音洞及佛日净慧寺，赋诗填词，并有龙井题名记及录龙井辩才事两文。作品：龙井题名记、录龙井辩才事。<div id='poem_1204903' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204903' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204903?labeling=true' target='_blank'>龙井题名记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年8月16日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204903")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204903_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204903'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204903'>元丰二年中秋后一日，余自吴兴过杭，东还会稽，龙井辨才法师以书邀予入山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204903_comment'></div>比出郭，已日夕，航湖至普宁，遇道人参寥，问龙井所遣篮舆，则曰：「以不时至，去矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204903_comment'></div>是夕，天宇开霁，林间月明，可数毛发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204903_comment'></div>遂弃舟从参寥杖策并湖而行，出雷峰，度南屏，濯足于惠因涧，入灵石坞，得支径上风篁岭，憩龙井亭，酌泉据石而饮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204903_comment'></div>自普宁经佛寺上，皆寂不闻人声，道傍庐舍或灯火隐显，草木<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1204903", 1204903, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>深郁</span>，流水<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1204903", 1204903, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>激激</span>悲鸣，殆非人间有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204903_comment'></div>行二鼓矣，始至寿圣院，谒辨才于潮音堂，明日乃还。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1204903_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204910' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204910' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204910?labeling=true' target='_blank'>录龙井辩才事</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年8月16日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204910")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204910_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204910'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204910'>熙宁九年，秀州嘉兴县令陶彖有子得疾甚异，形色语笑，非复平人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204910_comment'></div>令患之，乃大出钱财，聘谒巫祝，厌胜百方，终莫能治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204910_comment'></div>是岁，辩才法师元净适以事至秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204910_comment'></div>法师，高僧也，隐于钱塘之天竺山，传天台教，学者数百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204910_comment'></div>又特善咒水，疾病者饮其所咒水辄愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204910_comment'></div>吴人尊事之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204910_comment'></div>令素闻其名，即驰诣师，具状告曰：「儿始得疾时，见一女子自外来，相调笑久之，俱去，稍行至水滨，遗诗曰：『生为木卯人，死作幽独鬼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204910_comment'></div>泉门长夜开，衾帏待君至』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204910_comment'></div>自是屡来，且有言曰：『仲冬之月，二七之间，月盈之夕，车马来迎』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204910_comment'></div>今去妖期逼矣，未知所处，愿赐哀怜」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204910_comment'></div>师乃许诺，因杖策从至其家，除地为坛，设观音像于中央，取杨枝沾水洒而咒之，三绕坛而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204910_comment'></div>是夜儿寝安然，不复如他时矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204910_comment'></div>明日复来，结跏趺座，引儿问曰：「汝居何地，而来至此」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204910_comment'></div>答曰：「会稽之东，卞山之阳，是吾之宅，古木苍苍」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204910_comment'></div>师又问：「汝姓谁氏」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204910_comment'></div>答曰：「吴王山上无人处，几度临风学舞腰」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204910_comment'></div>师曰：「汝柳姓乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204910_comment'></div>乃冁然而笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204910_comment'></div>师良久呵曰：「汝无始已来，迷己逐物，为物所转，溺于淫邪，流浪千劫，不自解脱，入魔趣中，横生灾害，延及无辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204910_comment'></div>汝今当知，魔即非魔，魔即法界。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204910_comment'></div>我今为汝宣说《首楞严》秘密神咒，汝当谛听，痛自悔恨，讼既往过愆，返本来清净觉性」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204910_comment'></div>于是号泣，不复有云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204910_comment'></div>是夜谓儿曰：「辩才之功，汝父之虔，无以加焉，吾将去矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204910_comment'></div>后二日复来，曰：「久与子游，情不能遽舍，愿一举觞为别」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204910_comment'></div>因相对引满，既罢，作诗一章曰：「仲冬二七是良时，江下无缘与子期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204910_comment'></div>今日临岐一杯酒，共君千里远相离」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204910_comment'></div>遂去不复见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204910_comment'></div>予闻其事久矣，元丰二年见辩才于龙井山，问之信然。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1204910_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年8月</a>　秦观又有跋元净龙井十题。<div id='poem_1204910' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204910' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204910?labeling=true' target='_blank'>录龙井辩才事</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年8月16日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_sentence_0_1204910_comment'></div>令患之，乃大出钱财，聘谒巫祝，厌胜百方，终莫能治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204910_comment'></div>是岁，辩才法师元净适以事至秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204910_comment'></div>法师，高僧也，隐于钱塘之天竺山，传天台教，学者数百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204910_comment'></div>又特善咒水，疾病者饮其所咒水辄愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204910_comment'></div>吴人尊事之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204910_comment'></div>令素闻其名，即驰诣师，具状告曰：「儿始得疾时，见一女子自外来，相调笑久之，俱去，稍行至水滨，遗诗曰：『生为木卯人，死作幽独鬼。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年8月</a>　秦观又有照阁诗。作品：照阁（狝猴镜里三身现）<div id='poem_199338' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199338' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_2_199338_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年8月</a>　在杭，宿参寥房，有诗。夜坐，怀孙莘老，亦有诗。作品：宿参寥房（乡国秋行暮）夜坐怀莘老司谏（六合寥寥信茫昧）<div id='poem_199439' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199439' </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199439")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199439_comment'></div><div -----title
洛阳
-----detail

"Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>梧楸</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199592'>泯泯渠水驶，霏霏花雾浮。<div -----title
黄冈
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='ebe881d2f3024b4ea36ed98f9b003bcb_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ebe881d2f3024b4ea36ed98f9b003bcb");'><span id='ebe881d2f3024b4ea36ed98f9b003bcb_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>，34岁</div><div id='ebe881d2f3024b4ea36ed98f9b003bcb' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>至黄州访东坡，作吊镈钟。作品：吊镈钟文。<div id='poem_1204972' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204972' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204972?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吊镈钟文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204972")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204972_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204972'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204972'>嘉鱼县傍湖中，比岁大旱，水皆就涸，而夜常有光怪，赫然属天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204972_comment'></div>乡人相与志其处而掘之，得古镈钟焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204972_comment'></div>其形有两栾，如合两瓦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204972_comment'></div>面左右九乳，总三十六牙，鼓、钲、舞、銿、衡、旋、斡之类，考之不与礼合者无几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204972_comment'></div>县令施君识其宝，谋献之太常，未果，乃输武昌库中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204972_comment'></div>会其守解秩，佐摄事，见而恶之，曰：「那得背时物，畜之不祥也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204972_comment'></div>亟命投于兵器之冶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204972_comment'></div>呜呼，物之不幸，有如是邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204972_comment'></div>昔九江吏盗颜忠肃之碑材，寘其所述，欧阳詹闻而吊之以词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204972_comment'></div>予悲夫镈钟，古乐之器，先王所以被功德而和人神，审音之士，至有振车铎于空地而求之者，非若九江碑材，因人而贵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204972_comment'></div>而辱于泥涂，无所自效，遇其非鉴，以触废毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204972_comment'></div>好古之士，焉得默默而已乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204972_comment'></div>乃作文以吊之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204972_comment'></div>词曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1204972'>呜呼，众方之生，谬形殊器，更首迭尾，雌雄相废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204972_comment'></div>朝为姜姬，夕为蕉萃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204972_comment'></div>或奇偶之相续，或九升而一踬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204972_comment'></div>清饿和黜，刑王眇贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204972_comment'></div>生犊失明，得骏折髀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204972_comment'></div>洞所遇之参差，莽循环于一气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204972_comment'></div>传曰：「黄钟毁弃，瓦缶雷鸣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204972_comment'></div>余始以为不然，今乃信之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204972_comment'></div>呜呼镈钟，何世所为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204972_comment'></div>质不呈刚，形不露奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204972_comment'></div>协律中度，浑如天资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204972_comment'></div>掩抑虽久，不见瑕疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204972_comment'></div>爰有两栾，三十六乳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204972_comment'></div>厥音琅然，小大随叩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204972_comment'></div>曷所挺之，瑰伟而偶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204972_comment'></div>沉于幽陋，辱泥涂之污漫，厌鳞鬣之腥臭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204972_comment'></div>嗟笋虡之一辞，遽月弦之几彀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204972_comment'></div>幸阳愆而水涸，天日恍其复觏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204972_comment'></div>谓庭贡之是充，获效鸣于金奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204972_comment'></div>何夜光之暗投，卒按剑而莫售。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204972_comment'></div>呜呼，赤刀大训，天球河图，秦玺汉剑，赵璧随珠，犍为之磬，汾阴之鼎，曲阜之履，天泽之弧，历世相传，以华国都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1204972_comment'></div>下至威斗错刀，羯鼓之捲，破镜缺符，遗簪堕珥，信无益于经纶，犹见收于好事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1204972_comment'></div>是钟也，郊庙所荐，乐之纪纲，统和元气，舞兽仪凰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1204972_comment'></div>令大河而更清，使左角其不芒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1204972_comment'></div>变化风俗，返乎羲皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1204972_comment'></div>而乃废于深渊，出而遇毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1204972_comment'></div>殆藻盘之不如，矧牛铎之敢企？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1204972_comment'></div>此义夫志士所为疾心而切齿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1204972_comment'></div>然余闻之，阴精之纯，燥气之裔，虽从火革，其质不变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1204972_comment'></div>一晦一明，昔者既然，偾而复起，可无毕年？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1204972_comment'></div>呜呼钟乎，今焉在乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1204972_comment'></div>岂复为乐，激宫流羽，以嗣其故乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1204972_comment'></div>将凭化而迁，改象易制，以周于用乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1204972_comment'></div>岂为钱为镈，为铚为釜，以供耕稼之职？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1204972_comment'></div>将为鼎为鼐，以效烹饪之功乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1204972_comment'></div>岂为浮图老子之像，巍然瞻仰于缁素乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1204972_comment'></div>岂为麟趾袅蹄之形，翕然玩于邦国乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1204972_comment'></div>岂为干越之剑，气如虹霓，扫除妖氛于指顾之间乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1204972_comment'></div>将为百鍊之鉴，湛如止水，别妍丑于高堂之上乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1204972_comment'></div>新故相代，未始云毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1204972_comment'></div>纷然殊途，必有一出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1204972_comment'></div>决不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1204972", 1204972, "Clauses/157/Comments/0")'>泯泯</span>，草亡木卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1204972_comment'></div>呜呼镈钟，又将奚恤？</div><div id='poem_sentence_55_1204972_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在黄州，为陈慥题真赞，并有题双松寄陈季常诗。作品：龙丘子真赞。题双松寄陈季常。<div id='poem_1204928' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204928' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204928?labeling=true' target='_blank'>龙丘子真赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204928")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1204928_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204928'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204928'>惟龙丘子以大块为舆，元气为驹。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1204928_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1204928'>放意自娱，游行<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204928", 1204928, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>六区</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1204928_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1204928'>世莫我疏，亦莫我亲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1204928_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1204928'>追配古者，葛天之民。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1204928_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1204928'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1204928_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199673' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199673' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199673?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题双松寄陈季常</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199673")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199673_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199673'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199673'>遥闻连理松，托根黄麻城。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199673_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199673'>枝枝相钩带，叶叶同死生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199673_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199673'>虽云金石姿，未免儿女情。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199673_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199673'>想应风月夕，满庭合欢声。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199673_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199673'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199673_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
