-----title
九江（南康军）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='09de0b815531455bacdb0b808f7630c6_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("09de0b815531455bacdb0b808f7630c6");'><span id='09de0b815531455bacdb0b808f7630c6_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>，34岁</div><div id='09de0b815531455bacdb0b808f7630c6' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>过庐山，访大觉琏师旧迹，南游玉笥而归。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>又有白鹤观诗。作品：白鹤观（复殿重楼堕杳冥）<div id='poem_514670' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_514670' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/514670?labeling=true' target='_blank'>白鹤观</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_514670")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_514670_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_514670'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_514670'>复殿重楼堕杳冥，故基乔木尚峥嵘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_514670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_514670'>银河不改三千尺，铁马曾经十万兵。<div id='poem_sentence_1_514670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_514670'>华表故应终化鹤，谪仙未解独骑鲸。<div id='poem_sentence_2_514670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_514670'>井泉一一儿童旧，白发衰颜祇自惊<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_514670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_514670'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_514670_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_514670'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_514670_0'>⑴ 清刘坤一光绪《江西通志》卷一一四</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_514670_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
汝南（汝阳）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='57726c060b8641a5a3841d2ac3153372_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("57726c060b8641a5a3841d2ac3153372");'><span id='57726c060b8641a5a3841d2ac3153372_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1087')">1086-1087年</a>，38-39岁</div><div id='57726c060b8641a5a3841d2ac3153372' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年</a>　秦观有登第后青词。<div id='poem_1204970' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204970' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204970?labeling=true' target='_blank'>登第后青词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204970")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204970_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204970'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204970'>窃以天运至神，固不期于报效；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204970_comment'></div>群生多故，实有赖于祈禳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204970_comment'></div>敢伸悃愊之私，仰渎高明之鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204970_comment'></div>伏念臣生而固陋，长更屯奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204970_comment'></div>奔走道涂，常数千里；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204970_comment'></div>淹留场屋，几二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204970_comment'></div>既利欲之未忘，在过愆而奚免？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204970_comment'></div>深惧风霆之谴，窃萌豺獭之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204970_comment'></div>乃与母亲戚氏，爰自往年，愿修醮事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204970_comment'></div>今则猥尘科第，叨预仕途，岂微躯之克堪，皆造物之冥赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204970_comment'></div>辄取甲寅之岁，祗就海陵之宫，依按灵科，酬还素志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204970_comment'></div>伏愿上真昭答，列圣顾怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204970_comment'></div>增寿考于慈亲，除祸殃于眇质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204970_comment'></div>私门安燕，无疾病之潜生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204970_comment'></div>宦路亨通，绝谤伤之横至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204970_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1204970_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年</a>　又有到任后谒先师文。<div id='poem_1204954' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204954' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204954?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谒先师文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204954")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204954_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204954'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204954'>惟公圣神所铸，号古哲人，凛然高风，闻者为起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204954_comment'></div>诸生不敏，承学累年，依凭馀光，以得名宦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204954_comment'></div>时方尚德，进爵既崇，祭重报先，敢忘大赐？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204954_comment'></div>祠以薄馔，公其鉴之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1204954_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年1月</a>　正月，作拟郡学试东风解冻诗及拟郡学试近世社稷之臣论，继而赋送张叔和兼简鲁直。作品：拟郡学试东风解冻（宝历开新岁）送张叔和兼简黄鲁真（汝南如一器）拟郡学试近世社稷之臣论。<div id='poem_199477' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199477' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199477?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟郡学试东风解冻</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199477")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_199477_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199477'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199477'>宝历开新岁，春回斗柄东。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199477'>漪生天际水，冻解日边风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199477'>浩荡依蘋起，侵寻带雪融。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199477'>江河<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_199477", 199477, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>霜练</span>静，池沼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_199477", 199477, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>玉奁</span>空。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199477'>鱼藻雍容里，云霄俯仰中。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199477'>更无舟楫碍，从此百川通。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199477_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199477'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_199477_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199609' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199609' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199609?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送张和叔兼简黄鲁直</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199609")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199609_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199609'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199609'>汝南如一器，百千聚飞蚊。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199609_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199609'>终然鼓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_199609", 199609, "Clauses/2/Comments/1")'>狂闹</span><span class='inlineComment2'>（原作任开，据张本、四库本改）</span>，啾啾竟谁闻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199609_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199609'>议郎盛德后，清修继先芬。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199609_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199609'>未试霹雳手，低回从此君。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199609_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199609'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_199609", 199609, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>学官</span>冷于水，齑盐度朝曛。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199609_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199609'>间蒙相煖热，破忧发孤欣。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199609_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199609'>君今又复去，冀北遂空群。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199609_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199609'>岂无一樽酒，谁与通殷勤。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199609_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199609'>大梁多豪英，故人满青云。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199609_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199609'>为谢黄叔度，鬓毛今白纷。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199609_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199609'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_199609_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204885' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204885' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204885?labeling=true' target='_blank'>拟郡学试近世社稷之臣论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204885")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204885_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204885'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204885'>古之所谓社稷之臣者至矣，忠足以竭才性之分，敏足以应事物之变，苟利社稷，则遂事矫制，虽君有所不从；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204885_comment'></div>苟害社稷，则伏节死谊，虽身有所不顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204885_comment'></div>夫人莫不尊于君，莫不亲于身，君与身也，犹有时而忘之，知有社稷之事而已，况其它乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204885_comment'></div>此古之所谓社稷之臣者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204885_comment'></div>扬子曰：「近世社稷之臣，终之以礼乐，可谓社稷之臣矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204885_comment'></div>夫扬子之所以有取于四子者，岂以运筹帷幄之中，制胜于无形欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204885_comment'></div>料敌制变，算无遗策，攻城野战，前无坚敌欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204885_comment'></div>出入禁闼，二十馀年，小心谨慎，未尝有过欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204885_comment'></div>果在乎是，则战国之末士，一介之庸人，皆可以为社稷之臣矣，岂扬子之意哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204885_comment'></div>方高帝之时，天下初定，诸将论功，日夜不决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204885_comment'></div>子房辞齐三万户，愿封于留，又劝先封雍齿，诸将乃服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204885_comment'></div>及欲废太子，子房乃行少傅事，晏然处于叔孙通之下，招致四老人者以羽翼之，太子以安，此其所以有取于子房者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204885_comment'></div>高后时，诸吕擅权，欲危刘氏，平、勃用陆贾之谋，深自相结，卒能诛诸吕，迎文帝于代而立之，此其所以有取于陈平、绛侯勃者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204885_comment'></div>后元、元平之际，汉室多故，子孟拥昭立宣，政繇己出，前后二十年，海内厌服，此其有取于霍将军者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204885_comment'></div>然光不学无术，闇于大体，死才三年，宗族诛夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204885_comment'></div>勃免相就国，不远嫌疑，陷于吏议，几致颠覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204885_comment'></div>平多<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1204885", 1204885, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>阴祸</span>，至孙而废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204885_comment'></div>掌虽亲贵，终以不侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204885_comment'></div>子房虽无三子之过，然不能为汉制礼作乐，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1204885", 1204885, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>追迹</span>三代之隆，以圣人之道概之，皆未得为全人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204885_comment'></div>故曰「终之以礼乐」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204885_comment'></div>虽然，四人者，或氏而字之，或氏而名之，或爵而名之，或氏而官之，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204885_comment'></div>此盖扬子之深意，《春秋》之大法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204885_comment'></div>《春秋》之法，虽贵而不嫌同号，美恶不嫌同辞，然而州不若国，国不若氏，氏不若人，人不若名，名不若字，字不若爵，爵不若子，因此等以寄褒贬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204885_comment'></div>氏者，别其所自出也，字以言其德，名以言其体，爵以言其功，官以言其业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204885_comment'></div>张子房以智，盖言其德也，故氏而字之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204885_comment'></div>陈平以无误，盖言其体也，故氏而名之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204885_comment'></div>绛侯勃以果，盖言其功，故爵而名之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204885_comment'></div>霍将军以勇，盖言其业，故氏而官之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204885_comment'></div>四人者，子房最优，故独字之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204885_comment'></div>绛侯勃为下，故独不氏焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204885_comment'></div>呜呼，不如是，何足以为《法言》？</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1204885_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年1月</a>　秦观始为教授，寄居僧坊，有送刘贡父二首写其清苦生活。作品：送刘贡父二首其一。<div id='poem_199607' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199607' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199607?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送刘贡父舍人二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199607")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199607_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199607'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199607'>虎去藜藿采，珠在其川媚。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199607'>君子一诎信，实系天下事。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199607'>念昔元丰间，公初谪南裔。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199607'>托词吊湘水，闻者为心醉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199607'>踰年憸臣逐，国老起相继。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199607'>除公守襄阳，士始有生意。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199607'>兹焉归法从，乃是朝廷计。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199607'>在公何足云，事业本馀弃。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199607'>掖垣美花木，入直春正丽。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199607'>同僚看家风，立马挥九制。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199607'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_199607_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年2月</a>　二月一日，秦观改字少游，陈师道为作字序。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年2月</a>　二月癸亥，闾丘孝直自淮南出守蕲州，秦观代之作谢表。作品：代蕲州守谢上表。<div id='poem_1204725' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204725' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204725?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代蕲州守谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204725")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204725_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204725'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204725'>愚罪著明，当以万死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204725_comment'></div>圣恩宽大，尚假一麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204725_comment'></div>顾惟昧冒之深，第积战兢之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204725_comment'></div>伏念臣不学无术，寡偶少徒，荷先帝之误知，繇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1204725", 1204725, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>常员</span>而擢用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204725_comment'></div>始欲悉力而举职，莫知长虑以佐时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204725_comment'></div>自取悔尤，至烦挥黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204725_comment'></div>责其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1204725", 1204725, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>妄作</span>，便可屏之远方；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204725_comment'></div>悯其知非，犹当投于散地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204725_comment'></div>敢图生死而肉骨，尚容宣化以承流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204725_comment'></div>况臣粤自去冬，尝陈愚恳，愿归使节，求绾郡章，虽此左迁，正符宿愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204725_comment'></div>恩既深而逾望，感亦极而难言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204725_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下大德海涵，至仁天覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204725_comment'></div>谓灾眚之可赦，以过失为当怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204725_comment'></div>宽其未弃之诛，开以自新之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204725_comment'></div>辨之不早，嗟已迫于桑榆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204725_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1204725", 1204725, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>来者可追</span>，幸未填于沟壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204725_comment'></div>誓捐躯干，上报恩私。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1204725_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年闰2月</a>　闰二月庚寅，司马光自正议大夫、守门下侍郎依前官加左仆射兼门下侍郎，秦观代人作贺启。作品：代贺司马相公启。<div id='poem_1204749' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204749' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204749?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代贺司马相公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年闰2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204749")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204749_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204749'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204749'>显奉明恩，进升上宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204749_comment'></div>老成登用，区夏均驩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204749_comment'></div>窃以大河之浑，持寸胶不能以止；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204749_comment'></div>积岁之旱，待霖雨然后乃苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204749_comment'></div>故当大有为之时，必得非常人之辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204749_comment'></div>伏惟相公望隆一代，节著四朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204749_comment'></div>力足以扶持颠危，风足以兴起贪懦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204749_comment'></div>青天白日，奴隶亦知其明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204749_comment'></div>璞玉浑金，鉴识莫名其器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204749_comment'></div>果符物论，克享天心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204749_comment'></div>伊尹得君，耻一物之失所；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204749_comment'></div>姚崇作相，陈十事而后为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204749_comment'></div>奸邪失匕箸而自惊，忠义引壶觞而相庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204749_comment'></div>某夙叨记省，方预陶甄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204749_comment'></div>欣众正之路开，信太平之责塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204749_comment'></div>愿稽故事，就封富民之侯；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204749_comment'></div>请与诸生，更上《得贤》之颂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204749_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1204749_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年闰2月</a>　闰二月乙卯，范纯仁自试吏部尚书兼侍读，除中大夫、同知枢密院事，秦观代何提举作贺启。作品：代何提举贺范枢密启。<div id='poem_1204763' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204763' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204763?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代何提举贺范枢密启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年闰2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204763")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204763_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204763'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204763'>光膺睿命，进贰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1204763", 1204763, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>中枢</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204763_comment'></div>硕辅登崇，溥天均庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204763_comment'></div>窃以天运无积，盖由八柱之仰成；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204763_comment'></div>岁功不亏，亦自四时而分治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204763_comment'></div>矧娲皇补天之际，当商老和羹之初，傥非心德之素同，难冀事功之必立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204763_comment'></div>伏惟某官器兼文武，学备天人，虽小善而必为，临大节而不夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204763_comment'></div>入参台省，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1204763", 1204763, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>伫闻</span>折槛之风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204763_comment'></div>外总<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1204763", 1204763, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>戎机</span>，寝罢争桑之衅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204763_comment'></div>负谤伤而精神益励，处闲散而闻望愈隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204763_comment'></div>逮神圣之纂临，属风云之感会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204763_comment'></div>念昔仁祖，虚怀于庆历之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204763_comment'></div>惟时先公，奏对于天章之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204763_comment'></div>谓道可行于反掌，而世亦至于容刀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204763_comment'></div>盛世难逢，事空传于故老；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204763_comment'></div>嗣贤复出，天实慰于斯民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204763_comment'></div>既被召以旋归，遂干霄而直上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204763_comment'></div>千寻广厦，欣然慰多士之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204763_comment'></div>万里长城，足以制四夷之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204763_comment'></div>某夙登门仞，久旷书幐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204763_comment'></div>方从沙汰之馀，未卜栖翔之所，侧闻进拜，倍切驩愉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204763_comment'></div>岩石虽瞻，尚郁搢绅之论；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204763_comment'></div>衮衣遂有，方酬区夏之情。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1204763_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年闰2月</a>　闰二月庚寅，杨景略康功知苏州，秦观有诗送之。作品：送杨康功守苏（公于万事轻）<div id='poem_199611' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199611' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199611?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送杨康功守苏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年闰2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199611")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199611_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199611'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199611'>公于万事轻，独嗜山水重。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199611_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199611'>寓直西掖垣，沧洲长入梦。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199611_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199611'>广陵一都会，厨酒万斯瓮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199611_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199611'>每叹阙登临，持此将焉用。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199611_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199611'>比持苏台节，论郁缙绅共。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199611_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199611'>翻云美泉石，汔可小<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_199611", 199611, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>嬉弄</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199611_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199611'>匆匆治行李，草草别宾从。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199611_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199611'>乃知仁智心，所乐异庸众。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199611_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199611'>梅花发春端，百卉日兴动。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199611_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199611'>公等行复反，台阁俟鸾凤。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199611_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199611'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_199611_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年3月</a>　三月辛未，苏轼自起居舍人为中书舍人，秦观有贺启。作品：贺中书苏舍人启。<div id='poem_1204735' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204735' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204735?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺中书苏舍人启</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204735'>光膺中诏，进直西垣，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204735_comment'></div>恭以某官当世大儒，斯民先觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204735_comment'></div>论议为四海之轻重，出处系一时之安危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204735_comment'></div>萧夫子之文章，蛮夷亦慕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204735_comment'></div>张使君之威望，草木犹知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204735_comment'></div>始从记注之严，爰掌丝纶之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204735_comment'></div>奸邪闻命，投匕箸以自惊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204735_comment'></div>忠义承风，引壶觞而相庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204735_comment'></div>某猥缘幸会，谬接光仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204735_comment'></div>昔者先生尝蒙论次，兹焉伯氏又获追攀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204735_comment'></div>窃闻进拜之崇，倍切欣愉之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1204735_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年4月</a>　夏四月壬寅，吕公著为右仆射兼中书侍郎，秦观有贺启。作品：贺吕相公启。<div id='poem_1204733' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204733' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204733?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺吕相公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204733'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204733'>伏审光膺<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1204733", 1204733, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>宸命</span>，显正台司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204733_comment'></div>凡在生成，举同抃蹈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204733_comment'></div>窃以娲皇补天之际，高宗梦帝之初，未就泥金，正资陶铸，不调琴瑟，方赖更张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204733_comment'></div>是谓大有为之时，必得非常人之佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204733_comment'></div>恭惟中书仆射相公累朝元老，当世大儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204733_comment'></div>力足以扶持颠危，风足以兴起贪懦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204733_comment'></div>青天白日，奴隶亦知其明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204733_comment'></div>璞玉浑金，鉴识莫名其器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204733_comment'></div>既天资之笃实，加<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1204733", 1204733, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>地胄</span>以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1204733", 1204733, "Clauses/21/Comments/1")'>高华</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204733_comment'></div>四世五公，勋在王室；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204733_comment'></div>一门万石，宠冠廷臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204733_comment'></div>宗族谓之小许公，夷狄以为真汉相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204733_comment'></div>果从人望，爰享天心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204733_comment'></div>方司左辖之严，遽践鸾台之峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204733_comment'></div>献可替否，而思矫激之过；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204733_comment'></div>解纷挫锐，而有调和之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204733_comment'></div>必欲成仁之始终，非特洁身之去就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204733_comment'></div>繇是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1204733", 1204733, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>端人</span>坌集，异党寖微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204733_comment'></div>宽大之泽四覃，苛刻之风一变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204733_comment'></div>名既得功而并立，位当与德而俱崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204733_comment'></div>明诏始班，吉士交庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204733_comment'></div>太公入国，固知天下之父归；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204733_comment'></div>伊尹得君，益见圣人之任重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204733_comment'></div>某猥缘幸会，叨被题评。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204733_comment'></div>昔陪北海之樽，有同梦寐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204733_comment'></div>今望平津之馆，如隔云天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204733_comment'></div>但欣众正之路开，始信太平之责塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204733_comment'></div>愿稽故事，就封富民之侯；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204733_comment'></div>请与诸生，复上得贤之颂。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1204733_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年4月</a>　四月，孝子徐积仲车始为楚州教授，食于学官，吏或以为不可，太守不听，礼遇如初。秦观作诗寄予同情。作品：徐仲车食于学官吏或以为不可欲罢去之太守不听礼遇如初感之而作（许丞老病聋）<div id='poem_199620' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199620' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199620?labeling=true' target='_blank'>徐仲车食于学官吏或以为不可欲罢去之太守不听礼遇如初感之而作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年4月）</span><span id='poem_sentence_3_199620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199620'>古人骨已朽，来者复谁继。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199620_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1204957_comment'></div>是率僚属，爰及士子，躬趋于庭，以报祀事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204957_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1204957_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年6月</a>　夏末，秦观答傅彬老简，对二苏之道德文章抒发己见。<div id='poem_1204767' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204767' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204767?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答傅彬老简</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204767'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204767'>彬老足下：昨奉手教，所以慰诲甚勤，并蒙录示《寄苏登州书》并《题眉山集后》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204767_comment'></div>尊贤善道，发于诚心，词旨清婉，近世所希见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204767_comment'></div>发函<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1204767", 1204767, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>展读</span>，殆不能释手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204767_comment'></div>钦想高风，益增企系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204767_comment'></div>屡迫贱事，修报后时，悚愧何已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204767_comment'></div>然仆昧陋，不能具晓盛意，中间有未然处，辄为左右具言之，惟阁下恕其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1204767", 1204767, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>僭易</span>，幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204767_comment'></div>阁下谓蜀之锦绮，妙绝天下，苏氏蜀人，其于组丽也，独得之于天，故其文章如锦绮焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204767_comment'></div>其说信美矣，然非所以称苏氏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204767_comment'></div>苏氏之道，最深于性命自得之际，其次则器足以任重，识足以致远，至于议论文章，乃其与世周旋，至粗者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204767_comment'></div>阁下论苏氏，而其说止于文章，意欲尊苏氏，适卑之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204767_comment'></div>阁下又谓三苏之中，所愿学者，登州为最优，于此尤非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204767_comment'></div>老苏先生，仆不及识其人，今中书、补阙二公，则仆尝身事之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204767_comment'></div>中书之道，如日月星辰，经纬天地，有生之类，皆知仰其高明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204767_comment'></div>补阙则不然，其道如元气行于混沦之中，万物由之而不知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204767_comment'></div>故中书尝自谓「吾不及子由」，仆窃以为知言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204767_comment'></div>阁下试赢数日之粮，谒二公于京师，不然取其所著之书，熟读而精思之，以想见其人，然后知吾言之不谬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204767_comment'></div>文翁哀词，杼思久矣，重蒙示谕，尤增感怆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204767_comment'></div>时气尚热，未及晤见，千万顺时自爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204767_comment'></div>因风无惜以书见及，幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1204767_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年9月2日</a>　九月二日，秦观回乡迎亲赴任，与乔执中同行，有简与山阳徐积。作品：秦淮海帖。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年9月</a>　秦观有寄题倪敦复北轩及寄题卢君斗斋二诗，似亦作于此时。作品：寄题倪敦复北轩（倪郎才韵照冰壶）寄题卢君斗斋（侠气轩轩翰墨场）<div id='poem_199446' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199446' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199446?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄题倪敦复北轩</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199446")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199446_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199446'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199446'>倪郎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_199446", 199446, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>才韵</span>照冰壶，北向开轩颇自娱。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199446_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199446'>檐度蕙风鸣鴶鵴，壁经梅雨画<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_2_199446_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199446'>官舍私居同是漫，莫嗟三径就荒芜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199446_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199446'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199446_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199646' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199646' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a
