id='poem_sentence_4_199646'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199646_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年9月</a>　九月辛酉，大享明堂，以神宗配，赦天下，秦观有代贺明堂礼毕表。<div id='poem_1204709' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204709' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204709?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代贺明堂礼毕表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204709")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204709_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204709'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204709'>有司备物，亲严三岁之祠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204709_comment'></div>率土均恩，实赖一人之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204709_comment'></div>照临所逮，欣抃攸同<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204709_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下道贯神明，功参覆载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204709_comment'></div>昭哉嗣服，缵六圣之洪休；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204709_comment'></div>大矣孝熙，备三宫之至养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204709_comment'></div>擢英髦而共政，革苛弊以济时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204709_comment'></div>庶事用康，善祥斯应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204709_comment'></div>物无疵疠，民不怨咨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204709_comment'></div>天地得以清宁，草木遂其畅茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204709_comment'></div>九功之德，既皆可歌；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204709_comment'></div>四海之臣，亦各来祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204709_comment'></div>乃遵彝典，爰尽孝思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204709_comment'></div>时以季秋之良，日用上辛之吉，始告虔于原庙，遂严配于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1204709", 1204709, "Clauses/29/Comments/0")'>合宫</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204709_comment'></div>精意感通，景贶昭答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204709_comment'></div>大赉而兆人富，肆眚而众心新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204709_comment'></div>实万世<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1204709", 1204709, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>无疆之休</span>，盖千载不逢之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204709_comment'></div>臣乍辞帷幄，方守藩垣，徒欣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1204709", 1204709, "Clauses/38/Comments/0")'>右飨</span>之成，莫预骏奔之列，瞻望阙庭<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>，</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1204709_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年9月</a>　是岁秋，邢敦夫自随州以秋风三叠寄少游。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年11月</a>　十一月，苏辙为中书舍人，秦观代作谢表。作品：代中书舍人谢上表。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年11月</a>　十一月二十九日，诏试学士院，黄庭坚、张耒、晁补之并授馆职而秦观未与，此后四学士常聚苏门，称生诗风逐渐变化。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年12月</a>　十二月，知蔡州刘攽迁中书舍人，秦观有诗送之。作品：送刘贡父舍人二首其一（虎去藜藿采）<div id='poem_199607' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199607' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199607?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送刘贡父舍人二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199607")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199607_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199607'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199607'>虎去藜藿采，珠在其川媚。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199607'>君子一诎信，实系天下事。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199607'>念昔元丰间，公初谪南裔。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199607'>托词吊湘水，闻者为心醉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199607'>踰年憸臣逐，国老起相继。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199607'>除公守襄阳，士始有生意。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199607'>兹焉归法从，乃是朝廷计。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199607'>在公何足云，事业本馀弃。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199607'>掖垣美花木，入直春正丽。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199607'>同僚看家风，立马挥九制。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199607'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_199607_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年12月</a>　岁暮，秦观仍寄居蔡州佛舍，有与吴承务简。<div id='poem_1204791' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204791' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204791?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与吴承务帖</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204791")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204791_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204791'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204791'>穷冬急景，佛舍萧然，甚无聊赖，以此颇深企想，不审公外履尚何如？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204791_comment'></div>《西台法帖》昨日方寻得，谨驰上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204791_comment'></div>公家笔法妙绝如此，何必更求他日所书乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204791_comment'></div>缪幅更不敢为献，情恕，幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1204791_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1204791'><span class='label'>按：</span>王敬之等刻《淮海集·补遗》。又见《五百家播芳大全文粹》卷六七。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1204791_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年</a>　是岁，作泸州使君任公墓表，详记元丰中治西南乞弟之事。<div id='poem_1204949' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204949' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204949?labeling=true' target='_blank'>泸州使君任公墓表<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰六年五月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204949")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204949_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204949'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204949'>元丰中，朝廷治西南乞弟之罪，至于斩将帅，绌监司，两蜀骚然，四年而后定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204949_comment'></div>余尝怪乞弟裔夷耳，兵不过二千人，非有冒顿强悍之威，结赞狡险之谋，蛇豕微种，乃为边患如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204949_comment'></div>及观泸州使君任公事迹，然后知累年之役，实部使者为之，裔夷何足责也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204949_comment'></div>任公讳伋，字师中，眉州眉山人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204949_comment'></div>少学读书，通其大义，不治章句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204949_comment'></div>性任侠喜事，与其兄孜相继举进士中第，知名于时，眉人敬之，号二任，而苏先生洵，尤与厚善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204949_comment'></div>熙宁某年，其察访使熊本荐知泸州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204949_comment'></div>州上接僰道，下连南平，控引蛮夷，千有馀里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204949_comment'></div>如甫望个恕、罗氏鬼主沙取诸部，皆岁来互市，而守将任轻，无节制之权，非有奇略远谋，则不幸往往有事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204949_comment'></div>公既至，威信大著，夷夏便之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204949_comment'></div>岁满当更，诏留再任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204949_comment'></div>比满，又特转一官留之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204949_comment'></div>元丰二年，纳溪砦互市，有殴罗胡苟里夷人死者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204949_comment'></div>故事，汉人杀夷人，既论死，仍偿其资，谓之骨价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204949_comment'></div>时砦将欲勿与，夷人大恚，争噪而出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204949_comment'></div>公驰至境上，具以祸福晓之，相与投兵请降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204949_comment'></div>乱者八母，其六既听命矣，而转运判官意与公异，乃移泸州，不与措置事，专为攻讨之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204949_comment'></div>公争弗能得，乃叹曰：「边患自此始矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204949_comment'></div>即具奏，言：「罗胡苟里，本泸州熟户夷也，比因杀伤，求索骨价，为侵境上，故是常事，与异时生夷反叛不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204949_comment'></div>臣招纳垂毕，而使者贪功生事，固欲讨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204949_comment'></div>臣恐穷迫无所窜伏，转投生界，则甫望个恕诸部更相结连，益鸱张而难制矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204949_comment'></div>会女孙卒，不果上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204949_comment'></div>七月，诏泾原路副总管韩存宝以陕右兵五千人经制其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204949_comment'></div>存宝在泸，攻罗胡苟里，灭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204949_comment'></div>诸夷惊溃，果奔甫望个恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204949_comment'></div>其年冬，个恕之酋乞弟遂称兵反，皆如公所料云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204949_comment'></div>初，乞弟自纳溪砦互市还，过江安县，县令犒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204949_comment'></div>既去数十里，遣亲信杨节、一毛以一马谢令，令辞不受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204949_comment'></div>一毛去至夷牢口，为土夷所邀，一毛死焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204949_comment'></div>杨节者，本嘉州卒吏，避罪亡入夷中，夷人爱之，用事，号为罗判。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204949_comment'></div>至是，节自度不免，乃以矢房中乞弟所入马二千缗券来降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204949_comment'></div>公以中国不失信于小夷，宜斩节归券，责以纳亡之罪，则乞弟惮威而愧德矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204949_comment'></div>而转运使固执不从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204949_comment'></div>三年，乞弟果以一毛为辞入寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1204949_comment'></div>路分都监王宣以兵二千人御之，战于罗个牟国，为贼所败，宣与其子某及裨将十有四人死之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1204949_comment'></div>于是诏韩存宝，复以陕右兵五千人经制其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1204949_comment'></div>存宝至泸，逗留不进，阴使人诱乞弟以书降，遽分屯奏功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1204949_comment'></div>天子得书怒甚，更遣环庆路副总管林广代之，命御史何正臣、中人梁从政至蜀杂治，狱具，斩存宝于泸州，流监军韩承式于海岛，除转运使董钺名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1204949_comment'></div>四年，广进兵抵乞弟之巢，贼空壁遁去，广不得已，竟纳其降而还，天子亦不复责矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1204949_comment'></div>自是，泸州守将始加沿边安抚之名，专治军政，部使不得辄与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1204949_comment'></div>未几，使者复以开边、田赋、生税为请，天子一切不许，而西南夷复安堵矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1204949_comment'></div>由是言之，前日之役，岂非部使者实为之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1204949_comment'></div>初，公既奏罗胡苟里之事，虽不果上，而使者闻知，内衔切骨，日夜谋中公以法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1204949_comment'></div>公知其谋，乃录使者不法、事关泸州十有五条上之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1204949_comment'></div>使者<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1204949", 1204949, "Clauses/167/Comments/0")'>薄遽</span>，不知所为，即诬奏公，乞弟过江安时，不时掩击，及延儒生讲书，疑有私谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1204949_comment'></div>朝廷疑之，乃先免而下章于它部，各穷竟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1204949_comment'></div>所考未具，而公既卒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1204949_comment'></div>时当途者以公既殁，为使者地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1204949_comment'></div>公之子大防，三诣阙上书，陈冤状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1204949_comment'></div>狱不敢变，使者竟免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1204949_comment'></div>公为吏通敏，吏民畏而爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1204949_comment'></div>其通守齐安也，尝游于定惠院，既去，郡人名其亭曰「任公」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1204949_comment'></div>时苏先生之长子翰林公轼以谴迁齐安，人知其与公善也，复于其侧为师中庵，曰：「师中必来访予，将馆于是」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1204949_comment'></div>明年，公卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1204949_comment'></div>郡人闻之，相与哭于定惠者百馀人，饭僧于亭，而祭公于庵，而苏先生之少子中书公辙复为之记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1204949_comment'></div>余尝从翰林、中书公辙，闻二任之风久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1204949_comment'></div>后为汝南学官，始识大防，于是得公之行事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1204949_comment'></div>公以元丰四年三月二十四日卒于遂州西禅佛舍，享年六十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1204949_comment'></div>六年五月二十二日葬于光山县淮信乡午步原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1204949_comment'></div>其世次官邑，御史顿君既为幽堂之志，此不复著，著其泸州之事，与志之阙不书者，揭于墓原，以备史官之择云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_59_1204949_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年</a>　是岁，秦观著有国论、主术、财用上下篇，与苏轼策题相吻合，拥护元祐更化。<div id='poem_1204836' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204836' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204836?labeling=true' target='_blank'>国论</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204836")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204836_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204836'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204836'>臣闻古之人君，以其祖考之志而升黜人材、弛张法度者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204836_comment'></div>太上忘言，其次有言，其下不及言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204836_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204836_comment'></div>昔舜举十六相，去四凶，肇十有二州，皆尧志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204836_comment'></div>而精诚所动，神化所移，不待告之以言，而天下晓然，固已心知其本末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204836_comment'></div>此所谓太上忘言者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204836_comment'></div>盘庚之迁亳，武王之伐商，所以从先王之业，承文考之志也，而浮言横议，二三不一，至以其迁伐之意，托于词令，丁宁而告于庭，委曲而誓诸野，然后民始悦然而服从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204836_comment'></div>此所谓其次有言者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204836_comment'></div>秦孝公用商君之说，变法令，易风俗，所以修缪公之业，成献公之志也，然未尝以其变法之意告民，疑而不服，则痛法以绳之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204836_comment'></div>此所谓其下不及言者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204836_comment'></div>夫秦之不及言，固无足道，而舜之忘言，又不可以遽及，然则后世人君，有以祖考之命而升黜人材、弛张法度者，安得不法盘庚、武王之有言哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204836_comment'></div>陛下即位以来，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1204836", 1204836, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>图任</span>元老，眷礼名儒，屏弃奸臣，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1204836", 1204836, "Clauses/48/Comments/0")'>投窜</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1204836", 1204836, "Clauses/48/Comments/1")'>刻吏</span>，所以照临海内甚盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204836_comment'></div>罢青苗之使，废市易之司，削保甲之条，刊免役之令，至于摘山煮海冶铸之事，他日吏缘以为奸者，临遣信臣，更定其法，所以加惠元元甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204836_comment'></div>臣窃闻之，凡此大功数十，淹速轻重，虽出于圣母之裁成，其大槩则皆先帝之末命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204836_comment'></div>然大道之行，小人所不利，或作为诋欺之言，悖乱群听，以为先帝之道，陛下当终身奉以周旋，而数年之间，遽听一二大臣，更张几尽，异乎所谓父作之、子述之者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204836_comment'></div>自非明智不惑之士，往往闻其说而疑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204836_comment'></div>呜呼，此殆陛下不法盘庚、武王有言之过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204836_comment'></div>夫子之事父，其生也，养志为大，养口体次之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204836_comment'></div>其殁也，继志为大，述事次之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204836_comment'></div>知述事而不知继志，犹养口体而不养志也，非所以为达孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204836_comment'></div>秦皇、汉武皆以盖世之气，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1204836", 1204836, "Clauses/89/Comments/0")'>辟阖</span>宇宙之材，并吞诸侯，攘却胡粤，若以功业言之，则始皇之英伟杰特，又非武帝之可比也，然而万世之下，号始皇为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1204836", 1204836, "Clauses/96/Comments/0")'>暴主</span>，称武帝为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1204836", 1204836, "Clauses/97/Comments/0")'>贤君</span>，秦祚遽倾，汉基益大者，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204836_comment'></div>二世不变始皇之事，孝昭能改武帝之法故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204836_comment'></div>向使先帝晚年，于人材法度初无升黜之心、弛张之意，陛下犹当继其志，不述其事，又况亲承于末命乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204836_comment'></div>臣愿陛下具以意，作为明诏，丁宁反覆，如古训诰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1204836", 1204836, "Clauses/111/Comments/0")'>誓命</span>之文，布告天下，咸使闻之，则小人虽有诋欺之言，不能以疑众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204836_comment'></div>然后被之于诗章，传示无穷，以明德意，使后世皆知成先帝之功者陛下也，岂不休哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1204836_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204837' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204837' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204837?labeling=true' target='_blank'>主术</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204837")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204837_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204837'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204837'>臣闻人主之术无他，其要在乎能任政事之臣与议论之臣而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204837_comment'></div>政事之臣者，宰相执政，和阴阳万物，宰制百辟，镇抚四夷，与天子经纶于帷幄之中者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204837_comment'></div>议论之臣者，谏官御史，学术知古始，器识通世务，奋不顾身，与天子辨曲直、争是非者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204837_comment'></div>今天下之事，有执政之臣以行之，有议论之臣以言之，则人主可以弁冕端委而无所事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204837_comment'></div>不然则虽弊精神，竭筋力，以夜继日，犹无益也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204837_comment'></div>臣请以用人一事明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204837_comment'></div>士大夫以名列于仕版者，盖以万计，有智者，有愚者，有贤者，有不肖者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204837_comment'></div>若智与贤，则功利之所从兴也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204837_comment'></div>愚与不肖，则罪害之所从起也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204837_comment'></div>夫人主以一身之思虑，一耳目之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1204837", 1204837, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>聪明</span>，而当天下功罪利害之机，非有政事之臣，则百官之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1204837", 1204837, "Clauses/37/Comments/0")'>进退</span>奈何而不乱也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204837_comment'></div>然人之难知久矣，实愚而似智，实智而似愚者有之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204837_comment'></div>实贤而似不肖，实不肖而似贤者有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204837_comment'></div>申以亲疏之异，重以好恶之偏，夫以天下之智愚贤不肖而付之于二三大臣之手，非有议论之臣，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1204837", 1204837, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>进退</span>当否奈何而知之也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204837_comment'></div>虽然，政事之臣者，人主之股肱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204837_comment'></div>议论之臣者，人主之耳目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204837_comment'></div>任政事之臣而忽谏官，略御史，犹股肱便利而耳目盲瞆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204837_comment'></div>任议论之臣而轻宰相，薄执政，犹耳目<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1204837", 1204837, "Clauses/58/Comments/0")'>聪明</span>而股肱折也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204837_comment'></div>要之二者不可偏胜，使之适平而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204837_comment'></div>汉成帝用王凤为大将军，政事大小皆自凤出，天子曾不一举手，京兆尹王章言之，为凤所陷，罪至大逆，故阳朔之后，天下以言为讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204837_comment'></div>唐明皇用李林甫为相十有九年，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1204837", 1204837, "Clauses/70/Comments/0")'>颛政</span>用事，补阙杜琎上书，斥为下邽令，由是谏诤路绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204837_comment'></div>此则任政事之臣太胜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204837_comment'></div>汉武帝擢严助、朱买臣、吾邱寿王、司马相如、东方朔之徒于左右，朝廷有政事，辄令助等与大臣辨论，大臣数诎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204837_comment'></div>唐德宗晚年，宰相唯奉行诏书，所与图事者，李齐运、裴延龄、韦渠牟而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204837_comment'></div>此则任议论之臣太胜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204837_comment'></div>臣闻仁祖时，天下之事，一切委之执政，群臣无得预者，除授或不当，虽贵戚近属，旨从中出，辄为固执不行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204837_comment'></div>一旦谏官列其罪，御史数其失，虽元老名儒，上所眷礼者，亦称病而赐罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204837_comment'></div>政事之臣得以举其职，议论之臣得以行其言，两者之势适平，是以治功之隆，过越汉唐，与成康相先后，盖繇此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204837_comment'></div>陛下即位以来，图任老成，属以政事，屡下明诏，使中外大臣举谏官，荐御史，保任骨鲠，以备献纳之科，可谓得人主之要术矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204837_comment'></div>愿鉴汉唐之弊，专<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1204837", 1204837, "Clauses/114/Comments/0")'>取法</span>于仁祖，常使两者之势适平，足以相制，而不足以相胜，则陛下可以弁冕端委而无事矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1204837_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年</a>　春，秦观在蔡州教授任，有水龙吟词赠娄琬；南歌子词赠陶心儿，苏轼、程颐尝有讥评。作品：水龙吟（小楼连远横空）南歌子（玉漏迢迢尽）<div id='poem_199693' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199693' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199693?labeling=true' target='_blank'>水龙吟</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199693")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199693_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199693'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199693'>小楼连远横空，下窥绣毂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_199693", 199693, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>雕鞍</span>骤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199693'>朱帘半卷，单衣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_199693", 199693, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>初试</span>，清明时候。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199693'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_199693", 199693, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>破暖</span>轻风，弄晴微雨，欲无还有。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199693'>卖花声过尽，斜阳院落，红成阵、飞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_199693", 199693, "Clauses/10/Comments/1")'>鸳甃</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199693_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199693'>玉佩丁东别后，怅佳期、参差难又。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199693'>名缰利锁，天还知道，和天也瘦。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199693'>花下重门，柳边深巷，不堪回首。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199693'>念多情，但有当时皓月，向人依旧。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_199693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_199693'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(199693)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><div id='poem_199732' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199732' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199732?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南歌子<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>三首</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199732")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199732_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199732'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199732'>玉漏迢迢尽，银潢淡淡横。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199732_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199732'>梦回宿酒未全醒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199732_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199732'>已被邻鸡催起、怕天明。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199732_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199732'>臂上妆犹在，襟间泪尚盈。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199732_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199732'>水边灯火渐人行。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199732_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199732'>天外一钩残月、带三星。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_199732_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_199732'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(199732)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年</a>　秦观有春日杂兴之十，似对当时文坛论争而发。作品：春日杂兴之十（艺籍燔祖龙）<div id='poem_199585' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199585' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199585?labeling=true' target='_blank'>春日杂兴十首<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199585")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199585_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_199585_0'>① 按：本诗潭潭故邑井、昔我游京室、客从远方来、桃李用事辰四首，亦见张耒《柯山集》卷七，题《春日杂兴四首》。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199585'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199585'>艺籍燔祖龙，斯文就沦丧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199585'>帝矜黔首愚，诸隽<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作雄）</span>出相望。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199585'>扬马操宏纲，韩柳激颓浪。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199585'>建安妙讴吟，风概亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_199585", 199585, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>超放</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199585'>玉绳带华月，艳艳青冥上。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199585'>奕世希末光，经纬得无妄。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199585'>儿曹独何事，诋斥几覆酱。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199585'>原心良自诬，猥欲私所尚。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199585'>螳螂拒飞辙，精卫填溟涨。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199585'>咄咄徒尔为，东海固无恙。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199585'>鹓鸾日彫灭，黄口纷冗长。<div id='poem_sentence_10_199585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_199585'>投袂睇层霄，兹怀谁与亮。<div id='poem_sentence_11_199585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_199585'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_199585_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年4月</a>　夏四月复制科，苏轼与鲜于侁荐秦观于朝，秦观有致鲜于学士书。作品：与鲜于学士书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年4月</a>　四月初，秦观有赏酴醾有感诗。作品：赏酴醾有感（春来百物不入眼）<div id='poem_199336' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199336' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199336?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赏酴醾有感</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199336")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_199336_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199336'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199336'>春来百物不入眼，唯见此花堪断肠。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199336_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199336'>借问断肠缘底事，罗衣曾似此花香<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《淮海后集》卷四）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199336_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199336'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_199336_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年夏</a>　夏，有代蔡州进瑞麦图状及谢雨文。作品：代蔡州进瑞麦图状、谢雨文。<div id='poem_1204729' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204729' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204729?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代蔡州进瑞麦图状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年夏）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204729")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204729_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204729'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204729'>勘会本州自春已来屡得雨泽，已于某月日具状奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204729_comment'></div>讫今来，二麦并已<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204729", 1204729, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>成熟</span>，地无高下，所收斗斛数倍常年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204729_comment'></div>及诸县节次申送，致麦苗有一茎二穗、或三穗，其多有至五穗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204729_comment'></div>父老等皆云：「数十年来无此丰熟，亦未尝见有麦苗一茎至数穗者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204729_comment'></div>以此见二圣临御已来，功化日新，利兴害去，善气充塞，致此嘉应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204729_comment'></div>臣待罪郡守，目睹其事，不敢隐默，谨画成图子一本，随状上进以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204729_comment'></div>谨奏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1204729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1204729'><span class='label'>按：</span>《淮海集》卷三六。又见《永乐大典》卷二二一八一，康熙《上蔡县志》卷一四，《古今图书集成》庶徵典卷一八六、草木典卷三三。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1204729_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1204966' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204966' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204966?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年夏）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204966")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204966_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204966'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204966'>谨以清酌庶羞之奠，敢昭告于某神：惟大荒落，阳气浸骄，沮伤天和，怒风鸣条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204966_comment'></div>川池既耗，土山行焦，念土之毛，民惨不聊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204966_comment'></div>祗奉明命，爰率我僚，祷雨于神，惠此东皋，日走祠下，莫敢告劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204966_comment'></div>神享其诚，精祲宜交，油然作云，遂不崇朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204966_comment'></div>其散如丝，其沃如膏，焦卷一变，蔚为美苗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204966_comment'></div>罢遣儿曹，无复叫号，巫觋反室，藏缄鼓箫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204966_comment'></div>秋成可期，玉烛遂调。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204966_comment'></div>樽有旨酒，豆有嘉殽，拜贶于神，神鉴其昭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204966_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1204966_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年5月</a>　向宗回代谢景温知蔡州，秦观代作谒宣圣文。<div id='poem_1204957' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204957' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204957?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谒宣圣文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204957")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204957_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204957'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204957'>郡守被命于朝，既至治所，则必告于境内之明神，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204957_comment'></div>矧惟宣圣，实我儒师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204957_comment'></div>荐见之礼，敢后群祠？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204957_comment'></div>是率僚属，爰及士子，躬趋于庭，以报祀事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204957_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1204957_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年5月</a>　五月，鲜于侁知陈州，秦观有与鲜于学士书。作品：与鲜于学士书二。<div id='poem_1204937' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204937' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204937?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鲜于子骏行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204937")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204937_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204937'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204937'>公讳侁，字子骏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204937_comment'></div>其先成汤之裔箕子，封于朝鲜，子仲食采于于，为鲜于氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204937_comment'></div>世家渔阳，唐初诏为阆州刺史，殁于官，子孙家焉，遂为阆中人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204937_comment'></div>开元时，仲通、叔明节制两川，叔明以功赐姓李氏，后复故姓，于公十二世祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204937_comment'></div>曾祖演，祖瓘，皆不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204937_comment'></div>父至，自号隐居先生，为蜀名儒，以公赠金紫光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204937_comment'></div>母赵氏，追封安德郡太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204937_comment'></div>公自少<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>庄重</span>不苟，力学有文，乡党异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204937_comment'></div>年二十登景祐五年进士科，调京兆府栎阳县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204937_comment'></div>到官数月，丁外艰，服除，授江陵府右司理参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204937_comment'></div>庆历中，天下大旱，有诏中外臣僚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>实封</span>言事，公上书，推灾变所兴有四：一曰言不从，二曰厥咎僭，三曰欲得不明，四曰上下皆蔽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204937_comment'></div>言甚切直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204937_comment'></div>移歙州歙县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204937_comment'></div>歙俗喜讼，善持吏长短，吏稍绳以法，辄得罪去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204937_comment'></div>公为黟，又尝摄婺源，其治皆为诸邑最，豪强畏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204937_comment'></div>改著作佐郎，知河南府伊阙县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204937_comment'></div>迁秘书丞，通判黔州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204937_comment'></div>未行，改通判绵州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204937_comment'></div>左绵远郡，自守将以下皆日课吏卒供薪炭、刍豆、蔬果，而赢取其直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204937_comment'></div>公到悉罢之，守将已下闻之亦罢，其风遂绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204937_comment'></div>清献赵公使蜀，首荐之朝，转屯田员外郎，赐五品服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204937_comment'></div>英宗初为皇嗣，公上疏言：「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/71/Comments/1")'>储号</span>未正，措置未宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204937_comment'></div>今皇嗣初定，未闻选经术识虑之士以拥护羽翼，乞妙选贤德以为宫僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204937_comment'></div>陛下清躬小有寝食不顺，朝夕左右固惟妇寺，愿复汉侍中之职，令二府悉休宿卫」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204937_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>覃恩</span>迁都官员外郎，通判保安军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204937_comment'></div>何公郯帅永兴，辟公签书其节度判官厅公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204937_comment'></div>改职方员外郎，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>覃恩</span>转屯田郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204937_comment'></div>代还，用三司使荐，除蔡河拨发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204937_comment'></div>神宗初即位，诏中外直言阙失，公应诏言十六事，其目曰：纳谏诤以辅德，访多士以图治，严法令以制世，崇节俭以富民，明黜陟以考实，去贪暴以崇厚，重台谏以委任，选监司以督奸，阅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>守宰</span>以求治，慎迁易以去弊，重根本以图固，复选举以澄源，申武备以警奸，治军旅以除患，谨边防以重内，练将帅以御戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204937_comment'></div>其末曰：「愿陛下事两宫以孝，待大臣以礼，侍从知其邪正，近习防其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/113/Comments/1")'>奸壬</span>」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204937_comment'></div>上爱其文，出以示御史中丞滕元发曰：「此文不减王陶」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204937_comment'></div>王陶东宫旧臣，上所信重，故以公拟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204937_comment'></div>而陶亦雅相知，尝荐公明经术、知治体、切直不阿，宜备顾问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204937_comment'></div>后为三司使，又奏为其判官，不从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1204937_comment'></div>熙宁初，有诏侍从之臣各举所知，范蜀公时为翰林学士，以公应诏，除利州路转运判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1204937_comment'></div>执政有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>沮议</span>者，上曰：「鲜于某有文学」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1204937_comment'></div>执政曰：「陛下何以知之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1204937_comment'></div>上曰：「有章疏在」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1204937_comment'></div>执政乃不敢言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1204937_comment'></div>王荆公用事，公上疏言时政之失，曰：「可为忧患者一，可为太息者二，其它逆治体而起人心者，不可概举」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1204937_comment'></div>又曰：「陛下聪明过于文帝，而群臣无贾生之才」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1204937_comment'></div>西方议用兵，公以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/150/Comments/0")'>兵将</span>未择，关陕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/151/Comments/0")'>无年</span>，未宜轻动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1204937_comment'></div>乃移书劝安抚使，宜如李牧守雁门故事，远斥堠，谨烽火，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/157/Comments/0")'>坚壁清野</span>，使寇无所获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1204937_comment'></div>密戒诸路，选将训兵，蓄锐俟时，须其可击而图之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1204937_comment'></div>安抚使不能用，师果无功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1204937_comment'></div>未几，庆州兵叛，关中震扰，巴峡以西皆警。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1204937_comment'></div>成都守与部使者争议发兵屯要处，书檄旁午于涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1204937_comment'></div>公一皆止之，示以无事，蜀人遂安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1204937_comment'></div>公以剑门<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/174/Comments/0")'>形势</span>之地，当分权以制内外，今帅剑南者，举全蜀之权以畀之，非便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1204937_comment'></div>宜循唐制，成都、益昌各自置帅，以消奸雄窥伺之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1204937_comment'></div>书累上不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1204937_comment'></div>是时，初作助役、青苗之法，诏诸路监司各定所部役钱之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1204937_comment'></div>转运使李瑜欲以四十万缗为额，公以利路民贫，用二十万缗足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1204937_comment'></div>与瑜论不合，各具利害以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1204937_comment'></div>上是公议，谓判司农寺曾布曰：「鲜于某所定利路役书，可为诸路法」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1204937_comment'></div>遂罢瑜，而以公为转运副使，兼提举常平、农田水利、差役事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1204937_comment'></div>而青苗之法，独久之不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1204937_comment'></div>执政怪焉，亟遣吏问状，公曰：「诏书称愿取即与，利路之民无愿取者，岂可强与之邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1204937_comment'></div>岁满，有旨再任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1204937_comment'></div>及罢，又留之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1204937_comment'></div>转都官郎中、西京左藏库使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1204937_comment'></div>知利州事周永懿贪暴不法，前使者惮其凶狡，置不敢问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1204937_comment'></div>公具得其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/214/Comments/0")'>奸赃</span>，即遣吏就捕，械送于狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1204937_comment'></div>永懿竟除名<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/217/Comments/0")'>编管</span>衡州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1204937_comment'></div>初，利州以兼益利路兵马都监，故事，武臣为守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1204937_comment'></div>至是，公上言，乞堂选文臣知州事，别置路分都监，以惩永懿之弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1204937_comment'></div>又言剑门关、葭萌寨使臣兼知县事，类多不习文法，宜各置令，转领邑事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1204937_comment'></div>诏皆报可，遂为定制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1204937_comment'></div>其他深计远画、公私便之、而人所不及者，盖不可悉数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1204937_comment'></div>十馀年，使者有欲变其法者，父老泣曰：「老运使之法，何可变也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1204937_comment'></div>盖公之犹子师中尝使利路，故民以老运使别之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1204937_comment'></div>公奉使九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1204937_comment'></div>阆为名郡，方新法初行，诸路骚动，而公平心处之，乡人无异议者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1204937_comment'></div>今翰林苏公以谓上不害法，中不伤民，下不废亲，为「三难」云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1204937_comment'></div>移京东西路转运副使，过阙陛见，面赐三品服，迁司封郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1204937_comment'></div>时河决曹村，梁楚之地被害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1204937_comment'></div>公移檄诸郡，具为科条，所以拯救之术甚备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1204937_comment'></div>议者或谓：「决河东流入海，自其本性，宜勿复塞」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1204937_comment'></div>公曰：「东州平衍，兖、郓、单、济、曹、濮诸河，其所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/268/Comments/0")'>归纳</span>，惟梁山、张泽两泺，夏秋霖潦，犹能为害，矧纵大河冲注于中，则诸郡生聚，其为鱼乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1204937_comment'></div>乃作《议河》一篇数千言上之，又乞下澶州早行闭塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1204937_comment'></div>上皆嘉纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1204937_comment'></div>初，京东分东西两路，后以财用虚赢，不相通和，诏复合为一路，升公为转运使，更尽领其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1204937_comment'></div>召还，赐对，劳问甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1204937_comment'></div>上欲留公京师，而公固求守郡，遂除知扬州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1204937_comment'></div>官制行，换朝请大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1204937_comment'></div>未几，坐举吏受赇免，降为朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1204937_comment'></div>方在谴中，又闻故吏以赇败者，或劝公宣惩前事自陈，公曰：「吾专刺举十二年，所任吏四百馀人，宁尽保其往耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1204937_comment'></div>然既已荐之于朝，岂可反覆为自全计」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1204937_comment'></div>卒不首也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1204937_comment'></div>复朝请大夫，管勾西京留守司御史台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1204937_comment'></div>公之在西京也，今枢密范公亦领台事，而司马温公提举崇福宫，三人相得欢甚，搢绅慕其游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1204937_comment'></div>及二圣临御，图任老成，于是拜温公为门下侍郎，起范公帅环庆，复除公为京东转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1204937_comment'></div>温公曰：「子骏不当使外，顾东土承使者聚歛之后，民不聊生，烦子骏往救之耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1204937_comment'></div>比公行，又谓所亲曰：「福星往矣，安得百子骏布在天下乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1204937_comment'></div>公至，则奏罢莱芜利国监铁冶，乞变盐法，依河北路通商，逐勾当公事之刻薄者二人，发潍州守<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/332/Comments/0")'>奸赃</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1204937_comment'></div>东人大悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1204937_comment'></div>又言：「高丽朝贡，可令濒海州郡为礼，不烦朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1204937_comment'></div>若其自欲商贾，听往闽越州」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1204937_comment'></div>丽人无以辞矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1204937_comment'></div>召还，为太常少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1204937_comment'></div>三省、太常会议神宗配享功臣，或欲用王荆公、吴正宪公者，公曰：「富文忠公勋德终始，天下具知，宜配食」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1204937_comment'></div>议遂定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1204937_comment'></div>因上言：「本朝旧制，配享虽用二人，宜如唐用郭子仪故事，止用富公一人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1204937_comment'></div>诏从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1204937_comment'></div>元祐元年，明堂礼毕，拜右谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1204937_comment'></div>既拜命，即以辨邪正之说为献，其言君子小人相为消长之理甚备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1204937_comment'></div>又言：「近岁人物衰少，凡一官有缺，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_106_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/365/Comments/0")'>差拟</span>为艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1204937_comment'></div>宜许六曹寺监长史各举僚属，严其论荐之法，亦以见达官之所举，而执政大臣可以优游论道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1204937_comment'></div>盖宰相择台省长官，台省长官荐举僚属，知人安民之道，于斯为得」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1204937_comment'></div>自保甲之法行，民以艺能入等授班行者，即为官户免役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1204937_comment'></div>时祥符县至一乡止有一户可差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1204937_comment'></div>公言侥倖太甚，宜依进纳官例，充役如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1204937_comment'></div>须其升朝，乃免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1204937_comment'></div>有旨诏谏官直庐，不得与东两省相通，以防漏泄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1204937_comment'></div>公上言：「昔汉武帝尝命文学之士递宿禁中，凡公府欲行之政，俾之阅视辨论，中外相应以义理之文，故文章尔雅，训词深厚，炳然与三代同风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1204937_comment'></div>唐太宗临御，每遇宰相平章事，必命谏官俱入，小有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_115_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/397/Comments/0")'>颇失</span>，随即箴规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1204937_comment'></div>故贞观之治，企及三代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1204937_comment'></div>今乃屏置谏官，使与两省不相往还，恐非朝廷开言路、以副圣上纳谏之义」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1204937_comment'></div>又劾大臣不宜辅郡者，请加谴黜，以示天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1204937_comment'></div>其馀乞复制举，分经义、诗赋为两科，以求人材；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1204937_comment'></div>罢大理狱以省事，罢帐司检法以省官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1204937_comment'></div>严出官之法，减特奏名人数，以抑滥进；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1204937_comment'></div>再言京东盐禁不便，宜弛以利民；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1204937_comment'></div>许蔡河拨发统制县道，以便程督；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1204937_comment'></div>罢戎、泸保甲，以恤民力；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1204937_comment'></div>行浙中旧法，以省漕运；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1204937_comment'></div>复三路义勇，以宽保甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1204937_comment'></div>沙汰学官，以熄异议，事多施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1204937_comment'></div>明年春，以病不任朝谒，乞郡，数赐告不俞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1204937_comment'></div>章三上，乃拜集贤殿修撰、知陈州事，仍有旨，满岁除待制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1204937_comment'></div>夏五月辛未，终于州寝，享年六十有九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1204937_comment'></div>累勋柱国，赐爵清源县男。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1204937_comment'></div>前数日，语诸子曰：「吾心无不足者，惟以不得归老阳翟，别著《易说》为恨」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1204937_comment'></div>无它言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1204937_comment'></div>公忠亮果断出于天性，自小官以至进擢，数上书言天下事，咸具利害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1204937_comment'></div>移谏官御史，其言或用或不用，未尝小加损益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1204937_comment'></div>为政以经术自辅，所至有迹，其去，民追思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1204937_comment'></div>熙宁、元丰之间，士大夫骛于功利，更其素守者多矣，公虽屡更使指，而屹然于新进少年之中，号为正人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1204937_comment'></div>晚登侍从，益厉锋气，知无不言，在职九十馀日，所言当世之务略尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1204937_comment'></div>呜呼，使公不疾病且死，得大用于时，其勋业岂易量哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1204937_comment'></div>然公起诸生，仕为谏官，供奉仗内，言听计行，天下受其赐，比夫当轴处中，初无益于县官者，盖得失相万也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1204937_comment'></div>由是言之，虽病疾且死，弗克大用于时，亦可以无憾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1204937_comment'></div>喜推毂士，士之游其门者，后皆知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1204937_comment'></div>治经术，有师法，论注多出于新意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1204937_comment'></div>晚年为《诗》与《楚辞》尤精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1204937_comment'></div>泰山孙复尝与公论《春秋》，叹曰：「今世学经术，未有如公者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1204937_comment'></div>苏翰林读公《八咏》，自谓欲作而不可及，读公《九诵》，以谓有屈、宋之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1204937_comment'></div>今天子赐之诏书，亦曰：「学足以迩古，才足以御今，智足以应变，强足以守官，深于经术，达于人情」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1204937_comment'></div>又曰：「金石之节，皓首不衰」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1204937_comment'></div>则公之德善，于是可考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1204937_comment'></div>所著文集二十卷，《诗传》二十卷，《周易圣断》七卷，《典说》一卷，《治世谠言》七卷，《谏垣奏稿》二卷，《刀笔集》三卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1204937_comment'></div>其馀未编次者尚多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1204937_comment'></div>娶陈氏，太常寺太祝藩之女，恭俭婉嫕，治家有法，封某君，前公一年终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1204937_comment'></div>男五人：复，早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1204937_comment'></div>颉，河南府偃师县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1204937_comment'></div>群，凤州司法参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1204937_comment'></div>绰，假承务郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1204937_comment'></div>焯，未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1204937_comment'></div>皆有学行，而颉尤自立，士大夫多称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1204937_comment'></div>女四人：长早卒，次适赵氏，次适蒲氏，皆前卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1204937_comment'></div>次适永安县主簿张球。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1204937_comment'></div>孙男一人，崧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1204937_comment'></div>孙女二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1204937_comment'></div>公两得任子恩，皆以予兄之子，故焯犹未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1204937_comment'></div>凡嫁内外亲族之女若干人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1204937_comment'></div>诸孤将以某年某月某日葬于颍昌府阳翟县大儒乡高村之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1204937_comment'></div>前期，颉以书走汝阳，请状公之行义，将乞铭于知公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1204937_comment'></div>某被遇最厚，又尝辱荐于朝，义不敢辞，辄加论次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1204937_comment'></div>而公之行能谋议过人者甚多，难以具举，取其可考不诬、系国家之大者著之，以告夫当世之君子云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_168_1204937_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年5月</a>　五月辛未，鲜于子骏卒于陈州官舍，秦观有鲜于子骏行状。<div id='poem_1204937' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204937' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204937?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鲜于子骏行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204937")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204937_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204937'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204937'>公讳侁，字子骏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204937_comment'></div>其先成汤之裔箕子，封于朝鲜，子仲食采于于，为鲜于氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204937_comment'></div>世家渔阳，唐初诏为阆州刺史，殁于官，子孙家焉，遂为阆中人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204937_comment'></div>开元时，仲通、叔明节制两川，叔明以功赐姓李氏，后复故姓，于公十二世祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204937_comment'></div>曾祖演，祖瓘，皆不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204937_comment'></div>父至，自号隐居先生，为蜀名儒，以公赠金紫光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204937_comment'></div>母赵氏，追封安德郡太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204937_comment'></div>公自少<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>庄重</span>不苟，力学有文，乡党异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204937_comment'></div>年二十登景祐五年进士科，调京兆府栎阳县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204937_comment'></div>到官数月，丁外艰，服除，授江陵府右司理参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204937_comment'></div>庆历中，天下大旱，有诏中外臣僚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>实封</span>言事，公上书，推灾变所兴有四：一曰言不从，二曰厥咎僭，三曰欲得不明，四曰上下皆蔽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204937_comment'></div>言甚切直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204937_comment'></div>移歙州歙县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204937_comment'></div>歙俗喜讼，善持吏长短，吏稍绳以法，辄得罪去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204937_comment'></div>公为黟，又尝摄婺源，其治皆为诸邑最，豪强畏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204937_comment'></div>改著作佐郎，知河南府伊阙县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204937_comment'></div>迁秘书丞，通判黔州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204937_comment'></div>未行，改通判绵州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204937_comment'></div>左绵远郡，自守将以下皆日课吏卒供薪炭、刍豆、蔬果，而赢取其直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204937_comment'></div>公到悉罢之，守将已下闻之亦罢，其风遂绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204937_comment'></div>清献赵公使蜀，首荐之朝，转屯田员外郎，赐五品服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204937_comment'></div>英宗初为皇嗣，公上疏言：「<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/71/Comments/1")'>储号</span>未正，措置未宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204937_comment'></div>今皇嗣初定，未闻选经术识虑之士以拥护羽翼，乞妙选贤德以为宫僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204937_comment'></div>陛下清躬小有寝食不顺，朝夕左右固惟妇寺，愿复汉侍中之职，令二府悉休宿卫」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204937_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/80/Comments/0")'>覃恩</span>迁都官员外郎，通判保安军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204937_comment'></div>何公郯帅永兴，辟公签书其节度判官厅公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204937_comment'></div>改职方员外郎，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_26_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>覃恩</span>转屯田郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204937_comment'></div>代还，用三司使荐，除蔡河拨发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204937_comment'></div>神宗初即位，诏中外直言阙失，公应诏言十六事，其目曰：纳谏诤以辅德，访多士以图治，严法令以制世，崇节俭以富民，明黜陟以考实，去贪暴以崇厚，重台谏以委任，选监司以督奸，阅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/101/Comments/0")'>守宰</span>以求治，慎迁易以去弊，重根本以图固，复选举以澄源，申武备以警奸，治军旅以除患，谨边防以重内，练将帅以御戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204937_comment'></div>其末曰：「愿陛下事两宫以孝，待大臣以礼，侍从知其邪正，近习防其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/113/Comments/1")'>奸壬</span>」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204937_comment'></div>上爱其文，出以示御史中丞滕元发曰：「此文不减王陶」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204937_comment'></div>王陶东宫旧臣，上所信重，故以公拟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204937_comment'></div>而陶亦雅相知，尝荐公明经术、知治体、切直不阿，宜备顾问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204937_comment'></div>后为三司使，又奏为其判官，不从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1204937_comment'></div>熙宁初，有诏侍从之臣各举所知，范蜀公时为翰林学士，以公应诏，除利州路转运判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1204937_comment'></div>执政有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_35_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/131/Comments/0")'>沮议</span>者，上曰：「鲜于某有文学」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1204937_comment'></div>执政曰：「陛下何以知之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1204937_comment'></div>上曰：「有章疏在」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1204937_comment'></div>执政乃不敢言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1204937_comment'></div>王荆公用事，公上疏言时政之失，曰：「可为忧患者一，可为太息者二，其它逆治体而起人心者，不可概举」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1204937_comment'></div>又曰：「陛下聪明过于文帝，而群臣无贾生之才」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1204937_comment'></div>西方议用兵，公以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/150/Comments/0")'>兵将</span>未择，关陕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/151/Comments/0")'>无年</span>，未宜轻动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1204937_comment'></div>乃移书劝安抚使，宜如李牧守雁门故事，远斥堠，谨烽火，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/157/Comments/0")'>坚壁清野</span>，使寇无所获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1204937_comment'></div>密戒诸路，选将训兵，蓄锐俟时，须其可击而图之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1204937_comment'></div>安抚使不能用，师果无功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1204937_comment'></div>未几，庆州兵叛，关中震扰，巴峡以西皆警。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1204937_comment'></div>成都守与部使者争议发兵屯要处，书檄旁午于涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1204937_comment'></div>公一皆止之，示以无事，蜀人遂安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1204937_comment'></div>公以剑门<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/174/Comments/0")'>形势</span>之地，当分权以制内外，今帅剑南者，举全蜀之权以畀之，非便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1204937_comment'></div>宜循唐制，成都、益昌各自置帅，以消奸雄窥伺之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1204937_comment'></div>书累上不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1204937_comment'></div>是时，初作助役、青苗之法，诏诸路监司各定所部役钱之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1204937_comment'></div>转运使李瑜欲以四十万缗为额，公以利路民贫，用二十万缗足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1204937_comment'></div>与瑜论不合，各具利害以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1204937_comment'></div>上是公议，谓判司农寺曾布曰：「鲜于某所定利路役书，可为诸路法」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1204937_comment'></div>遂罢瑜，而以公为转运副使，兼提举常平、农田水利、差役事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1204937_comment'></div>而青苗之法，独久之不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1204937_comment'></div>执政怪焉，亟遣吏问状，公曰：「诏书称愿取即与，利路之民无愿取者，岂可强与之邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1204937_comment'></div>岁满，有旨再任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1204937_comment'></div>及罢，又留之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1204937_comment'></div>转都官郎中、西京左藏库使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1204937_comment'></div>知利州事周永懿贪暴不法，前使者惮其凶狡，置不敢问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1204937_comment'></div>公具得其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_62_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/214/Comments/0")'>奸赃</span>，即遣吏就捕，械送于狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1204937_comment'></div>永懿竟除名<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_63_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/217/Comments/0")'>编管</span>衡州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1204937_comment'></div>初，利州以兼益利路兵马都监，故事，武臣为守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1204937_comment'></div>至是，公上言，乞堂选文臣知州事，别置路分都监，以惩永懿之弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1204937_comment'></div>又言剑门关、葭萌寨使臣兼知县事，类多不习文法，宜各置令，转领邑事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1204937_comment'></div>诏皆报可，遂为定制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1204937_comment'></div>其他深计远画、公私便之、而人所不及者，盖不可悉数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1204937_comment'></div>十馀年，使者有欲变其法者，父老泣曰：「老运使之法，何可变也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1204937_comment'></div>盖公之犹子师中尝使利路，故民以老运使别之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1204937_comment'></div>公奉使九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1204937_comment'></div>阆为名郡，方新法初行，诸路骚动，而公平心处之，乡人无异议者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1204937_comment'></div>今翰林苏公以谓上不害法，中不伤民，下不废亲，为「三难」云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1204937_comment'></div>移京东西路转运副使，过阙陛见，面赐三品服，迁司封郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1204937_comment'></div>时河决曹村，梁楚之地被害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1204937_comment'></div>公移檄诸郡，具为科条，所以拯救之术甚备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1204937_comment'></div>议者或谓：「决河东流入海，自其本性，宜勿复塞」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1204937_comment'></div>公曰：「东州平衍，兖、郓、单、济、曹、濮诸河，其所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_78_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/268/Comments/0")'>归纳</span>，惟梁山、张泽两泺，夏秋霖潦，犹能为害，矧纵大河冲注于中，则诸郡生聚，其为鱼乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1204937_comment'></div>乃作《议河》一篇数千言上之，又乞下澶州早行闭塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1204937_comment'></div>上皆嘉纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1204937_comment'></div>初，京东分东西两路，后以财用虚赢，不相通和，诏复合为一路，升公为转运使，更尽领其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1204937_comment'></div>召还，赐对，劳问甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1204937_comment'></div>上欲留公京师，而公固求守郡，遂除知扬州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1204937_comment'></div>官制行，换朝请大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1204937_comment'></div>未几，坐举吏受赇免，降为朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1204937_comment'></div>方在谴中，又闻故吏以赇败者，或劝公宣惩前事自陈，公曰：「吾专刺举十二年，所任吏四百馀人，宁尽保其往耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1204937_comment'></div>然既已荐之于朝，岂可反覆为自全计」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1204937_comment'></div>卒不首也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1204937_comment'></div>复朝请大夫，管勾西京留守司御史台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1204937_comment'></div>公之在西京也，今枢密范公亦领台事，而司马温公提举崇福宫，三人相得欢甚，搢绅慕其游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1204937_comment'></div>及二圣临御，图任老成，于是拜温公为门下侍郎，起范公帅环庆，复除公为京东转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1204937_comment'></div>温公曰：「子骏不当使外，顾东土承使者聚歛之后，民不聊生，烦子骏往救之耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1204937_comment'></div>比公行，又谓所亲曰：「福星往矣，安得百子骏布在天下乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1204937_comment'></div>公至，则奏罢莱芜利国监铁冶，乞变盐法，依河北路通商，逐勾当公事之刻薄者二人，发潍州守<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/332/Comments/0")'>奸赃</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1204937_comment'></div>东人大悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1204937_comment'></div>又言：「高丽朝贡，可令濒海州郡为礼，不烦朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1204937_comment'></div>若其自欲商贾，听往闽越州」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1204937_comment'></div>丽人无以辞矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1204937_comment'></div>召还，为太常少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1204937_comment'></div>三省、太常会议神宗配享功臣，或欲用王荆公、吴正宪公者，公曰：「富文忠公勋德终始，天下具知，宜配食」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1204937_comment'></div>议遂定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1204937_comment'></div>因上言：「本朝旧制，配享虽用二人，宜如唐用郭子仪故事，止用富公一人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1204937_comment'></div>诏从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1204937_comment'></div>元祐元年，明堂礼毕，拜右谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1204937_comment'></div>既拜命，即以辨邪正之说为献，其言君子小人相为消长之理甚备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1204937_comment'></div>又言：「近岁人物衰少，凡一官有缺，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_106_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/365/Comments/0")'>差拟</span>为艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1204937_comment'></div>宜许六曹寺监长史各举僚属，严其论荐之法，亦以见达官之所举，而执政大臣可以优游论道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1204937_comment'></div>盖宰相择台省长官，台省长官荐举僚属，知人安民之道，于斯为得」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1204937_comment'></div>自保甲之法行，民以艺能入等授班行者，即为官户免役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1204937_comment'></div>时祥符县至一乡止有一户可差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1204937_comment'></div>公言侥倖太甚，宜依进纳官例，充役如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1204937_comment'></div>须其升朝，乃免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1204937_comment'></div>有旨诏谏官直庐，不得与东两省相通，以防漏泄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1204937_comment'></div>公上言：「昔汉武帝尝命文学之士递宿禁中，凡公府欲行之政，俾之阅视辨论，中外相应以义理之文，故文章尔雅，训词深厚，炳然与三代同风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1204937_comment'></div>唐太宗临御，每遇宰相平章事，必命谏官俱入，小有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_115_1204937", 1204937, "Clauses/397/Comments/0")'>颇失</span>，随即箴规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1204937_comment'></div>故贞观之治，企及三代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1204937_comment'></div>今乃屏置谏官，使与两省不相往还，恐非朝廷开言路、以副圣上纳谏之义」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1204937_comment'></div>又劾大臣不宜辅郡者，请加谴黜，以示天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1204937_comment'></div>其馀乞复制举，分经义、诗赋为两科，以求人材；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1204937_comment'></div>罢大理狱以省事，罢帐司检法以省官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1204937_comment'></div>严出官之法，减特奏名人数，以抑滥进；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1204937_comment'></div>再言京东盐禁不便，宜弛以利民；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1204937_comment'></div>许蔡河拨发统制县道，以便程督；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1204937_comment'></div>罢戎、泸保甲，以恤民力；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1204937_comment'></div>行浙中旧法，以省漕运；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1204937_comment'></div>复三路义勇，以宽保甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1204937_comment'></div>沙汰学官，以熄异议，事多施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1204937_comment'></div>明年春，以病不任朝谒，乞郡，数赐告不俞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1204937_comment'></div>章三上，乃拜集贤殿修撰、知陈州事，仍有旨，满岁除待制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1204937_comment'></div>夏五月辛未，终于州寝，享年六十有九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1204937_comment'></div>累勋柱国，赐爵清源县男。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1204937_comment'></div>前数日，语诸子曰：「吾心无不足者，惟以不得归老阳翟，别著《易说》为恨」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1204937_comment'></div>无它言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1204937_comment'></div>公忠亮果断出于天性，自小官以至进擢，数上书言天下事，咸具利害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1204937_comment'></div>移谏官御史，其言或用或不用，未尝小加损益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1204937_comment'></div>为政以经术自辅，所至有迹，其去，民追思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1204937_comment'></div>熙宁、元丰之间，士大夫骛于功利，更其素守者多矣，公虽屡更使指，而屹然于新进少年之中，号为正人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1204937_comment'></div>晚登侍从，益厉锋气，知无不言，在职九十馀日，所言当世之务略尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1204937_comment'></div>呜呼，使公不疾病且死，得大用于时，其勋业岂易量哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1204937_comment'></div>然公起诸生，仕为谏官，供奉仗内，言听计行，天下受其赐，比夫当轴处中，初无益于县官者，盖得失相万也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1204937_comment'></div>由是言之，虽病疾且死，弗克大用于时，亦可以无憾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1204937_comment'></div>喜推毂士，士之游其门者，后皆知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1204937_comment'></div>治经术，有师法，论注多出于新意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1204937_comment'></div>晚年为《诗》与《楚辞》尤精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1204937_comment'></div>泰山孙复尝与公论《春秋》，叹曰：「今世学经术，未有如公者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1204937_comment'></div>苏翰林读公《八咏》，自谓欲作而不可及，读公《九诵》，以谓有屈、宋之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1204937_comment'></div>今天子赐之诏书，亦曰：「学足以迩古，才足以御今，智足以应变，强足以守官，深于经术，达于人情」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1204937_comment'></div>又曰：「金石之节，皓首不衰」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1204937_comment'></div>则公之德善，于是可考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1204937_comment'></div>所著文集二十卷，《诗传》二十卷，《周易圣断》七卷，《典说》一卷，《治世谠言》七卷，《谏垣奏稿》二卷，《刀笔集》三卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1204937_comment'></div>其馀未编次者尚多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1204937_comment'></div>娶陈氏，太常寺太祝藩之女，恭俭婉嫕，治家有法，封某君，前公一年终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1204937_comment'></div>男五人：复，早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1204937_comment'></div>颉，河南府偃师县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1204937_comment'></div>群，凤州司法参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1204937_comment'></div>绰，假承务郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1204937_comment'></div>焯，未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1204937_comment'></div>皆有学行，而颉尤自立，士大夫多称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1204937_comment'></div>女四人：长早卒，次适赵氏，次适蒲氏，皆前卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1204937_comment'></div>次适永安县主簿张球。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1204937_comment'></div>孙男一人，崧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1204937_comment'></div>孙女二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1204937_comment'></div>公两得任子恩，皆以予兄之子，故焯犹未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1204937_comment'></div>凡嫁内外亲族之女若干人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1204937_comment'></div>诸孤将以某年某月某日葬于颍昌府阳翟县大儒乡高村之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1204937_comment'></div>前期，颉以书走汝阳，请状公之行义，将乞铭于知公者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1204937_comment'></div>某被遇最厚，又尝辱荐于朝，义不敢辞，辄加论次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1204937_comment'></div>而公之行能谋议过人者甚多，难以具举，取其可考不诬、系国家之大者著之，以告夫当世之君子云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_168_1204937_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年夏</a>　夏，得肠癖之疾，观高符仲携来辋川图而疾愈；其次韵夏侯太冲秀才一诗，当亦作于此诗。作品：书辋川图后。次韵夏侯太冲秀才（儒官饱闲散）<div id='poem_1204820' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204820' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204820?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书辋川图后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年夏）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204820")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204820_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204820'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204820'>元祐丁卯，余为汝南郡学官，夏得肠癖之疾，卧直舍中，所善高符仲携摩诘《辋川图》视余曰：「阅此可以愈疾」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204820_comment'></div>余本江海人，得图喜甚，即使二儿从旁引之，阅于枕上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204820_comment'></div>恍然若与摩诘入辋川，度华子冈，经孟城坳，憩辋口庄，泊文杏馆，上斤竹岭，并木兰砦，绝茱萸沜，蹑槐陌，窥鹿柴砦，返于南北垞，航欹湖，戏柳浪，濯栾家濑，酌金屑泉，过白石滩，停竹里馆，转辛夷坞，抵漆园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204820_comment'></div>幅巾杖屦，棋弈茗饮，或赋诗自娱，忘其身之匏系于汝南也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204820_comment'></div>数日疾良愈，而符仲亦为夏侯太冲来取图，遂题其末，而归诸高氏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1204820_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199532' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199532' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199532?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵夏侯太冲秀才</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年夏）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199532")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199532_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199532'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199532'>儒官饱闲散，室若僧坊静。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199532'>北窗腹便便，支枕看斗柄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199532'>或时得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_199532", 199532, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>名酒</span>，亭午犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_199532", 199532, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>中圣</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199532'>醒来复何事，弄笔赋秋兴。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199532'>焉知懒是真，但觉贫非病。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199532'>茫茫流水意，会有知音听。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199532'>钟鼎与山林，人生各天性。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199532_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199532'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_199532_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年6月</a>　六月，秦观与东坡等十有六人，集于王诜之西园，李伯时为图，米元章作记，秦观有望海潮词纪其事。作品：望海潮（梅英疏淡）<span class='inlineComment2'>（按，据词意，此词当作于党争日剧少游即将离京之际，非纪此盛会也。徐培均先生理解可能有误。）</span><div id='poem_199753' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199753' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199753?labeling=true' target='_blank'>望海潮<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span>四首</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199753")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199753_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199753'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199753'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_199753", 199753, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>梅英</span>疏淡，冰澌溶泄，东风暗换年华。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199753_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199753'>金谷<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_199753", 199753, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>俊游</span>，铜驼巷陌，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_199753", 199753, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>新晴</span>细履平沙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199753_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199753'>长记误随车，正絮翻蝶舞，芳思交加。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199753_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199753'>柳下桃蹊，乱分春色到人家。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199753_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199753'>西园夜饮鸣笳。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199753_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199753'>有华灯碍月，飞盖妨花。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199753_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199753'>兰苑未空，行人渐老，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_199753", 199753, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>重来</span>是事堪嗟。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199753_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199753'>烟暝酒旗斜，但倚楼极目，时见栖鸦。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199753_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199753'>无奈归心，暗随流水到天涯。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_199753_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_199753'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(199753)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年7月</a>　七月十六日，太皇太后高氏生日，秦观为州守向宗回代作贺表，并有坤成节功德疏文、代蔡州正赐库功德疏、代蔡州进银绢状。作品：代贺坤成节表、坤成节功德疏文、代蔡州正赐库功德疏、代蔡州进银绢状。<div id='poem_1204704' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204704' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204704?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代贺坤成节表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204704")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204704_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204704'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204704'>窃以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1204704", 1204704, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>圣诞</span>当期，严秋在序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204704_comment'></div>协气蟠乎穹壤，颂声溢于华戎<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204704_comment'></div>伏惟太皇太后陛下德并神明，功参覆载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204704_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1204704", 1204704, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>断鳌立极</span>，追配于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1204704", 1204704, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>娲皇</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204704_comment'></div>用楫济川，责成于傅说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204704_comment'></div>忠谋入而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1204704", 1204704, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>奸党</span>破，弊事革而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1204704", 1204704, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>嘉应</span>来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204704_comment'></div>巍乎在唐、虞之间，卓然出马、邓之右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204704_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1204704", 1204704, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>嘉辰</span>既属，率土交欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204704_comment'></div>臣猥缘肺腑之亲，叨分符竹之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204704_comment'></div>前瞻观阙，阻奉万年之觞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204704_comment'></div>远托封章，庶比千秋之鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204704_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1204704_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204980' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204980' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204980?labeling=true' target='_blank'>坤成节功德文疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204980")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204980_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204980'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204980'>宝历开祥，爰属补天之运；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204980_comment'></div>金行御气，适当梦帝之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204980_comment'></div>躬诣精庐，妙修胜会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204980_comment'></div>致上方香积之饭，阅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1204980", 1204980, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>西土</span>贝多之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204980_comment'></div>庶凭调御之缘，少效华封之祝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204980_comment'></div>太皇太后：伏愿睿图巩固，宸算增隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204980_comment'></div>日月无私，永照临于下土；<div class='inline' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204975?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代蔡州正赐库功德疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204975")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204975_comment'></div><div class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204975", 1204975, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>祝延</span>之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204975_comment'></div>爰修胜会，用达愚衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204975_comment'></div>初入宝楼，不假善财之弹指；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204975_comment'></div>遍行香饭，何烦金粟之遗人。<div class='inline'
