class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204965' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204965?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代蔡州谢晴文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年春夏间）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204965")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204965_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204965'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204965'>谨以清酌庶羞之奠，敢昭告于某神：间者，久阴不解，大雪荐作，寒气总至，民不聊生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204965_comment'></div>于是率僚属吏士，奔走分告，乞晴于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204965_comment'></div>神享其诚，答以景贶，闭阴启阳，变惨为舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204965_comment'></div>清风既发，大明遂升，一方熙然，仅有生意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204965_comment'></div>吏实不德，何以克堪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204965_comment'></div>敢凭酒殽，以谢神贶。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1204965_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204891' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204891' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204891?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汝水涨溢说</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年春夏间）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204891")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204891_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204891'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204891'>汝南风物甚美，但入夏以来，水潦为患，异时道路化为陂波，汝水涨溢，城堞危险，湿气重蒸，殆与吴越间不异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204891_comment'></div>郡人岁岁如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204891_comment'></div>《汉书》称：汝南有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1204891", 1204891, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>鸿隙陂</span>，翟方进为相，始奏罢之，郡人怨甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204891_comment'></div>窃意<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1204891", 1204891, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>鸿隙陂</span>者，非特为灌溉之利，菱芡蒲鱼之饶，实一郡潴水处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204891_comment'></div>大陂既废，水无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1204891", 1204891, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>归宿</span>，则自然散漫为害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204891_comment'></div>又《水经》称：汝水至汝南郡西北，枝左，别出一枝，又屈而东转，南会汝，形如垂瓠，故号悬瓠城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204891_comment'></div>今汝水故道已亡，惟存别枝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204891_comment'></div>水潦暴降，则有泛溢之患，亦其势然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204891_comment'></div>在汉时为豫州刺史治之，诸邑皆春秋时沈、江、道、柏之国，事迹甚多，暇为作记，无文字检耳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1204891_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1204891'><span class='label'>按：</span>《淮海集》卷二五。又见康熙《上蔡县志》卷一五，《古今图书集成》庶徵典卷一三一、职方典卷四七六、山川典卷二五四。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1204891_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_199385' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199385' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199385?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵太守向公登楼眺望二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年春夏间）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199385")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199385_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199385'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199385'>茫茫<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>汝水抱城根，野色偷春入烧痕。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199385'>千点湘妃枝上泪，一声杜宇水边魂。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199385'>遥怜鸿隙陂穿路，尚想元和贼负恩。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199385'>粉堞女墙都已尽<span class='inlineComment2'>（《诗人玉屑》作朱桓都过了）</span>，恍如陶侃梦天门。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199385'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_199385'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_0_199385_0'>⑴ 《诗人玉屑》卷一八作沄沄</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_199385_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年3月14日</a>　三月十四日，韩绛卒于京师，还葬许州，秦观有代祭韩康公文。<div id='poem_1204952' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204952' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204952?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代祭韩康公文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年3月14日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204952")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204952_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204952'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204952'>呜呼，我宋受命，网罗群英，诸夏用康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204952_comment'></div>百馀年间，异人间出，左右辟王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204952_comment'></div>公以盛德，出入四朝，文武自将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204952_comment'></div>入为上宰，厥有丕绩，盟府是藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204952_comment'></div>出为长城，临制万里，奸变销亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204952_comment'></div>伯氏仲氏，迭秉国钧，荣莫与亢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204952_comment'></div>功成事毕，奉身而退，与道翱翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204952_comment'></div>岁在执徐，爰请于朝，言旋许昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204952_comment'></div>百官奉旨，祖道供张，于国之阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204952_comment'></div>礼未及行，遽即窀穸，漠然声光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204952_comment'></div>二圣震惊，法驾临奠，哀动周行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204952_comment'></div>哲人其萎，实舍于许，里门相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204952_comment'></div>迟公之归，执爵承饮，称寿公堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204952_comment'></div>承讣泫然，涕泗横集，精游出疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204952_comment'></div>许道如砥，乔木交覆，北通大梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204952_comment'></div>不见安舆，乃见丧车，人且衋伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204952_comment'></div>悲来填膺，辞不成文，聊侑一觞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1204952_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年春</a>　春，有诗寄新息王令藏春坞。作品：寄新息王令藏春坞（令尹才高寺为空）<div id='poem_199445' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199445' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199445?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄新息王令藏春坞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199445")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199445_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199445'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199445'>令尹才高寺为空，岁时行乐与民同。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199445'>旋开小坞藏春色，更制新声写土<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199445'>客向樽前忘尔汝，路穿花去失西东。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199445'>无言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_199445", 199445, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>妫女</span>今焉在，桃李相传恨未穷。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199445'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_199445'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_199445_0'>⑴ 原作士，据四库本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_199445_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年4月4日</a>　夏四月四日，宰辅、执政多有新命，吕公著拜司空、平章军国事，秦观有代贺吕司空启；吕大防自中书侍郎加太中大夫左仆射兼门下侍郎，秦观有贺门下吕仆射微仲启；范纯仁为尚书右仆射兼中书侍郎，秦观有代贺中书仆射范相公启。作品：代贺吕司空启；贺门下吕仆射微仲启；代贺中书仆射范相公启。<div id='poem_1204739' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204739' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204739?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代贺吕司空启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年4月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204739")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204739_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204739'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204739'>伏审光膺显命，正位公台，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204739_comment'></div>恭以司空相公学师古始，道造渊微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204739_comment'></div>以一代之人英，为四朝之国老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204739_comment'></div>允迪厥德，克世其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204739_comment'></div>言乎时，则韦、平岂可分道而行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204739_comment'></div>论其事，则袁、杨安得同日而语？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204739_comment'></div>年高德邵，而臣节益峻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204739_comment'></div>功成名遂，而帝眷愈隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204739_comment'></div>进拜冬官，非止居四民而时地利；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204739_comment'></div>平章国论，实惟有一德以享天心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204739_comment'></div>圣王之文章具焉，天下之能事毕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204739_comment'></div>某叨分符节，辱在陶镕，陪班谒以无缘，第承风而窃抃。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1204739_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204740' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204740' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204740?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代贺中书仆射范相公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年4月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204740")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204740_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204740'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204740'>伏审光奉明恩，进升右弼，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204740_comment'></div>恭以中书仆射相公器兼文武，学备天人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204740_comment'></div>出处系一时之安危，议论为四海之轻重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204740_comment'></div>临大节而不夺，虽小善其必为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204740_comment'></div>荀氏群龙，慈明为最；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204740_comment'></div>河东诸凤，伯褒尤奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204740_comment'></div>投闲散而闻望愈隆，涉忧患而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1204740", 1204740, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>精诚</span>益壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204740_comment'></div>果济世美，简在上心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204740_comment'></div>昔执<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1204740", 1204740, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>鸿枢</span>，既致干戈之戢；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204740_comment'></div>今居端揆，何难礼乐之兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204740_comment'></div>坦然众正之路开，行矣太平之责塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204740_comment'></div>某叨分符节<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1204740_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年4月</a>　四月壬午，孙固自观文殿学士、正议大夫兼侍读除门下侍郎，尚书左丞刘挚为中书侍郎，尚书右丞王存为尚书左丞，御史中丞胡宗愈为尚书右丞，户部侍郎赵瞻为签书枢密院事，秦观皆有贺启。作品：代贺门下孙侍郎启、代贺中书刘侍郎启、代贺王左丞启、代贺胡右丞启、代贺签书赵枢密启。<div id='poem_1204741' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204741' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204741?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代贺门下孙侍郎启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204741")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204741_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204741'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204741'>伏审光奉明恩，进升东省，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204741_comment'></div>恭以门下侍郎星躔异禀，岳镇殊钟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204741_comment'></div>先朝藩邸之旧臣，今日庙堂之耇老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204741_comment'></div>正直如《羔羊》之德，信厚有《麟趾》之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204741_comment'></div>解剧枢庭，乃心不怠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204741_comment'></div>均劳辅郡，报政斯成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204741_comment'></div>民心伫以旋归，国论倚之进断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204741_comment'></div>粤从琳馆，入践鸾台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204741_comment'></div>薄夫抚己以自惭，吉士举酒而相庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204741_comment'></div>矧同升之俊乂，皆妙选于搢绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204741_comment'></div>三王之法本人情，固无过举；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204741_comment'></div>六官之长皆民誉，兹谓昌期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204741_comment'></div>某辱在陶钧，叨分符节，第承风而窃抃，念称庆以无缘。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1204741_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204742' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204742' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204742?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代贺中书刘侍郎启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204742")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204742_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204742'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204742'>伏审光奉明恩，进升西省，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204742_comment'></div>恭以中书侍郎智周事变，道本诚明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204742_comment'></div>语默不愆其时，进退必度于礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204742_comment'></div>雪霜既降，知松柏之后凋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204742_comment'></div>鸟雀或鸣，见鹰鹯之必击。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204742_comment'></div>君未比隆于二帝，我则若挞于市朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204742_comment'></div>民有失所之一夫，我则如挤于沟壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204742_comment'></div>大任既降，英声益飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204742_comment'></div>岂止邦家之光，实为天地之纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204742_comment'></div>逮兹进拜，尤慰具瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204742_comment'></div>廉陛难跻，益致高堂之峻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204742_comment'></div>股肱克壮，重增元首之尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204742_comment'></div>某辱在陶钧<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1204742_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204743' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204743' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204743?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代贺王左丞启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204743")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204743_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204743'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204743'>伏审光奉明恩，进升左辖，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204743_comment'></div>恭以左丞太中夙钟间气，早擅英声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204743_comment'></div>学穷游、夏之渊源，文列班、扬之伯仲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204743_comment'></div>周旋不挠，出处可观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204743_comment'></div>共推天下之中庸，自得贤人之简易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204743_comment'></div>其退也，如陂万顷，挠不浊而澄不清；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204743_comment'></div>其进也，若火一燃，用弥明而宿弥壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204743_comment'></div>大任斯降，贵名益昭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204743_comment'></div>晓达吏方，戴胄旋更于二辖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204743_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1204743", 1204743, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>润饰</span>儒术，平津即至于三公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204743_comment'></div>某辱在陶钧<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1204743_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204744' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204744' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204744?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代贺胡右丞启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204744")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204744_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204744'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204744'>伏审光奉明恩，进升右辖，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204744_comment'></div>恭以右丞太中抱英杰之器，属休明之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204744_comment'></div>智无不照，而御之以宽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204744_comment'></div>学无不窥，而守之以约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204744_comment'></div>待时藏器，未尝枉尺而直寻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204744_comment'></div>肆笔成书，惟欲琢雕而复朴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204744_comment'></div>风采凛乎其可畏，议论坦然而易行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204744_comment'></div>俄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1204744", 1204744, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>凿枘</span>之相投，遽囊锥之颖出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204744_comment'></div>擢丞御史，人无间言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204744_comment'></div>进辖文昌，朝有故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204744_comment'></div>面折廷争，已闻国士之风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204744_comment'></div>内平外成，行见大儒之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204744_comment'></div>某叨分符节<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1204744_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204747' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204747' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204747?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代贺签书赵枢密启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204747")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204747_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204747'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204747'>伏审光膺睿命，进贰鸿枢，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204747_comment'></div>恭以枢密太中<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204747", 1204747, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>器猷</span>宏博，学术精微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204747_comment'></div>敏识照于未然，奇节见于已试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204747_comment'></div>犯颜逆旨，屡输汲黯之忠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204747_comment'></div>别嫌明疑，力折董宏之妄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204747_comment'></div>进退周旋而可度，艰难险阻而不渝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204747_comment'></div>俄被召以旋归，遽干霄而直上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204747_comment'></div>粤自卿曹之贰，进陪枢筦之崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204747_comment'></div>邸音播腾，士论欣快。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204747_comment'></div>亟闻赵武，越四等以将上军；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204747_comment'></div>行见千秋，以一言而取宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204747_comment'></div>某叨分符节<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1204747_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年4月</a>　四月庚子，龙图阁待制傅尧俞为吏部侍郎，秦观有贺启。作品：贺吏部傅侍郎启。<div id='poem_1204762' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204762' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204762?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺吏部傅侍郎启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204762")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204762_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204762'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204762'>光膺帝命，进贰天官<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204762_comment'></div>某官道术<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204762", 1204762, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>渊微</span>，器猷宏博，更险夷而不测其操，践中外而不易其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204762_comment'></div>汉节初归，常折董宏之妄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204762_comment'></div>楚郊卧治，尤推汲黯之忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204762_comment'></div>方传报政之成，已听除书之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204762_comment'></div>亟辞右辅，复践中台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204762_comment'></div>邦人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1204762", 1204762, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>遮辙</span>以愿留，朝士举酒而相贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204762_comment'></div>吏曹三综，既知冰鉴之无私；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204762_comment'></div>王体一谋，当见钧衡之益重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204762_comment'></div>某属驱轺传，阻造门阑。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1204762_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年4月</a>　是时又有代答范相公尧夫启及贺孙中丞启。作品：代答范相公尧夫启、贺孙中丞启。<div id='poem_1204761' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204761' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204761?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺孙中丞启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204761")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204761_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204761'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204761'>光奉<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1204761", 1204761, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>明恩</span>，进升中宪，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204761_comment'></div>恭惟中丞侍郎受天间气，为世真儒，力足以扶颠持危，器足以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204761", 1204761, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>致远任重</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204761_comment'></div>巍然如衣服之有冠冕，卓尔若鸟鱼之有凤鲲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204761_comment'></div>三朝充谏诤之官，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1204761", 1204761, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>奋身不顾</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204761_comment'></div>七郡任蕃宣之寄，为民所思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204761_comment'></div>动静不失其时，逊逆必求诸道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204761_comment'></div>比支物望，简在上心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204761_comment'></div>粤自贰卿，遂登执法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204761_comment'></div>严霜被野，既知松柏之后凋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204761_comment'></div>猛兽居山，将见藜藿之不采。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年9月</a>　九月庚戌，范子谅知蕲州，秦观有代蕲守谢上表。<div id='poem_1204712' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204712' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204712?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代蕲守谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204712")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204712_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204712'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204712'>奉法明时，方悔推行之误；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204712_comment'></div>分符近地，俄蒙假贷之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204712_comment'></div>祗荷宠恩，载深感涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204712_comment'></div>伏念臣资材闇昧，问学空疏，遭逢昌辰，叨窃剧任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204712_comment'></div>徒冀事功之立，靡思罪衅之成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204712_comment'></div>昨以出按刑章，兼程<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1204712", 1204712, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>盐课</span>，猥虞旷废，妄致勤劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204712_comment'></div>属吏承风，不无过当；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204712_comment'></div>小民竞利，岂免怨尤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204712_comment'></div>虽不待于人言，即行改正；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204712_comment'></div>傥追论其事迹，殆可诛夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204712_comment'></div>敢祈造物之恩，犹窃长人之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204712_comment'></div>矧蕲春之便郡，实淮右之名区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204712_comment'></div>风气和平，狱讼稀少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204712_comment'></div>平时来者，尚乐宽闲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204712_comment'></div>谪官居之，真为侥倖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204712_comment'></div>此盖伏遇太皇太后陛下推天地之赐，回日月之光，黜陟不失其所宜，轻重各当其所适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204712_comment'></div>察臣过举，止于四月之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204712_comment'></div>许臣自新，付以一州之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204712_comment'></div>念捐躯而莫报，徒抚己以增惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204712_comment'></div>复路回车，顾迷途其未远；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204712_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1204712", 1204712, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>输肝剖胆</span>，庶报效之可图。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1204712'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1204712_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='e5a64064ae2948c9861809a762657ad2_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e5a64064ae2948c9861809a762657ad2");'><span id='e5a64064ae2948c9861809a762657ad2_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年9月</a>　寻引疾归蔡州，有诗答曾存之。作品：次韵答曾存之（环堵萧然汝水隈）<div id='poem_199456' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199456' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199456?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答曾存之<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作张耒诗）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199456")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199456_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199456'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199456'>环堵萧然汝水隈，孤怀烱烱向谁开。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199456_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199456'>青春不觉书边过，白发无端镜上来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199456_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年9月</a>　既归蔡州，常与失意边将相从于城东古寺，酣饮悲歌，神色自若。作品：高无悔跋尾。<div id='poem_1204821' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204821' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204821?labeling=true' target='_blank'>高无悔跋尾</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204821")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204821_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204821'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204821'>无悔，将家子，为人沉鸷，有奇略，习知边事，结发与羌人战，大小数十遇，未尝败北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204821_comment'></div>斩级捕虏，获牛马橐驼，动以万计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204821_comment'></div>与其兄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1204821", 1204821, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>馆使</span>，皆为边人所推，号二高云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204821_comment'></div>元丰五年，延帅与二诏使城永乐，问于无悔，对曰：「永乐，羌人必争之地，而无险阻，无水泉，一日寇至，何以能守」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204821_comment'></div>诏使大怒，以为沮议，遣归延安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204821_comment'></div>既城永乐，羌人数十万奄至城中，戍者才三万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204821_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1204821", 1204821, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>馆使</span>谓诏使曰：「虏众十倍于我，若其尽至，不可当也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204821_comment'></div>我尝破其众于无定河川，今前队嚣甚，有惧我心，及未定，击之，虽众可走」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204821_comment'></div>诏使不许，曰：「王者之师，不鼓不成列」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204821_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1204821", 1204821, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>馆使</span>以足顿地，曰：「事去矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204821_comment'></div>已而城外围数重，诸将出战无生还者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204821_comment'></div>俄夺我水寨，城中穿井数十，皆不获泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204821_comment'></div>士卒饥渴困甚，不能执兵，城遂陷，二诏使及<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1204821", 1204821, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>馆使</span>皆死之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204821_comment'></div>于是议者皆以二高料敌有古良将之风，惜乎诏使之不能用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204821_comment'></div>元祐二年，余为汝南学官，被诏至京师，以疾归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204821_comment'></div>无悔亦以失边帅意，徙内地，钤辖此郡兵马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204821_comment'></div>相从于城东古寺，日饮无何，绝口不挂时事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204821_comment'></div>余酒酣，悲歌声震林木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204821_comment'></div>无悔瞋目熟视，发上冲冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204821_comment'></div>人多怪之，余二人者自若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204821_comment'></div>无悔一日出诸公所与尺牍，自韩魏公以下百馀番，属余跋尾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204821_comment'></div>余欣然濡笔，因以永乐之事载之，庶几见诸公所以称道无悔者，非虚语也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1204821_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年10月</a>　冬十月，作永寿县君挽词。作品：永寿县君挽词二词。<div id='poem_199368' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199368' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_199368_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199368'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199368'>廷尉蒙恩后，兰台就养初。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199368_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199368'>大椿宜更寿，流水遽焉如。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199368_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_199368", 199368, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>幽墟</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199368_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199368'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199368_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199367' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199367' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199367?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年10月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199367_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199367'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199367'>明世辞隆养，哀荣道路传。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199367_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199367'>赙丧从上宰，歌挽出群仙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199367_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199367'>素幔伤秋泛，青缸惨夜船。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199367_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199367'>玉峰归葬处，木拱雁连天。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199367_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199367'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199367_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年冬</a>　冬，裴仲谟通判蔡州，秦观相与唱和，有次韵答裴仲谟、和裴仲谟放兔行、和裴仲谟摘白须行诸诗。作品：次韵答裴仲谟（十年淮海闲居草）和裴仲谟放兔行（兔饥食山林）和裴仲谟摘白须行（仲将题凌云）<div id='poem_199399' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199399' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199399?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵答裴仲谟</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199399")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199399_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199399'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199399'>十年淮海閒居草，偶遣儿童次第成。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199399_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199399'>方愧贫家矜敝帚，忽蒙邻壁借馀明。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199399_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199399'>文昌但愿花前老，张翰何须身后名。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199399_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199399'>移病阖门参拜阻，卧听车马去来声。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199399_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199399'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199399_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199572' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199572' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199572?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和裴仲谟放兔行</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199572")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199572_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199572'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199572'>兔饥食山林，兔渴饮川泽。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199572_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199572'>与人不瑕玼，焉用苦求索。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199572_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199572'>天寒草枯死，见窘何太迫。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199572_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199572'>上有苍鹰祸，下有黄犬厄。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199572_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199572'>一死无足悲，所耻败头额。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199572_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199572'>敢期挥金遇，倒橐无难色。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199572_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199572'>虽乖猎者意，颇塞仁人责。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199572_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199572'>兔兮兔兮听我言，月中仙子最汝怜。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199572_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199572'>不如亟返月中宿，休顾商岩并岳麓。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199572_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199572'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_199572_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199573' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199573' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199573?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_0_199573'>仲将题凌云，比讫须尽白。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199573_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199573'>陆展媚侧室，星星染为黑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199573_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199573'>人生如寄耳，况复形与色。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199573_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199573'>泽壑藏山舟，夜半输有力。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199573_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199573'>厖眉三不遇，已矣何所惜。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199573_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199573'>二毛赋秋兴，自爱颇姑息。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199573_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199573'>闻诸古竺乾，毛发因地得。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199573_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199573'>数穷反其本，蝼蚁得而食。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199573_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199573'>妙年光可鉴，烱若鸦羽戢。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199573_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199573'>映梳渐萧肃，变化了无隙。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199573_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199573'>所以梵志云，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_199573", 199573, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>昔人</span>已非昔。<div id='poem_sentence_10_199573_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_199573'>皤然君勿笑，子羽以貌失。<div id='poem_sentence_11_199573_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_199573'>信美如客儿，终剪施摩诘。<div id='poem_sentence_12_199573_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_199573'>我作白须行，而得养生术<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《淮海集》卷五）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_13_199573_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_199573'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_199573_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年冬</a>　冬，裴秀才慕秦观名，自阳翟来蔡州，相从踰月，秦观有次韵裴秀才上太守向公二首，并为所藏麻温故诗跋尾。作品：次韵裴秀才上太守向公二首（东风已动北风归）裴秀才跋尾。<div id='poem_199406' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199406' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199406?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵裴秀才上太守向公二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199406")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199406_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199406'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199406'>东风已动北风归，寒气侵寻自霁威。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199406_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199406'>何处管弦传腊酒，谁家刀尺制春衣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199406_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199406'>使君英妙开莲幕，别驾风流出粉闱。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199406_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199406'>唯有广文官独冷，终年如坐水边矶。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199406_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199406'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199406_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199405' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199405' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199405?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年冬）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_199405_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199405'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199405'>上客新从颍尾归，使君高会列南威。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199405'>风将沉燎萦歌扇，雪带梅香上舞衣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199405'>翻样云团分御帑，如椽蜜炬出宫闱。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199405'>食前方丈罗珍怪，却讶犀燃牛渚矶。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199405'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199405_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204822' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204822' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204822?labeling=true' target='_blank'>裴秀才跋尾</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年冬）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204822")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204822_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204822'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204822'>裴本秦之别姓，自汉以来，世有显者，在唐尤为望族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204822_comment'></div>五房之裴为宰相者十有七人，裴氏衣冠，于斯为盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204822_comment'></div>而东眷房晋公度，实唐第一等人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204822_comment'></div>君晋公之裔孙也，少笃学，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1204822", 1204822, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>锋气</span>锐甚，颇有志于天下之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204822_comment'></div>已而举进士，屡不中，乃叹曰：「人生如寄耳，安用是区区者为哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204822_comment'></div>于是退居许之阳翟，葛巾藜杖，日阅佛书，惟以专精神、养寿命为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204822_comment'></div>元祐三年冬，君之弟朝散君通判蔡州，君自阳翟篮舆过之，踰月而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204822_comment'></div>将行，谓朝散君曰：「吾绝意世间事久矣，比阅簏中故人书札，见麻温故郎中昔所赠诗，怃然感心，不能自已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204822_comment'></div>闻秦少游方为此郡学官，愿因弟丐一言，庶几异时有知我者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204822_comment'></div>余闻而叹之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204822_comment'></div>昔马援南征，谓官属曰：「吾从弟少游，常哀吾慷慨多大志，曰：『士生一世，但取衣食裁足，乘下泽车，驭款段马，为郡掾吏，守坟墓，乡里称善人，斯可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204822_comment'></div>致求赢馀，但自苦耳』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204822_comment'></div>当吾在浪泊、西里，虏未灭之时，下潦上雾，毒气薰蒸，仰视飞鸢跕跕堕水中，卧念少游平生时语，何可得也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204822_comment'></div>朝散君起家四十为郎，声闻籍甚，所谓功名富贵，盖未易量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204822_comment'></div>而君羸老疾病，卧于衡茅之下，气息奄奄仅属，既不求人知，人亦莫君知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204822_comment'></div>弟兄出处异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204822_comment'></div>然以二马观之，二裴之事孰为得失哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204822_comment'></div>麻君博雅君子，其所以称道君者，宜不谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204822_comment'></div>后之君子读其诗者，可以知君少时之志，而读余文者，可以识君暮年之心云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1204822_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1088&endYear=1088')">1088年</a>　是岁，为建隆昭庆禅师作真赞。作品：建隆庆和尚真赞。<div id='poem_1204931' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204931' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204931?labeling=true' target='_blank'>建隆庆和尚真赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204931")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204931_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204931'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204931'>大因缘，十八年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204931_comment'></div>结跏座，带刀眠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204931_comment'></div>汝鼻孔，未辽天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204931_comment'></div>呼我作，无事禅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204931_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1204931_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年1月</a>　春正月，秦观有代回胡右丞年节启致胡宗愈。<div id='poem_1204753' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204753' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204753?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代回胡右丞年节启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204753")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204753_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204753'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204753'>天端肇正，人统全生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204753_comment'></div>实万类引达之期，乃四序调和之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204753_comment'></div>恭以某官受时间气，为国宝臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204753_comment'></div>天资英发，而持之以谦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204753_comment'></div>地胄高华，而守之以约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204753_comment'></div>履兹献岁，茂拥休祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204753_comment'></div>治誉蔼闻，已备赐环之宠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204753_comment'></div>恩灵下逮，行膺锡马之蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204753_comment'></div>颂愿之私，敷宣罔既。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204753_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1204753_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年3月</a>　三月己卯，胡宗愈自尚书右丞出知陈州，秦观有代贺胡右丞知陈州启。<div id='poem_1204750' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204750' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204750?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代贺胡右丞知陈州启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204750")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204750_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204750'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204750'>均逸中台，承流右辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204750_comment'></div>地接日畿之重，职兼禁殿之华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204750_comment'></div>凡在庇庥，所同欣抃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204750_comment'></div>恭以某人智周事变，道本神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204750_comment'></div>学穷游、夏之渊源，文列傅、班之伯仲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204750_comment'></div>霜雪既至，知松柏之后彫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204750_comment'></div>鸟雀或鸣，见鹰鹯之必击。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204750_comment'></div>既丞御史，遂辖文昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204750_comment'></div>语默惟时，独任天下之事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204750_comment'></div>卷舒以道，有古大臣之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204750_comment'></div>邸音播腾，士类耸叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204750_comment'></div>矧是淮阳之郡，实惟太昊之墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204750_comment'></div>风气和平，狱讼稀少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204750_comment'></div>屈英游而卧治，徯惠政之立成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204750_comment'></div>腾实飞声，已应半千之用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204750_comment'></div>赞元经体，伫归尺五之天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204750_comment'></div>某夙以单微，尝蒙题品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204750_comment'></div>念使旌之在望，嗟吏役之攸拘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204750_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1204750_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年3月</a>　三月，有次韵裴仲谟和何先辈诗二首。<div id='poem_199404' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199404' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_199404_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199404'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199404'>闻说何郎操行端，萧然环堵若为安。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199404'>鸟啼花发阻携手，水远山高空凭栏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199404'>别后想多黄绢作，春来尤厌惠文弹。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199404'>两章读罢知高义，贵贱交情自古难。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年3月</a>　春，蔡子骧赴越州筦库，秦观作诗送之。又有次韵蔡子骏琼花诗。作品：次蔡子骧用蔡子骏韵（越绝山川远相属）次韵蔡子骏琼花（无双亭上传觞处）<div id='poem_199616' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199616' id='poem_sentence_2_199278_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年3月</a>　春，秦观在蔡州程文通席上作牵牛花诗。作品：牵牛花（银汉初移漏欲残）<div id='poem_199676' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199676' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199676?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠女冠畅师</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年3月）</span><span
