id='poem_sentence_4_199676'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_199676_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年4月</a>　夏四月，苏轼出守杭州，秦观弟觏从之为学。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年6月</a>　六月，因去岁水灾，饥民为盗，郡守向宗回镇压有功，至此时朝廷嘉奖，少游代作文、表、记三种。作品：敕书奖谕记、代谢敕书奖谕表、代获贼祭诸庙文。<div id='poem_1204908' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204908' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204908?labeling=true' target='_blank'>敕书奖谕记<span class='inlineComment2'>（代）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204908")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204908_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204908'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204908'>元祐二年夏五月，诏以臣某知蔡州军州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204908_comment'></div>三年春，盗发陈、蔡、颍之间，甲而兵者四十馀人，皆剽悍善斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204908_comment'></div>其渠魁颇能拊众，得其死力，每到大姓之家，独取金币，斥其钱粟以予小民，小民德之，乐为囊橐，通行馈食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204908_comment'></div>捕盗官以故稀复遇，间遇之，又辄为所败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204908_comment'></div>俄转入淮南界，光寿都巡检使与战不胜，其子死之，夺仙居，县尉朱记，吏卒死伤甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204908_comment'></div>既而引还，陈、蔡、颍之间复扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204908_comment'></div>于是有旨合京西南北部使者督捕，移将官于京东，募弓箭手、骑兵于渭州，增立赏格，得其渠魁者官三班借职，钱六十万，馀党一人钱四十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204908_comment'></div>是时诸捕盗官相望者十馀屯，无昼夜不解甲，而贼众诡秘，出没如神，终莫能得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204908_comment'></div>臣既阴布耳目，察其所在，又预募将兵，以备<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1204908", 1204908, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>掩击</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204908_comment'></div>会谍知其区处，而诸屯皆远，不可遽召，于是令权节度推官翟元衡统所募兵，夜从间道去，果遇贼于高佐之北，斩其渠魁，并其妻等六级，枭于市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204908_comment'></div>元衡又与诸捕盗官围残党于李曲，歼其众，遁免者以次皆擒，或自相屠杀，弃尸于水中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204908_comment'></div>获仙居县尉朱记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204908_comment'></div>前后斩首凡三十四级，生得者六人，获铠甲旗帜仗械二百二十有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204908_comment'></div>是时渭州弓箭手、骑兵犹未至，奏却于途，诸捕盗官各解去，而陈蔡颍之间安堵矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204908_comment'></div>四年六月，蒙恩赐敕书奖谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204908_comment'></div>臣窃惟二圣临御以来，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1204908", 1204908, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>神功圣化</span>，鼓动海内，阴阳调和，菑害绝息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204908_comment'></div>臣于此时，幸缘肺腑，备位郡守，偶因薄效，遽赐褒嘉，承命震惊，荣惧交至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204908_comment'></div>敢凭金石，具刻明诏，传示无穷，又论次其事，而并载之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204908_comment'></div>元祐四年六月二十八日臣向宗回记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1204908_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204715' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204715' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204715?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代谢敕书奖谕表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204715")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204715_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204715'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204715'>臣某言：今月日进奏院递到敕书一道，伏蒙圣恩以臣<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>，特赐奖谕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204715_comment'></div>捕剪凶徒，盖守臣之常职；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204715_comment'></div>降颁温诏，实圣世之异恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204715_comment'></div>祗服宠灵，重增愧惧<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204715_comment'></div>伏念臣禀材绵薄，受性颛愚，因缘肺腑之亲，昧冒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1204715", 1204715, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>藩宣</span>之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204715_comment'></div>浩穰十邑，每怀旷败之虞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204715_comment'></div>僶俛再期，敢起觊觎之望？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204715_comment'></div>忆昨凶年乏食，狂盗干诛，初鼠窃于村墟，俄鸱张于道路，杀伤吏卒，攘夺印章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204715_comment'></div>居民以此震惊，列郡为之骚动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204715_comment'></div>至烦庙论，申命使车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204715_comment'></div>辍悍将于山东，募骁兵于陇右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204715_comment'></div>尚且游魂疆埸，假息朝昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204715_comment'></div>臣志欲扫除，日思方略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204715_comment'></div>忽知囊橐之处，近在股掌之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204715_comment'></div>窃以为稽讨荡则荏苒而蜂屯，待会合则张皇而鸟散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204715_comment'></div>遂令募吏，潜引将兵，从间道以兼行，指孤巢而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1204715", 1204715, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>突击</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204715_comment'></div>渠魁格斗，既就歼夷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204715_comment'></div>馀党散亡，寻皆殄灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204715_comment'></div>臣既不能如子贱任德，使民不忍欺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204715_comment'></div>又不能如龚遂却兵，致盗亦皆罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204715_comment'></div>仰惭睿化，方虞黜责之严；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204715_comment'></div>岂谓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1204715", 1204715, "Clauses/52/Comments/0")'>宸音</span>，遽有旌嘉之宠？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204715_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下至仁天覆，盛德海涵，欲庶职之咸修，虽微劳其必录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204715_comment'></div>是致铅刀之割，亦膺衮字之褒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204715_comment'></div>臣敢不效萤爝之光，竭犬马之力？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204715_comment'></div>誓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1204715", 1204715, "Clauses/62/Comments/0")'>麋捐</span>于躯命，期补报于恩私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204715_comment'></div>臣无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1204715_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1204967' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204967' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204967?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代获贼祭诸庙文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204967")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204967_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204967'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204967'>谨以清酌庶羞之奠，告于某神之灵：乃者群盗窃发，剽劫闾里，游魂疆埸，境内骚然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204967_comment'></div>赖神威灵，咸伏其辜，鲸鲵既歼，民以休靖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204967_comment'></div>敢用牲酒，以答神休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204967_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1204967_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年6月</a>　觏觌二弟作小室，黄庭坚名之曰寄寂，并有诗相谑。秦观亦用孙子实韵作诗寄之，借抒不合时宜之感。作品：觌觏二弟作小室请书鲁直名曰寄寂作此寄之用孙子实韵（力田不逢年）<div id='poem_199662' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199662' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199662?labeling=true' target='_blank'>觌觏二弟作小室请书鲁直名曰寄寂作此寄之用孙子实韵<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199662")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199662_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_199662_0'>① 韵下原有二首二字，诗实为一首，据四库本删</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199662'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199662'>力田不逢年，识者未宜闵。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199662_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199662'>他时岁在金，百两无虚稛。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199662_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199662'>士生当自量，天道平如准。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199662_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199662'>汝兄鲁叔山，正坐不前谨。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199662_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199662'>有琴亦无弦，何心尚求轸。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199662_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199662'>客来欲颓玉，大白辄满引。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199662_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199662'>官长既屡骂，诸生亦时冁。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199662_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199662'>一口吸西江，玄哉居士蕴。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199662_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199662'>岁寒知苍松，日暮识丹槿。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199662_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199662'>梦想八九椽，森然罗玉笋。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199662_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199662'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_199662_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年9月</a>　六月甲辰，尚书左丞王存知蔡州，九月辛巳秦观为作谢加勋封表。作品：代谢加勋封表。<div id='poem_1204716' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204716' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204716?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代谢加勋封表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204716")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204716_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204716'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204716'>宗祀以配上帝，盛礼载陈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204716_comment'></div>大封而锡善人，彝章具举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204716_comment'></div>宠灵误逮，愧惧交深<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204716_comment'></div>伏念臣学术本迂，器能素拙，徒属休明之运，获参英俊之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204716_comment'></div>发金匮石室之藏，讨论何补；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204716_comment'></div>承神州赤县之乏，瘝旷偶逃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204716_comment'></div>晚自喉舌之司，亟更管辖之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204716_comment'></div>辱甄收之已过，知报称之尤难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204716_comment'></div>比出近藩，犹通秘籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204716_comment'></div>会考《我将》之颂，颇稽公玉之图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204716_comment'></div>路寝爰开，总章斯寓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204716_comment'></div>涓季秋而精享，肃群后以骏奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204716_comment'></div>熙事备成，既尽情文之典；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204716_comment'></div>湛恩汪濊，遂周中外之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204716_comment'></div>曾是孤踪，亦膺殊祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204716_comment'></div>崇勋遽进，真食骤增。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204716_comment'></div>奉纶綍以凌竞，仰云天而陨越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204716_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下天仁丕冒，海德包涵，尚记蠢愚，尝陪于国论；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204716_comment'></div>更怜衰晚，方守于郡章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204716_comment'></div>俾异数之并加，示纯禧之均畀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204716_comment'></div>甘泉缅邈，难望属车之尘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204716_comment'></div>清都<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1204716", 1204716, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>邃严</span>，徒梦钧天之奏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1204716_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年9月</a>　八月，欧阳修夫人薛氏卒于颍州，秦观代郡守王存作祭欧阳夫人文。作品：代祭欧阳夫人文。<div id='poem_1204951' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204951' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204951?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代祭欧夫人文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204951")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204951_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204951'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204951'>吁嗟夫人，出于华宗，来嫔高门，实配文忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204951_comment'></div>惟我文忠，一世之师，道德馀事，发为文辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204951_comment'></div>如天有斗，如岁有春，四方以正，万物为新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204951_comment'></div>吁嗟夫人，其德惟称，内宗外姻，俱承厥庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204951_comment'></div>文忠前薨，朝野涕澜，今夫人逝，士亦永叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204951_comment'></div>矧在敝族，晚通姻好，承凶矍然，举室惊悼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204951_comment'></div>新郑之原，文忠之茔，归合有期，千车送行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204951_comment'></div>守土汝南，征驾莫遑，敬致薄辞，以奠一觞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1204951_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年10月</a>　冬十月，张景先权京西路转运判官，秦观有代贺京西运判启。<div id='poem_1204745' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204745' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204745?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代贺京西运判启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204745")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204745_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204745'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204745'>伏审光奉睿恩，荣分漕计，恭惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204745_comment'></div>恭以运判道师古始，识造渊微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204745_comment'></div>身兼数器，而用之以时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204745_comment'></div>学备诸家，而守之以约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204745_comment'></div>讨论不乏，尝编简以成图；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204745_comment'></div>俯仰无心，任摘山之变法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204745_comment'></div>屡奏三年之最，亟更一道之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204745_comment'></div>举属吏以倾心，伫前旌之入境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204745_comment'></div>矧是右辅，实惟奥区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204745_comment'></div>南则控引于荆、扬，西则转输于秦、雍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204745_comment'></div>奉严陵寝，备缮河防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204745_comment'></div>于措置以为难，在选抡而尤重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204745_comment'></div>登车揽辔，初承使者之风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204745_comment'></div>结绶怀金，行被从官之召。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1204745_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年11月</a>　十一月，彭次云徙京西路转运使，秦观有代贺运使启。<div id='poem_1204756' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204756' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204756?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代贺运使启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204756")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204756_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204756'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204756'>伏审光奉制函，荣分漕计，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204756_comment'></div>恭以运使郎中器猷宏敏，道术精微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204756_comment'></div>资之以问学之优，侈之以闻见之博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204756_comment'></div>持纲宪府，风声岂畏于悍彊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204756_comment'></div>赞治天官，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1204756", 1204756, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>冰鉴</span>无私于微眇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204756_comment'></div>惟兹右辅，寔号奥区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204756_comment'></div>禄廪兵食之资，异时或屈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204756_comment'></div>陵寝河防之费，他路所无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204756_comment'></div>肆辍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1204756", 1204756, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>名郎</span>，出为肤使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204756_comment'></div>符檄未加于一道，威名已肃于列城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204756_comment'></div>外斡邦财，颇郁缙绅之论；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204756_comment'></div>进谋王体，谅非岁月之淹。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1204756_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年</a>　是岁，秦观有代荐蔡奉议状。<div id='poem_1204730' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204730' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204730?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代荐蔡奉议奏状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204730")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204730_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204730'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204730'>窃以管下居住具位蔡驷，少以文翰见推流辈，仕宦所至，皆有能声，安贫守道，恬于进取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204730_comment'></div>有士如此，岂敢不言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204730_comment'></div>伏望圣明特赐考察，擢充台省清要任使。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1204730_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年</a>　是岁，为高邮县知事陆佖之夫人虞氏作墓志铭。作品：虞氏夫人墓志铭。<div id='poem_1204947' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204947' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204947?labeling=true' target='_blank'>虞氏夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204947")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204947_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204947'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204947'>夫人姓虞氏，讳丽华，越州山阴人，助教昱之季女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204947_comment'></div>年十九归同郡陆氏，为承议郎、知高邮县事佖之夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204947_comment'></div>踰八年而卒，卒后十年，葬于山阴县野人原其舅朝议公所生母袁夫人之兆，实熙宁三年五月某日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204947_comment'></div>元丰六年，天子有事于南郊，夫人以承议君升朝恩，封仙源县君云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204947_comment'></div>承议君尝谓予曰：「虞虽越之著姓，世以财雄，亡妻婉嫕恭俭，如出寒素之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204947_comment'></div>仰事舅姑，旁接内外之宗姻，下抚僮使之众，殆无一人失其意者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204947_comment'></div>不幸短折以死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204947_comment'></div>生一女，嫁进士史安术，比已死矣，余深悲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204947_comment'></div>幸蒙明恩追锡封邑，而葬时迫，其幽堂之铭实尚未刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204947_comment'></div>子与予故人也，愿为论次其事，将穿其墓前而纳之，以致予意焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204947_comment'></div>是时予将赴汝阳，治装薄遽，虽许其作而未暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204947_comment'></div>而君每见余，辄以仙源之铭为嘱，至于八九而不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204947_comment'></div>呜呼，夫妇俗薄久矣，仙源之殁几三十年，而君<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1204947", 1204947, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>寻绎</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1204947", 1204947, "Clauses/44/Comments/1")'>悼念</span>，眷眷不忘如初，非风义之厚，出于天性，何以至此耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204947_comment'></div>乃为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1204947'>惟夫人，胄东阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204947_comment'></div>嫔德门，家有光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204947_comment'></div>命虽绝，庆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1204947", 1204947, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>未央</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204947_comment'></div>刻斯文，志幽荒。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1204947_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年</a>　是岁，秦观遇王叔瞻于蔡州，有书王氏斋壁。<div id='poem_1204911' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204911' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204911?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书王氏斋壁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204911")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204911_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204911'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204911'>皇祐元年，余先大父赴官南康，道出九江，余实生焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204911_comment'></div>满岁受代，犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204911", 1204911, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>寓止</span>僧舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204911_comment'></div>未几代者卒，叔瞻之先君来领其职事，通家相好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204911_comment'></div>至和元年，叔瞻始生于南康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204911_comment'></div>后予迎老母来为汝南学官也，而叔瞻亦奉太夫人閒居于郡之西郭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204911_comment'></div>时余之先大父母、先人，皆捐馆，而叔瞻之先君亦没于泸州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204911_comment'></div>皇祐逮今四十一年，中间丰瘁、得丧、死生、休戚不可悉记，独两家之孤各奉其母相遭于此，甚可悲也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1204911_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年</a>　是岁，有祭监税主簿文。<div id='poem_1204953' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204953' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204953?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭监税主簿文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204953")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204953_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204953'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204953'>维年月日，具衔、姓名，谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于殁故监税主簿之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204953_comment'></div>呜呼，贤才懿德，宜显周行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204953_comment'></div>以君德厚，宜享寿康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204953_comment'></div>仕既未达，人其云亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204953_comment'></div>顾天理之莫究，兹僚友之永伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204953_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204953_comment'></div>西风萧飒，长夜凄凉，灵车<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1204953", 1204953, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>戒道</span>，丹旐飞扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204953_comment'></div>有殽在俎，有酒盈觞，临岐伸奠，归安故乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204953_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1204953_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年</a>　是岁，京西提刑王瑜落权发运字为两浙提刑，秦观有代贺提刑落权发运字启。<div id='poem_1204757' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204757' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204757?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代贺提刑落权发遣字启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204757")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204757_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204757'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204757'>荣膺睿旨，宠进华资，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204757_comment'></div>恭以提刑风猷妙敏，襟韵疏明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204757_comment'></div>智无不烛，而待之以宽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204757_comment'></div>谋无不周，而断之以必。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204757_comment'></div>杰出名臣之后，蔼居肤使之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204757_comment'></div>持节陕关，仓廪于焉充实；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204757_comment'></div>按刑淮海，囹圄为之虚空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204757_comment'></div>属右辅之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1204757", 1204757, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>浩繁</span>，屈高材而刺举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204757_comment'></div>既被赐环之宠，仍蒙增秩之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204757_comment'></div>诏音播腾，士论欣快。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204757_comment'></div>嵩山汝水，既久滞于星轺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204757_comment'></div>金马玉堂，伫归联于法从。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1204757_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年1月</a>　春正月，丁卯朔，哲宗御大庆殿视朝，秦观有代贺元会表。作品：代贺元会表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（按，徐培均先生《秦少游年谱长编》元祐五年至元祐八年均错一年，分别纪为1089、1090、1091、1092。）</span><div id='poem_1204717' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204717' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204717?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代贺元会表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204717")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204717_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204717'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204717'>十三月为正，前既稽于夏道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204717_comment'></div>二千石上寿，仍参用于汉仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204717_comment'></div>盛旦载逢，彝章具举<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204717_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下财成天地，参并神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204717_comment'></div>命羲和之二官，谨《春秋》之五始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204717_comment'></div>调和元气，抚御中区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204717_comment'></div>肆属春王之朝，肇修元会之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204717_comment'></div>鸡人呼旦，庭燎有光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204717_comment'></div>外则虎贲羽林严宿卫之列，内则谒者御史肃班行之容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204717_comment'></div>漏未尽而车辂陈，跸既鸣而鼓钟作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204717_comment'></div>应龙高举，云气毕从；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204717_comment'></div>北极上临，星宿咸拱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204717_comment'></div>受四海之图籍，拜万国之衣冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204717_comment'></div>岁月日时，于焉先正；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204717_comment'></div>声明文物，粲尔可观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204717_comment'></div>迈康王酆宫之朝，掩高帝长乐之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204717_comment'></div>蔼颂声而并作，郁协气以横流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204717_comment'></div>臣比远天光，遽更年籥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204717_comment'></div>职拘藩国，莫瞻龙衮之升；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204717_comment'></div>心折宸居，但想<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1204717", 1204717, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>兽樽</span>之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204717_comment'></div>瞻望阙庭<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>，</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1204717_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年1月14日</a>　正月十四日，弟少章自杭别苏轼而归，轼作太息一篇以送之，称秦观与张文潜为士之超逸绝尘者。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年2月2日</a>　二月二日，李常卒于陕府阌乡县传舍，秦观为之作李公择行状。<div id='poem_1204941' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204941' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204941?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故龙图阁直学士中大夫知成都军府事管内劝农使充成都府利州路兵马钤辖上护军陇西郡开国侯食邑一千一百户食实封三百户赐紫金鱼袋李公行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年2月2日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204941")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204941_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204941'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204941'>曾祖讳宗谊，故不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204941_comment'></div>祖讳知至，故不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204941_comment'></div>父讳东，故任江宁府溧水县尉，累赠特进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204941_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1204941'>南康军建昌县李常字公择，年六十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204941_comment'></div>李氏宗出唐宗室郇公讳远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204941_comment'></div>祖涛，五代时号称名臣，仕皇朝为兵部尚书，封莒国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204941_comment'></div>莒公少时仕于湖南马氏，有一子留江南，公其裔孙也，故今为南康建昌人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204941_comment'></div>公少警悟，好学彊记，为文章捷敏，初若不经意，而比成粲然，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1204941", 1204941, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>属寓</span>深远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204941_comment'></div>皇祐中登进士甲科，授防御推官，权江州军事判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204941_comment'></div>丁昌源郡太夫人忧，解官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204941_comment'></div>又丁光禄公忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204941_comment'></div>服阕，权宣州观察推官，监涟水军转般仓，改大理寺丞、知洪州奉新县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204941_comment'></div>未行，用韩公献肃荐，为三司检法官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204941_comment'></div>神宗即位，诏大臣举馆职，曾宣公以公应诏，召试学士院，除秘阁校理、编校史馆书籍，兼太常博士，兼史馆检讨，置三司条例司检详官，看详中书条例，权判尚书考工，改右正言，同管勾国子监公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204941_comment'></div>是时王荆公辅政，始作新法，谏官御史论不合者辄斥去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204941_comment'></div>公上疏力诋其非，以为始建三司条例司，虽致天下之议，而善士犹或与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204941_comment'></div>至于均输之论兴，青苗之法立，公然取息，傅会经旨，以为无嫌，则天下固已大骇，而善士亦不复与矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204941_comment'></div>时荆公之子雱与温陵吕惠卿皆与闻国论，凡朝廷之事，三人者参然后得行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204941_comment'></div>公言：「陛下与大臣议某事，安石不可，则移而不行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204941_comment'></div>安石造膝议某事，安石承诏颁焉，吕惠卿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1204941", 1204941, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>献疑</span>则反之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204941_comment'></div>诏用某人，安石、惠卿之所可，雱不说，则又罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204941_comment'></div>孔子曰：禄去公室，政在大夫，陪臣执国命，今皆不似之耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204941_comment'></div>而其论青苗尤为激切，至十馀上不已，于是落职通判滑州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204941_comment'></div>岁馀复职知鄂州，徙知湖州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204941_comment'></div>迁尚书祠部员外郎，赐五品服，徙知齐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204941_comment'></div>齐故多盗，公至痛惩艾之，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1204941", 1204941, "Clauses/92/Comments/0")'>论报</span>无虚日，盗犹不止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204941_comment'></div>他日得黠盗，察其可用，刺为兵，使直事钤下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204941_comment'></div>间问以盗发辄得而不衰止之故，曰：「此繇富家为之囊，使盗自相推为甲乙，官吏巡捕及门，擒一人，以首则免矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204941_comment'></div>公曰：「吾得之矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204941_comment'></div>乃令得藏盗之家，皆发屋破柱，盗贼遂清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204941_comment'></div>始，公在武昌、吴兴，政尚宽简，日与宾客纵酒笑咏，吏民安乐之，郡以大治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204941_comment'></div>于是世知公之才，所值无不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204941_comment'></div>属决河灌山东诸郡，公捍御有术，部使者以闻，降诏书奖谕，徙淮南西路提点刑狱，迁尚书度支员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204941_comment'></div>坐厚善直史馆苏公轼，得其诗文不以告，罚金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1204941_comment'></div>寄禄格行，换朝散郎，迁朝请郎、试太常少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1204941_comment'></div>公去国十五年，至是还朝，士大夫喜见于色，以谓正人复用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1204941_comment'></div>以职事对，称旨，面赐三品服，未几试礼部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1204941_comment'></div>文昌府成，车驾临幸，恩迁朝奉大夫，再迁朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1204941_comment'></div>上即位，覃恩迁朝请大夫，试吏部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1204941_comment'></div>迁朝议大夫，俄试户部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1204941_comment'></div>诏百官转对，公以七事应诏：一曰崇廉耻，二曰存贡举，三曰别守宰，四曰去赃贪，五曰慎疑狱，六曰择师儒，七曰修役法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1204941_comment'></div>皆当时急务，而其言役法尤合公论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1204941_comment'></div>又取差免二法，折衷为书上之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1204941_comment'></div>以为法无新陈，便民者良法也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1204941_comment'></div>论无彼己，可久者确论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1204941_comment'></div>又曰：「贫富俱出赀，则贫者之所难堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1204941_comment'></div>使富者出赀，贫者出力，庶乎其可也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1204941_comment'></div>大略如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1204941_comment'></div>迁中大夫，除御史中丞兼侍读，加龙图阁直学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1204941_comment'></div>初，元丰河决小吴，神宗以河势方趋西北，难以力回，诏勿复塞，须其自定，增立堤防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1204941_comment'></div>而或者以谓非悠远之策，请开澶渊游河，分杀水势，又欲自苏村口截为堤，导还故处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1204941_comment'></div>诏遣公视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1204941_comment'></div>还，奏非便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1204941_comment'></div>又遣吏部侍郎范公百禄、给事中赵公君锡覆视，奏与公合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1204941_comment'></div>而或者犹执前议，锐于兴役，朝廷疑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1204941_comment'></div>至是公申论其弊，章六七上，而其役竟罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1204941_comment'></div>又请分诗赋、经义两科，以尽取士之法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1204941_comment'></div>别自致、因人为两涂，以究省官之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1204941_comment'></div>其忠言谠论，盖不可以一二举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1204941_comment'></div>至于因时乘间，导迎和气者，多密以启闻，故莫得而知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1204941_comment'></div>俄守兵部尚书，固辞不受，恳求外补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1204941_comment'></div>章屡上，遂出知邓州，数月，徙成都府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1204941_comment'></div>行及陕府阌乡县，暴卒于传舍，实元祐五年二月二日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1204941_comment'></div>累勋至上护军、陇西郡侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1204941_comment'></div>公风度凝远，与人有恩意，而遇事彊毅，不为苟合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1204941_comment'></div>初善王荆公，荆公当国，冀其为助，而诋之乃力于他人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1204941_comment'></div>荆公尝遣雱喻意曰：「所争者国事，少存朋友之义」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1204941_comment'></div>公曰：「大义灭亲，况朋友乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1204941_comment'></div>自存益确，士论以此归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1204941_comment'></div>少时读书于庐山五老峰下白石庵之僧舍，后身虽出仕宦，而书藏于山中如故，每得异书辄益之，至九千馀卷，山中之人号李氏山房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1204941_comment'></div>仲兄布蚤卒，事其嫂张敬甚，抚其子秉彝如己子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1204941_comment'></div>自奉清约，所俸入多少，以赒亲族，捐馆之日，无赢赀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1204941_comment'></div>朝廷闻之，常赙外特赐五十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1204941_comment'></div>有文集若干卷藏于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1204941_comment'></div>初娶狄氏，襄阳遵度主簿之女，蚤卒，赠某县封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1204941_comment'></div>遵度亦俊杰士，宝元、庆历间，以文章显名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1204941_comment'></div>再娶魏氏，光禄卿琰之女，亦蚤卒，赠遂宁县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1204941_comment'></div>又娶遂宁之弟，封安康郡君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1204941_comment'></div>子男四人：长曰摅，扬州江都县尉，蚤卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1204941_comment'></div>次曰原，承奉郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1204941_comment'></div>次曰逡，承务郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1204941_comment'></div>次曰迢，承务郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1204941_comment'></div>女三人：长适郢州长寿县主簿孙端，次适郊祀斋郎丘揖，次适进士黄叔敖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1204941_comment'></div>诸孤自阌乡扶柩南归，而公之伯兄时为江南西路转运使，遂以其年十月丙午葬公于南康军建昌县千秋之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1204941_comment'></div>前期，诸孤请状公之行治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1204941_comment'></div>而公之美实多，难以具著，著其出处始终之大者，以告诸史氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1204941_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_86_1204941_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年2月3日</a>　二月三日，孙莘老卒于高邮故里，称生有挽词四首。作品：孙莘老挽词四首（同功一体尽调元；青春芸阁妙文词；月旦尝居第一评；华屋丘山可奈何）<div id='poem_199262' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_0_199262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199262'>壶遂暮年非不遇，人生到此可忘言。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_199261_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199261'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199261'>青春<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_199261", 199261, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>芸阁</span>妙文词，进读金华鬓若丝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199261_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199261_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199260' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199260' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199260?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199260'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199260'>月旦尝居第一评，立朝风采照公卿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199260_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199260'>门生故吏知多少，尽向碑阴刻姓名。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199260_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199260'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_199260_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199259' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199259' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199259?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年2月3日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_199259_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199259'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199259'>华屋丘山可柰何，百年光景一投梭。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199259_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199259'>故人唯有羊昙在，恸哭西州不忍歌。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199259_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199259'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_199259_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年2月11日</a>　二月十一日，郡守王存正仲生日，秦观有诗致贺。作品：正仲左丞生日（元气钟英伟）<div id='poem_199474' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199474' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199474?labeling=true' target='_blank'>正仲左丞生日</a><span "poem_title_199474")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_199474_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199474'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199474'>元气钟英伟，东皇赋炳灵。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199474'>蓂敷十一叶<span class='inlineComment2'>（张本、四库本作荚）</span>，椿茂八千龄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199474'>汗血来西极，抟风出北溟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199474'>之无分襁褓，诗礼学趋庭。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199474'>妙质珠遗海，高材刃发硎。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199474'>亟<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作初）</span>更芸阁秘，屡直琐闱青。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199474'>史笔开凡例，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_199474", 199474, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>纶言</span>正纬经。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199474'>文昌频曳履，京兆屡空囹。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199474'>遂总台纲纪，常参国典刑。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199474'>两宫隆眷遇，诸夏耸瞻听。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199474'>武略驱雷电，文锋粲斗星。<div id='poem_sentence_10_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_199474'>乞闲辞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_199474", 199474, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>亢满</span>，分逸下青冥。<div id='poem_sentence_11_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_199474'>骑引双朱服，腰横万宝钉。<div id='poem_sentence_12_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_199474'>明峰春矗矗，汝水暮泠泠。<div id='poem_sentence_13_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_199474'>散策花间径，挥犀水上亭。<div id='poem_sentence_14_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_199474'>壶觞延墨客，灯烛按歌伶。<div id='poem_sentence_15_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_199474'>周衮归公旦，商岩梦武丁。<div id='poem_sentence_16_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_199474'>久闻虚揆席，伫见返皇扃。<div id='poem_sentence_17_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_199474'>别数汾阳考，重镌宋父铭。<div id='poem_sentence_18_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_199474'>巍然庙堂上，永作世仪形。<div id='poem_sentence_19_199474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_199474'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_199474_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年4月</a>　夏四月，蔡州通判裴纶仲谟将入京任监察御史，秦观作诗送之。作品：送裴仲谟（君才出于德）<div id='poem_199617' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199617' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199617?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送裴仲谟</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199617")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199617_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199617'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199617'>君才<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>出于德，妙高如匠石。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199617_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199617'>但见广厦<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>成，不见斧斤迹。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199617_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199617'>厚为诸兄奉，自奉颇云啬。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199617_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199617'>三生阳亢宗，薄俗有惭色。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199617_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199617'>汝南古佳郡，月旦评一易。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199617_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199617'>尔来似扬州，不办龙蜥蜴。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199617_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199617'>短簿髯参军，喜怒移顷刻。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199617_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199617'>正平竟获免，实我文举力。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199617_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199617'>念公当乖隔，忧思如纺绩。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199617_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199617'>耻为儿女仁，到此泪横臆。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199617_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199617'>熙朝大烹饪，贤者不家食。<div id='poem_sentence_10_199617_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_199617'>朝为郡县吏，暮作台省客。<div id='poem_sentence_11_199617_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_199617'>矧闻诸法从，久欲荐言责。<div id='poem_sentence_12_199617_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_199617'>去去勿重陈，九万自此击。<div <div class='label1' id='31b33275d6274355998b68ac3717deef_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("31b33275d6274355998b68ac3717deef");'><span id='31b33275d6274355998b68ac3717deef_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年</a>，45岁</div><div id='31b33275d6274355998b68ac3717deef' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1093&endYear=1093')">1093年9月</a>　未几，秦观尝至中山谒东坡，有清和秦观传志其事。作品：清和先生传。<div id='poem_1204942' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1204942' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1204942?labeling=true' target='_blank'>清和先生传</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204942")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204942_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204942'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204942'>清和先生姓甘，名液，字子美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204942_comment'></div>其先本出于后稷氏，有粒食之功，其后<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204942", 1204942, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>播弃</span>，或居于野，遂为田氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204942_comment'></div>田为大族，布于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204942_comment'></div>至夏末世衰，有神农之后利其资，率其徒往俘于田而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204942_comment'></div>其倔彊不降者，与彊而不释甲者，皆为城旦舂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204942_comment'></div>赖公孙杵臼审其轻重，不尽碎其族，徙之陈仓，与麦氏、谷氏邻居，其轻者犹为白粲，与鬼薪仵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204942_comment'></div>已而逃乎河内，又移于曲沃，曲沃之民悉化焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204942_comment'></div>曲沃之地近于甘，古甘公之邑也，故先生之生，以甘为氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204942_comment'></div>始居于曹，受封于郑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204942_comment'></div>及长，器度汪汪，澄之不清，挠之不浊，有酝藉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204942_comment'></div>涵泳经籍，百家诸子之言，无不滥解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204942_comment'></div>孟子称伯夷清，柳下惠和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204942_comment'></div>先生自谓不夷不惠，居二者之间，而兼有其德，因自号曰清和先生云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1204942_comment'></div>士大夫喜与之游，诗歌曲引往往称道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1204942_comment'></div>至于牛童马卒、闾巷倡优之口，莫不羡之，以是名渐彻于天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1204942_comment'></div>一召见，与语竟日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1204942_comment'></div>上熟味其旨，爱其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1204942", 1204942, "Clauses/53/Comments/0")'>淳正</span>，可以镇浇薄之徒，不觉膝之前席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1204942_comment'></div>自是屡见于上，虽郊庙祠祀之礼，先生无不预其选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1204942_comment'></div>素与金城贾氏及玉卮子善，上皆礼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1204942_comment'></div>每召见先生，有司不请，而以二子俱见，上不以为疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1204942_comment'></div>或为之作乐，盛馔以待之，欢甚，至于头没杯案。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1204942_comment'></div>先生既见宠遇，子孙支庶出为郡国二千石，往往皆是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1204942_comment'></div>至于十室之邑，百人之聚，先生之族无不在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1204942_comment'></div>昔最著闻者，中山、宣城、湓浦，皆良子弟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1204942_comment'></div>然皆好宾客，所居冠盖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1204942", 1204942, "Clauses/79/Comments/0")'>骈集</span>，宾客号呶，出入无节，交易之所在委积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1204942_comment'></div>由是上疑其浊，小人或乘间以贿入，欲以逢上意而取宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1204942_comment'></div>一日上问先生曰：「君门如市，何也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1204942_comment'></div>先生曰：「臣门如市，臣心如水」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1204942_comment'></div>上曰：「清和先生，今乃信其清和矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1204942_comment'></div>益<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_29_1204942", 1204942, "Clauses/95/Comments/0")'>厚遇</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1204942_comment'></div>由是士大夫愈从先生游，乡党宾友之会，咸曰：「无甘公而不乐」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1204942_comment'></div>既至，则一坐尽倾，莫不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1204942", 1204942, "Clauses/102/Comments/0")'>注挹</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1204942_comment'></div>然先生遇事多不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1204942", 1204942, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>自持</span>，以待人斟酌而后行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1204942_comment'></div>尝自称：「沽之哉，沽之哉，我待价者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1204942_comment'></div>人或召之，不问贵贱，至于斗筲之量，挈瓶之智，或虚己来者，从之如流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1204942_comment'></div>布衣寒士，一与之遇，如挟纩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1204942_comment'></div>惟不喜释氏，而僧之徒好先生者，亦窃与先生游焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1204942_comment'></div>至于学道隐居之士，多喜见先生以自晦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1204942_comment'></div>然先生爱移人性情，激发其胆气，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_1204942", 1204942, "Clauses/125/Comments/0")'>解释</span>其忧愤，可谓能令公喜，能令公怒者邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1204942_comment'></div>王公卿士如灌夫、季布、李景俭、桓彬之徒，坐与先生为党而被罪者，不可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1204942_comment'></div>其相欢而奉先生者，或至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1204942", 1204942, "Clauses/132/Comments/0")'>破家败产</span>而不悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1204942_comment'></div>以是礼法之士疾之如雠，如丞相朱子元、执金吾刘文叔、郭解、长孙登，皆不悦，未尝与先生语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1204942_comment'></div>时又以其士行或久，多中道而变，不承于初，咸毁之曰：「甘氏孽子，始以诈得，终当以诈败矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1204942_comment'></div>久之，或有言先生性不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1204942", 1204942, "Clauses/145/Comments/0")'>自持</span>，无大臣辅政之体，置之左右，未尝有沃心之益，或虞以虚闲废事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1204942_comment'></div>上由此亦渐疏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1204942_comment'></div>会徐邈称先生为圣人，上恶其朋比，大怒，遂命有司以光禄大夫秩就封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1204942_comment'></div>宗庙祭祀未尝见遂，终于郑、仕于郡国者，皆不夺其官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1204942_comment'></div>初，先生既失宠，其交游往往谢绝，甚者至于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1204942", 1204942, "Clauses/161/Comments/0")'>毁弃</span>素行，以卖直自售。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1204942_comment'></div>惟吏部尚书毕卓、北海相孔融、彭城刘伯伦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_48_1204942", 1204942, "Clauses/163/Comments/2")'>笃好</span>如旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1204942_comment'></div>融尝上书辨先生之无罪，上益怒，融由此亦得罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1204942_comment'></div>而伦又为之颂，与当世为有故，不著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1204942_comment'></div>今掇其行事大要者，著于篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1204942_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_1204942'>太史公曰：先生之名，见于诗书者多矣，而未有至公之论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1204942_comment'></div>誉之者美逾其实，毁之者恶溢其真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1204942_comment'></div>若先生激发壮气，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_54_1204942", 1204942, "Clauses/179/Comments/0")'>解释</span>忧愤，使布衣寒士乐而忘其穷，不亦薰然慈仁君子之政欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1204942_comment'></div>至久而多变，此亦中贤之疵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1204942_comment'></div>孔子称：「有始有卒者，其惟圣人乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1204942_comment'></div>先生何诛焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1204942_comment'></div>予尝过中山，慨然想先生之风声，恨不及见也，乃为之传以记<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1204942_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_59_1204942'>解：宋高邮本、丛刊本作「觞」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_59_1204942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1204942'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_58_1204942_0'>⑴ 《淮海后集》卷六。又见《文章辨体汇选》卷五四七。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1204942_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

-----title
丽水（处州）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='b9691373eb934e288e96eb370be8db10_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b9691373eb934e288e96eb370be8db10");'><span id='b9691373eb934e288e96eb370be8db10_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年6月</a>　初至处州，居处维艰，有暴露之忧。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年6月</a>　秦观春日杂兴中有二诗，写由荣至衰之生活变化，当作于是年（或次年春）作品：春日杂兴其七（昔我游京室）其九（桃李用事辰）<div id='poem_515761' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_515761' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/515761?labeling=true' target='_blank'>春日杂兴四首<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(25820, "北宋", "张耒", "poem_title_515761")'>张耒</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_515761_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_515761_0'>① 按：本诗又见《淮海集》卷三，题《春日杂兴十首》。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_515761'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_515761'>昔我游京室，交通五陵间。<div id='poem_sentence_0_515761_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_515761'>主客各英妙，袍马相追攀。<div id='poem_sentence_1_515761_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_515761'>千金具饮啜，百金顾吹弹。<div id='poem_sentence_2_515761_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_515761'>缨弁罗广席，当头舞交竿。<div id='poem_sentence_3_515761_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_515761'>鲜妆耀渌酒，锦缬生风澜。<div id='poem_sentence_4_515761_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_515761'>灯烛暗夜艾，士女纷相班。<div id='poem_sentence_5_515761_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_515761'>欢娱易徂歇，转盼如飞翰。<div id='poem_sentence_6_515761_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_515761'>亹亹负孤愿，离离衔永叹。<div id='poem_sentence_7_515761_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_515761'>山鸟窥茗饮，檐花笑蔬餐。<div id='poem_sentence_8_515761_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_515761'>弃捐勿重陈，事定须盖棺。<div id='poem_sentence_9_515761_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_515761'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_515761_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_515760' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_515760' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/515760?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span id='poem_sentence_0_515760'>桃李<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_515760", 515760, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>用事</span>辰，鲜明夺云绮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_515760_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_515760'>繁华一朝去，默默惭杞梓。<div id='poem_sentence_1_515760_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_515760'>时徂鹰化鸠，地迁橘为枳。<div id='poem_sentence_2_515760_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_515760'>独有羡门生，后天犹不死。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　秦观在处州监酒税，有诗题务中壁。作品：题务中壁（窑头春酒响潺潺）<div id='poem_199342' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199342' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_199342'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199342'>榨头春酒响潺潺，垆下黄翁寝正安。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199342_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199342'>梦入平阳旧池馆，隔花螭口吐清寒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199342_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199342'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_199342_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年春</a>　春，游府治南园，作千秋岁词。作品：千秋岁（水边沙外）<div id='poem_199690' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199690' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199690?labeling=true' target='_blank'>千秋岁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199690")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199690_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199690'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199690'>水边沙外，城郭春寒退。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199690'>花影乱，莺声碎。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199690'>飘零疏酒盏，离别宽衣带。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199690'>人不见，碧云暮合空相对。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199690_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199690'>忆昔西池会，鹓鹭同飞盖。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199690'>携手处，今谁在？<div id='poem_sentence_5_199690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199690'>日边清梦断，镜里朱颜改。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199690'>春去也，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_199690", 199690, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>飞红</span>万点愁如海。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199690'></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年春</a>　有处州闲题及处州水南庵二首。别有文英阁诗二首，或云亦秦观作。作品：处州闲题（清酒一杯甜似蜜）处州水南庵二首（竹柏萧森溪水南；此身分付一蒲团）<div id='poem_199253' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199253' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199253?labeling=true' target='_blank'>处州闲题</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199253")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_199253_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199253'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199253'>清酒一杯甜似蜜，美人双鬓黑如鸦。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199253_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199253'>莫誇春色欺秋色，未信桃花胜菊花。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199253_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199253'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_199253_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_199252' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199252' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199252?labeling=true' target='_blank'>处州水南庵二首<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199252")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_199252_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_199252_0'>① 按：本诗一作苏轼诗，见《苏轼诗集》卷五○。</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199252'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199252'>竹柏萧森溪水南，道人为作小圆庵。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199252_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
岳阳（岳州）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='ca81de0334164fc8b42290235882f219_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ca81de0334164fc8b42290235882f219");'><span id='ca81de0334164fc8b42290235882f219_link' href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_1204956")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1204956_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1204956'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1204956'>绍圣三年十月己亥朔十一日丁卯，前宣义郎秦观敬以钱马香酒茶果之奠，望洞庭、青草湖境上，敬祭于岳州境内洞庭昭灵王、青草安流王、渊德侯、<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1204956", 1204956, "Clauses/3/Comments/6")'>顺济侯</span>、忠洁侯、孝烈灵妃、孝感侯之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1204956_comment'></div>观罪戾不肖，顷缘幸会，尝厕朝列，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1204956", 1204956, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>备员</span>儒馆，承乏史臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1204956_comment'></div>福过灾生，数遭重劾，蒙恩宽贷，投窜湖南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1204956_comment'></div>老母戚氏，年踰七十，久抱末疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1204956_comment'></div>尽室幼累，几二十口，不获俱行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1204956_comment'></div>既寓浙西，方令男湛，谋侍南来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1204956_comment'></div>敬惟诸神，皆以威烈忠孝，著在方册，庙食此方，分风擘流，有祷如响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1204956_comment'></div>观之得罪本末，诸神具知，愿加哀怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1204956_comment'></div>老母异时，经彼重湖，赐以便风，安然获济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1204956_comment'></div>仍愿神贶，早被天恩，生还乡邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1204956_comment'></div>观以疾走便道，不遑躬诣祠下，尽此血诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1204956_comment'></div>故修薄奠，以伸悃愊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1204956_comment'></div>心切词迫，渎浼至灵，俯企惶惧，唯诸神明鉴之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1204956_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
长沙
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='2502f1423b714da58ed82f2a00e59775_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2502f1423b714da58ed82f2a00e59775");'><span id='2502f1423b714da58ed82f2a00e59775_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1096&endYear=1096')">1096年</a>，48岁</div><div id='2502f1423b714da58ed82f2a00e59775' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>过长沙，传访潭土风俗，识义倡。后有青门饮一词，殆为怀念长沙义倡而作。作品：青门饮（风起云间）<div id='poem_199725' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199725' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199725?labeling=true' target='_blank'>青门饮</a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199725")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199725_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199725'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199725'>风起云间，雁横天末，严城画角，梅花三奏。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199725'>塞草西风，冻云笼月，窗外晓寒轻透。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199725'>人去香犹在，孤衾长闲馀绣。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199725'>恨与宵长，一夜薰炉，添尽香兽。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199725'>前事空劳回首。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199725'>虽梦断春归，相思依旧。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199725'>湘瑟声沈，庾梅信断，谁念画眉人瘦。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199725'>一句难忘处，怎忍辜、耳边轻咒。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199725_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199725'>任人攀折，可怜又学，章台杨柳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_199725_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>舟经潇湘，赋阮郎归、临江仙二阕，抒远谪之恨。作品：阮郎归（潇湘门外水平铺）<div id='poem_199713' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199713' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199713?labeling=true' target='_blank'>阮郎归<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span>四首</a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199713")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_199713_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199713'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199713'>潇湘门外水平铺，月寒征棹孤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199713'>红妆饮罢少踟蹰，有人偷向隅。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199713_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199713'>挥玉箸，洒真珠，梨花春雨余。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199713_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199713'>人人尽道断肠初，那堪肠已无。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_199713_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
郴州

id='poem_sentence_0_199638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199638'>昆崙一何高，去天无数寻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199638'>亲朋喜我来，感叹或沾襟。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199638_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199633'>踉跄劣于行，累然抱渴饥。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 雷州（海康）

id='poem_title_199711_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199711'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199711'>南来飞燕北归鸿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199711_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199711'>偶相逢，惨愁容。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199711_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199711'>绿鬓朱颜，重见两衰翁。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199711_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199711'>别后悠悠君莫问，无限事，不言中。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199711_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199711'>小槽春酒滴珠红。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199711_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199711'>莫匆匆，满金钟。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199711_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199711'>饮散落花流水、各西东。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199711_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199711'>后会不知何处是，烟浪远，暮云重。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_199711_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年6月</a>　是时，秦观有诗赠苏子瞻。作品：赠苏子瞻（叹息苏子瞻）<div id='poem_199483' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_199483' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/199483?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠苏子瞻</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_199483")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_199483_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_199483'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_199483'>叹息苏子瞻，声名绝后先。<div id='poem_sentence_0_199483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199483'>衣冠传盛事，兄弟固多贤。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_199483'>感慨诗三百，流离路八千。<div id='poem_sentence_2_199483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199483'>直心羞媚灶，忠力欲回天。<div id='poem_sentence_3_199483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199483'>缧绁终非罪，江湖秪自怜。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_199483'>饥寒常并日，疾病更连年。<div id='poem_sentence_5_199483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199483'>明主无终弃，西州稍内迁。<div id='poem_sentence_6_199483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199483'>奏言深意苦，感涕内<span class='inlineComment2'>（原缺，据各本补）</span>人传。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_199483'>前席须宣室，非熊起渭川。<div id='poem_sentence_8_199483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_199483'>君臣悦相遇，愿上角招篇。<div id='poem_sentence_9_199483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_199483'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_199483_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年7月</a>　七月，秦观离海康北归，喜赋和陶渊明归去来辞。作品：和渊明归去来辞（归去来兮）<div id='poem_761917' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_761917' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/761917?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和陶渊明归去来辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(30713, "北宋", "秦观", "poem_title_761917")'>秦观</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_761917_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_761917'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_761917'>归去来兮，眷眷怀归今得归。<div id='poem_sentence_0_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_761917'>念我生之多艰，心知免而犹悲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_761917'>天风飘兮余迎，海月炯兮余追。<div id='poem_sentence_2_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_761917'>省已空之忧患，疑是梦而复非。<div id='poem_sentence_3_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_761917'>及我家于中途，儿女欣而牵衣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_761917'>望松楸而长恸，悲心极而更微。<div id='poem_sentence_5_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_761917'>升沉几何，岁月如奔。<div id='poem_sentence_6_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_761917'>嗟我宿昔，通籍璧门。<div id='poem_sentence_7_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_761917'>赐金虽尽，给札尚存。<div id='poem_sentence_8_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_761917'>愧此散木，缪为牺尊。<div id='poem_sentence_9_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_761917'>属党论之云兴，雷霆发乎威颜。<div id='poem_sentence_10_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_761917'>淮南谪于天庖，予小子其何安。<div id='poem_sentence_11_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_761917'>岁七官而五谴，越鬼门之幽关。<div id='poem_sentence_12_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_761917'>化猿鹤之有日，讵国光之复观。<div id='poem_sentence_13_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_761917'>忽大明之生东，释累囚而北还。<div id='poem_sentence_14_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_761917'>酾天汉而一洗，觉宇宙之随桓。<div id='poem_sentence_15_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_761917'>归去来兮，请逍遥于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_761917", 761917, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>至游</span>！<div id='poem_sentence_16_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_761917'>内取足于一身，复<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_761917", 761917, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>从物</span>兮何求？<div id='poem_sentence_17_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_761917'>荣莫荣于不辱，乐莫乐于无忧。<div id='poem_sentence_18_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_761917'>乡人告予以有年，黍稷郁乎盈畴。<div id='poem_sentence_19_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_761917'>止有弊庐，泛有扁舟。<div id='poem_sentence_20_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_761917'>濯余足兮寒泉，振余衣兮古丘。<div id='poem_sentence_21_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_761917'>洞胸中之滞碍，眇云散而风流。<div id='poem_sentence_22_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_761917'>识此行之匪祸，乃造物之馀休。<div id='poem_sentence_23_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_761917'>已矣哉，桔槔仰无已，时举觞自属聊淹留！<div id='poem_sentence_24_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_761917'>汝今不已将安之？<div id='poem_sentence_25_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_761917'>封侯既绝念，仙事亦难期。<div id='poem_sentence_26_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_761917'>依先茔而洒扫，从稚子而耘耔。<div id='poem_sentence_27_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_761917'>修杜康之废祠，补由庚之亡诗。<div id='poem_sentence_28_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_761917'>为太平之兴老，幅巾待尽更奚疑！</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_761917_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_761917'><span class='label'>按：</span>《淮海集》卷一。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_761917_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年7月</a>　又有精思诗一首，似作于同时。作品：精思（精思洞元化）<div id='poem_199668' id='poem_sentence_0_199668_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_199668'>俯仰凌倒景，龙行速如神。<div id='poem_sentence_1_199668_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_199668_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_199668'>仙者二三子，眷然骨肉亲。<div id='poem_sentence_4_199668_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_199668_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_199668'>无端拜失仪，放斥令自新。<div id='poem_sentence_7_199668_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
容县（容州）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='50c9aec2750e43dabf6adfbfc55b6e2e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("50c9aec2750e43dabf6adfbfc55b6e2e");'><span id='50c9aec2750e43dabf6adfbfc55b6e2e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>，52岁</div><div id='50c9aec2750e43dabf6adfbfc55b6e2e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年8月12日</a>　八月，秦观过容州，留多日，容守遣人送归衡州，至藤州，伤暑困卧，八月十二日，卒于光华亭上。九月七日，苏轼闻耗，深致哀痛。<br /></div>
-----end
